productAttributes.productDescription:
Experiment with a camera that mixes style and performance in the right amounts to deliver a power-packed execution. The Nikon Coolpix P310 belongs to the Performance series of point and shoot cameras. This camera is ideal for hobbyists and serious photographers alike, with features like a Manual mode and shooting modes that make photography easy and customizable.

The Coolpix P310 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.3 - 17.9 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 100 mm. The digital camera features a 4.2x optical zoom and 2x digital zoom that can bring you subject closer for a detailed look. The CMOS sensor in this Nikon camera enables the 16.1 megapixel resolution of your images.

This tiny camera will change the way you record memories, with its stylish design and easy-to-use interface. The back panel features one-touch buttons for video recording, image preview, delete and menu controls. The top panel features a rotary dial with popular shooting settings and the shutter release button. The front panel sports a grip groove that lets you hold the camera securely. The function button to the right of the lens can be set to support any one feature that can easily be deployed in the middle of shooting an image.

The P310 weighs 194 g and will slip into your pocket or handbag easily. You can shoot high quality Full HD videos at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels resolution and 30 fps, and chronicle every heart-warming moment in full clarity. The EXPEED C2 processor enables high speed shooting and crystal clear images even in the dark. Use the 3 inch TFT LCD screen, with a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels, to compose perfect photos and preview them. The display screen also has an anti-reflection coating that reduces any glare, even if you’re standing under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

The Nikon P310 features an internal memory of 90 MB and also supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. The Coolpix digital camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 230 shots on full charge. The camera sports an HDMI mini-connector Type C port that lets you watch your photographs and videos on a large screen HD television. You can also transfer images from your camera to a computer or laptop with the high speed USB port.

Performance

The Coolpix P310 features an aperture range of an incredible f/1.8 - 4.9 that let you take ultra-bright images even in low light conditions. The Auto Focus mode has a functioning range of 30 cm onwards Wide and from 60 cm to infinity Tele, letting the camera take care of the settings so you can enjoy the pure pleasure of photography.

The Coolpix P310 camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 3200, assisting in helping photographs with low noise grains at dawn and dusk too. The Coolpix camera has a shutter speed of 1/2000 - 1 sec, and this can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode to keep the shutter open for longer. This lets you take mind-blowing pictures of bursts of lights. The built-in pop-up flash can be manually ejected to use with compatible modes to light up the scene in front of you. The flash has a range of 0.5 - 6.5 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.5 m Tele.

Features

The Nikon camera features 19 popular shooting modes like Fireworks Show, Sunset, 3D, Pet portrait and more. In 3D mode, the camera sews together 2 shots taken from different positions to create a 3 dimensional image that can be played back on a compatible 3D television for dramatic effects. The lens shift Vibration Reduction compensates for unintended camera shake to deliver images that are sharp and detailed.

The face priority feature can automatically identify when the subject of the image is a person. The Coolpix 310 then customizes the focus and exposure settings to ensure the face of the person is in sharp focus. In Continuous Shooting H mode, you can shoot photos back-to-back at 7 frames per second, and record every moment of any performance in stills. The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you enough time to get in front of the camera and join your friends in all the adorable memories you have built together.
productAttributes.title: Nikon P310 White

productAttributes.productDescription:
Daily-use cameras can be a drag to use, unless they combine power with fashion for an enhanced performance. The Canon PowerShot A2400 IS is an innovative camera that brings super-fast shooting to the palm of your hands in style. From the A series of cameras from the house of Canon, the PowerShot digital camera will be an ideal buy or gift for anyone who wants to take up photography as a hobby.

The A2400 IS sports a focal length of 5 - 25 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm. You can zoom and get closer to your subject with the 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom. The CCD image sensor of this camera enables the crystal clear 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

The compact camera weighs an incredible 126 g, slipping conveniently into your bag or pocket. The back panel features buttons and controls that make shooting images conveniently simple. Easy to carry to different events, the Canon A2400 IS will change the way you record your favorite memories. You can even record videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution with this camera.

The DIGIC 4 engine of the camera speeds up shooting for quick processing of your photographs. In 4:3 aspect ratio, your images can adapt to any media playing device for clear and large images. Use the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen on the back panel to preview and compose your images, as the 230,000 dot pixel resolution will give you a good idea of what the final image will look like.

Battery and Storage

The PowerShot A2400 IS supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards to store your images. You can use the high speed USB port to transfer images from your camera to a laptop or computer and always have space on your camera to record your favorite memories. The Canon camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 190 shots on full charge. This ensures your camera lasts to the end of every event.

Performance

With an aperture of f/2.8 - 6.9, you can take photographs with interesting effects and experiment with depth in your images. The Auto focus feature lets you focus in the range of 3 cm onwards Wide and 1.2 m to infinity Tele. The camera features a light sensitivity of ISO 100 - 1600, letting you take bright and noise-free images even in low light scenes.

The Canon A2400 IS has a shutter speed of 1/2000 - 15 sec, which lets you capture stunning images even in the dark. You can also light up dark scenes with the built-in flash of the camera, which has a functioning range of 50 cm - 3 m Wide and 1 - 2 m Tele.

Features

Shooting modes like Toy Camera Effect, Fireworks, Discreet, Poster Effect and more make photography easy, with settings optimized for popular scenes. The Toy Camera Effect mode darkens the edges of the photos for a vignetting effect. The optical image stabilization system of the camera automatically corrects any shake felt in the camera for steady and sharp images.

The face detection feature ensures that any face identified in a frame is kept in sharp focus for every image. The Face Self-Timer effect takes a photograph when a face enters the frame, giving you ample time to set you camera down and get in front of it for a group photograph that captures all the joy of the moment perfectly.

In the Continuous Shooting mode, the camera allows you to take up to 2.8 shots per second in Low Light mode and up to 0.8 shots per second in Auto mode. This lets you perfectly chronicle every small aspect change in your subject for adorable and heart-warming photographs of your favorite people.
productAttributes.title: Canon A2400 IS Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Fujifilm’s JZ series of long-zoom compact cameras, comes the FinePix JZ100 point and shoot camera. With superb imaging and video quality, this very capable compact camera with its ability to capture a wide range of subjects using a variety of shooting modes is perfect for everyday use.

This FinePix JZ100 features a Fujinon 25 mm wide-angle lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 36.0 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 25  - 200 mm. This very capable wide-angle lens gives the camera 8x of optical magnification along with a further 6.7x of digital zoom. The powerful CCD image sensor with primary colour filter gives the JZ100 an optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixels.

This FinePix camera from Fujifilm boasts a very compact and highly portable design, which with the inclusion of the battery and memory card manages to weigh only 129 g. All the captured images and videos on this camera can be viewed on its brilliant 230,000 dot resolution, 2.7 inch TFT colour LCD display which also doubles-up as a live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

The JZ100 is powered by an NP-45A rechargeable lithium-ion battery that powers the camera for up to 180 shots. All the saved image and video files are saved on the JZ100’s memory unit which is in the form of an SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. These saved files can easily be transferred onto a PC or a laptop using the camera’s high-speed USB digital interface.

Performance

The aperture control function lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens, which on this camera has a range of f/2.9 - f/5.9. The camera’s TTL or through the lens works on the contrast detection method and has a range of 30 cm Wide and 90 cm Tele to infinity. It also has a macro focus range of 5 cm to 60 cm Wide and 80 cm to 1.2 m Tele.

The ISO speed or the light sensitivity range on the JZ100 is from ISO 100 to 3200, letting you take clear and high quality images irrespective of the available light. The camera also has an impressive shutter speed variation with the highest being 1/2000 and the lowest at 8 sec. To further improve the low light capability of this FinePix is the advent of a built-in flash unit which has an operational range of 30 cm to 3 mred Wide and 90 cm to 2 m Tele, allowing you to light up every corner of your frame.

Features

With several shooting modes which include SR auto or screen recognition auto, program and movie mode, the camera can automatically adjust the camera's settings for optimum results. These shooting modes along with a number of pre-set white balancing settings and the inclusion of Red Eye Reduction ,makes the FinePix JZ100 perfectly suited to capture high quality images in all possible conditions and scenarios.

The presence of an intelligent Lens Shift image stabilizer helps to make sure that the recorded video is steady and blur-free. The camera’s powerful 14 megapixel CCD optical image sensor gives you the capability of 720p HD video recording at 30fps with monaural sound capture and both PAL and NTSC output capability.

The face detection feature automatically detects focuses and prioritises the clarity of human faces that are present within the image frame. The camera’s self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, so that you can join your friends and other loved ones in every image. The JZ100 has the ability to capture up to 1.2 shots per second when on the continuous shooting mode.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm JZ100 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
You can now take professional looking photographs in ultimate style with the new ultra-thin Nikon 1 digital cameras. The revolutionary style of the Nikon 1 J1 digital SLR camera will be a pleasure to work with, especially with the pancake-lens that comes in the kit included with this DSLR camera. Ideal for those who pursue photography as a serious hobby, The J1 SLR camera delivers images at 10.1 megapixels.

The Nikon 1 DSLR camera is powered by the EXPEED 3 image processor which reduces noise grains in your photos with 2 powerful engines that work simultaneously to process up to 600 megapixels a second. The high-speed AF CMOS sensor measures 13.2 x 8.8 mm and augments the speedy performance of the J1 DSLR beautifully. 

The J1 lets you take photographs in 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios, encompassing all popular formats in one small device. You can also capture stunningly detailed videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution and 60 fps.

Body

The body of the 1 J1 weighs 277 g when the battery and memory card are in it, while the body alone weighs 234 g. This makes the Nikon digital SLR camera easy to transport, whether in a camera backpack or even slung over your shoulder. The smooth and rounded body of the camera fits easily in your hands and is comfortable to use, even in crowds.

The trendy back panel of the Nikon J1 is dominated by the 3 inch LCD monitor, which has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The rest of the panel features a rotary dial for shooting modes, one-touch buttons for preview, delete and menu controls and a 5-way switch that can be used to toggle between the settings of the camera. The simple controls of the camera provide a basic visage to front the powerful performance of this little DSLR camera by Nikon.

The Nikon 1 J1 supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards to store your photographs. The DSLR camera runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 230 shots on full charge.

Performance

The 1 J1 features a Nikon 1 mount that can accept interchangeable lenses, letting you take multiple kinds of images with a single camera. You can use F mount NIKKOR lenses with this camera. The lens in this kit features a focal length of 10 - 30 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 27 - 81 mm.

The lens has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.6, which controls the amount of light that the image sensor is exposed to. You can even zoom to a limited amount at full telephoto. This Nikon DSLR camera has a hybrid autofocus with an AF-assist illuminator that lets you be in control of how and where you focus. With single-point, auto area and subject tracking focus modes, the camera has 135 auto focus areas and 41 focus areas that can be achieved with the auto area focus mode.

With a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 3200, you have additional control on your photographs. The electronic shutter has a functioning speed of 1/16000 - 30 sec, with a bulb that lets you keep the shutter open for however long you need to compose spectacular images. The built-in pop-up flash synchronizes with the shutter to light up your canvass better, ensuring bright and sharp images every time.

Features and Connectivity

The dust-shield glass of the Nikon 1 J1 ensures that your camera system is protected from small dirt particles and preserved for long. With shooting modes like Smart Photo Selector, Motion Snapshot and more, you can diversify your portfolio to enhance it immeasurably.

With the face-priority AF function, you can be sure to capture every face in the frame to sharp perfection every time. The self-timer will delay shutter release by 2, 5 or 10 seconds, allowing the camera to stabilize and take blur-free images on its own. The Continuous Shooting mode can take up to 5 frames per second, while increasing that to 10, 30 or 60 fps in the Electronic Hi shutter mode. 

The Nikon SLR camera supports RAW and JPEG formats in image shooting and AAC in video shooting. You can transfer images from your camera to computer using the USB port, to free up additional space for more photographs. The Nikon J1 lets you watch your Full HD videos and high resolution images on a large screen television, with the HDMI Type C mini-pin connector.
productAttributes.title: Nikon 1 J1 Silver

The electronic shutter has a functioning speed of 1/16000 - 30 sec, with a bulb that lets you keep the shutter open for however long you need to compose spectacular images. The built-in pop-up flash synchronizes with the shutter to light up your canvass better, ensuring bright and sharp images every time.

Features and Connectivity

The dust-shield glass of the Nikon 1 J1 ensures that your camera system is protected from small dirt particles and preserved for long. With shooting modes like Smart Photo Selector, Motion Snapshot and more, you can diversify your portfolio to enhance it immeasurably.

With the face-priority AF function, you can be sure to capture every face in the frame to sharp perfection every time. The self-timer will delay shutter release by 2, 5 or 10 seconds, allowing the camera to stabilize and take blur-free images on its own. The Continuous Shooting mode can take up to 5 frames per second, while increasing that to 10, 30 or 60 fps in the Electronic Hi shutter mode. 

The Nikon SLR camera supports RAW and JPEG formats in image shooting and AAC in video shooting. You can transfer images from your camera to computer using the USB port, to free up additional space for more photographs. The Nikon J1 lets you watch your Full HD videos and high resolution images on a large screen television, with the HDMI Type C mini-pin connector.
productAttributes.title: Nikon 1 J1 Red, Body with 10-30 mm Lens
Nikon 1 J1 White
Samsung NX1000

productAttributes.productDescription: The 58 mm Carl Zeiss T UV Filter from Zeiss is a general use clear filter that helps to absorb ultraviolet light and reduce the bluish cast of daylight. No additional coloration or contrast effects are provided rendering a clean and natural appearance. A UV filter is also useful as a general protective filter to leave on lenses at all times. Filters help to reduce dust and moisture from reaching your lens element and provide additional protection in case of drops or situations where scratching could occur. The T anti-reflective coating helps to reduce reflections on the filter s surface and promote a better light transmission for high quality imagery. The filter ring is designed with a slim profile to allow its use on wide angle lenses but front filter threads are still available for the use of additional filters. Features: Absorbs ultraviolet light, reduces bluish cast of daylight, general protective filter, t anti-reflective coating, slim profile F
productAttributes.title: Zeiss Ze-6105 UV Filter

productAttributes.productDescription: The Tiffen 58mm UV Protector filter is a general use clear filter that helps to absorb ultraviolet light and reduce the bluish cast of daylight. This filter is especially useful when photographing at high altitudes or around bodies of water. No additional coloration or contrast is provided allowing you to pair this filter with others. The UV filter is also useful as a general protective filter to leave on lenses at all times. Filters help to reduce dust and moisture from reaching your lens element and provide additional protection in case of drops or situations where scratching could occur. Tiffen filters are made using ColorCore technology a process that involves laminating the filter substrate between 2 pieces of optical glass grinding flat to a tolerance of 1 10000th of an inch then mounting to precision metal rings. Features: 1 Absorb Ultraviolet Light, 2 Reduces Bluish Cast of Daylight, 3 General Protective Filter, 4 ColorCore Technology.
productAttributes.title: Tiffen Ti-5999 UV Filter

productAttributes.productDescription: Tiffen 62mm Circular Polarizer filters - Light rays which are reflected become polarized. Polarizing filters are used to select which light rays enter your camera lens. They can remove unwanted reflections from non-metallic surfaces such as water or glass and also saturate colors providing better contrast. The effect can be seen through the viewfinder and changed by rotating the filter. The filter factor varies according to how the filter is rotated and its orientation to the sun. Features: 1 Makes a Blue Sky Bluer, 2 Enhances Clouds, 3 Eliminates Reflections, 4 High Quality ColorCore Glass, 5 Black Aluminum Filter Ring.
productAttributes.title: Tiffen Ti-4781 Polarizing Filter

productAttributes.productDescription: The Tiffen 67mm UV Protector filter is a general use clear filter that helps to absorb ultraviolet light and reduce the bluish cast of daylight. This filter is especially useful when photographing at high altitudes or around bodies of water. No additional coloration or contrast is provided allowing you to pair this filter with others. The UV filter is also useful as a general protective filter to leave on lenses at all times. Filters help to reduce dust and moisture from reaching your lens element and provide additional protection in case of drops or situations where scratching could occur. Tiffen filters are made using ColorCore technology a process that involves laminating the filter substrate between 2 pieces of optical glass grinding flat to a tolerance of 1 10000th of an inch then mounting to precision metal rings. Features: 1 Helps to Absorb Ultraviolet Light, 2 Reduces Bluish Cast of Daylight, 3 General Protective Filter, 4 ColorCore Technology.
productAttributes.title: Tiffen Ti-6001 UV Filter

This filter is especially useful when photographing at high altitudes or around bodies of water. No additional coloration or contrast is provided allowing you to pair this filter with others. productAttributes.productDescription: The new COOLPIX S5100 has been developed to enable the simple, blur-free capture of night shots with less noise. It is equipped with features that enable the simple capture of beautiful night shots.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S5100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Fujifilm FinePix JV100 point and shoot is one of the best budget cameras in the Fujifilm FinePix series. The modest and lightweight FinePix JV100 is perfect for those who like to travel a lot. The focal length of the camera is 6.6 - 19.8 mm and the 35 mm equivalent focal length is 37 - 111 mm.

This FinePix camera is equipped with Fujinon lens which can zoom 3x optically and has a digital zoom of 6.3x. The CCD image sensor captures images at 12.2 megapixels. The ergonomically designed Fujifilm JV100 sports an elegant matte finish and weighs only 126 g excluding batteries.

The FinePix JV100 camera captures both images and videos in high resolution. The Fujifilm digital camera offers a video resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps. The 2.7 inch LCD screen has a resolution of 230000 dots allowing you to get a perfect view of the image being shot.

The buttons and the mode dial are smartly positioned next to the LCD monitor at the back for easy accessibility. The simple controls are quite convenient while shooting photographs and recording videos.

Battery and Storage

 This Fujifilm JV100 camera supports SD or SDHC memory card. The FinePix JV100 is powered by rechargeable Lithium Ion battery pack. When you want to transfer data from this camera, simply connect the USB 2.0 cable to your laptop or PC and transfer everything in a flash.

Performance

 Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening that allows light to fall on the image sensor. The aperture of the JV100 digital camera ranges between f/3.2 - 4.3. The Fujifilm compact camera can automatically adjust ISO sensitivity between ISO 100 - 3200. Higher ISO settings enable you to shoot photographs in low lighting conditions.

The varying shutter speed allows you to capture crystal clear images on fast moving objects like a speeding car or a person jumping. The Fujifilm camera has shutter speed ranging between 1/4 - 1/2000 seconds in Auto mode and 8 - 1/2000 seconds in all other modes.

The built-in automatic flash has different modes which help in various lighting conditions. In Normal mode, the flash ranges between 60 cm - 3.5 m Wide and 60 cm - 2 m Tele. In Macro mode, the flash ranges from 30 - 80 cm.

Features

The Fujifilm digital camera comes with a variety of convenience features which make capturing high quality images easy and simple. The different types of shooting modes like Portrait, Baby, Landscape, Panorama and others prove how easily a photograph can be taken even by someone new to digital photography.

The digital image stabilization technology ensures that none of the images shot are blurred even at maximum zoom. Furthermore, the Face Detection feature of the Fujifilm JV100 camera identifies faces and adjusts the aperture, exposure and focus to capture the image with vibrant and flawless perfection.

The Blink Detection feature in this camera notifies you if a subject blinks in a photograph, thereby letting you retake a better photograph of the face. The self-timer provides a delay of 2 or 10 seconds giving you enough time to get in front of the camera with the rest of your family and friends. This ensures that you get to be in the group photographs as well.

In the Continuous Shooting mode, the Fujifilm digital camera can shoot up to 3 frames at 1.7 fps. This performance-rich camera is perfect for daily use and makes photography and enjoyable.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix JV100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX P100 is a high-performance model that offers an effective pixel count of 10.3-million pixels and a 26 optical zoom NIKKOR lens. Features: A 26 optical zoom NIKKOR lens that covers a broad focal range of wide-angle 26mm through super-telephoto 678mm 35mm format equivalent, Technologies that enable excellent image quality: CMOS image sensor with backside illumination structure, Backlit Scene HDR high dynamic range mode, which makes the most of continuous shooting technologies, and an advanced Night Landscape scene mode, High-speed continuous shooting functions that enable continuous shooting of images at the maximum size 10 MP at 10 fps and sport continuous mode, which allows for continuous shooting at up to approximately 120 fps, Full HD movie recording and playback functions, A 3-in., approximately 460k-dot vari-angle Clear Color Display simplifies shooting from a variety of angles, 5 features that effectively prevent or reduce blur caused by camera shake and subject movement, Smart portrait system for consistently beautiful portraits, HDR High Dynamic Range imaging to create images with a range of tonal detail that could not be captured in a single photo.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix P100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX L21 is equipped with new functions including electronic vibration reduction VR that make it easy for anyone to take consistently beautiful pictures.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L21 Point & Shoot Camera Pink

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you were looking for a stylish and lightweight point and shoot digital camera, your search ends here. The Nikon Coolpix S80 belongs to the S series or Style series of digital point and shoot cameras from Nikon. This compact digital camera is ideal to use at social events or on a vacation. The S80 has a Nikkor lens with a focal length of 6.3 - 31.5 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 35 - 175 mm.

The Coolpix digital camera has 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom options that you can use to capture more details in your subject. The CCD image sensor in this Nikon point and shoot camera lets you take images at 14.1 megapixels that you can enlarge to get stunning and dramatic images.

This compact Coolpix digital camera weighs 133 g and will fit comfortably into any pocket or bag. The back panel of this Nikon Coolpix camera has no buttons and is dominated by the 3.5 inch OLED touch screen display with a resolution of 819,000 dot pixels. The anti-reflection coating of this display screen helps you compose and preview images without glare even in bright sunlight.

With the Coolpix S80, you can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 30 fps. This Nikon Coolpix digital camera is powered by the EXPEED C2 image processing system which boosts high sensitivity performance and provides you with maximum image quality.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S80 records your images in its inbuilt memory of 79 MB. This can be expanded using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can take up to 150 shots with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery on a single charge.

The HDMI mini connector of this Coolpix point and shoot digital camera enables you to access your images and videos on an HDTV. You can store your images and videos on a laptop or PC by connecting them to your Nikon S80 through the USB high speed port.

Performance

The Nikon S80 has an aperture range of f/6.3 - 31.5 mm. Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Coolpix digital point and shoot camera, you can focus from 800 mm onwards in the Auto mode. In Macro mode, this focus range increases from 70 mm onwards Wide.

This Coolpix S80 digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 800 in Auto mode, and in Manual mode, this range increases to ISO 80 - 6400. With a shutter speed range of 1/1500 - 2 seconds, you can take dramatic images of moving objects or people with ease. The Shutter speed can be decreased to 4 seconds in the Fireworks Show mode to get stunning images of bursts of light.

The built-in flash of the Nikon Coolpix point and shoot digital camera has a range of 500 - 4000 mm Wide and 500 - 2500 mm Tele and comes in handy in low light situations.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix S80 has 17 pre-set scene modes like Museum, Fireworks Show, Snow, Food and many more. These scene modes automatically optimize the camera settings for popular settings and locations. The Fish-Eye filter in this Coolpix camera imitates a fisheye lens and lets you take broad and panoramic images. The lens shift and electronic Vibration Reduction of the Coolpix S80 ensures that your images are blur-free and sharply defined.

This Nikon digital camera has a Face-Priority feature that automatically detects up to 12 faces and optimizes focus for them. The Blink Warning function alerts the photographer if a subject has blinked, letting you take another shot. The Smile Timer feature releases the shutter automatically if it senses that a subject is smiling, making sure you never miss out on the moment.

With the self-timer feature, you can delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and join your friends in every picture from now on. The Continuous mode lets you take up to 6 shots at 0.9 frames per second with a single burst, capturing every part of a moment.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S80 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon Coolpix S8100 belongs to the Coolpix S series of point and shoot cameras. This digital camera uses CMOS sensor, which have a resolution of 12.1 megapixel. The NIKKOR ED glass lens of the Coolpix camera provides 10x optical zoom and has focal length of 5.4 mm - 54.0 mm. The 35 mm equivalent focal length of the camera is 30 mm - 300 mm.

This Nikon camera weighs 209 g including the battery and memory card and is handy to be carried anywhere. It has an appealing design with the black coated metal body which has a glossy finish. The Coolpix camera can record Full HD moviesat the resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels 30 fps. S8100 has a unique feature in which you can also take still images while recording an HD video. This point and shoot camera includes a creative slider, which allows the adjustment of brightness, saturation and color.

The S8100 is powered by Nikon EXPEED C2 image processor, which is customized to each COOLPIX model. The camera has a 3-inch TFT-LCD of resolution 921,000 dot pixels with a wide viewing angle and anti-reflection coating.

Battery and Storage

The rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 is the power source of the camera and can take 210 shots before discharging completely. The internal memory of this Coolpix camera is 102 MB. To increase the storage space of the camera, you have the freedom to opt for SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards.

Performance

This Nikon point and shoot camera has TTL contrast detection Auto Focus. The aperture of the camera ranges between f/3.5 - f/5.6. The sensitivity of the Coolpix camera can be automatically adjusted from ISO 160 - 3200 if you need to take pictures in low light situations.

The shutter speed of the camera ranges between 1/2000 - 2sec that provides you the freedom to capture the fast moving objects with clarity. The point and shoot camera has an in-built flash that ranges between 0.5 m - 4.0 m Wide and 0.5 m - 2.5 m Tele.

Features and Connectivity

Scene modes such as Sports, Portrait, Snow, Fireworks, Portrait and many more are included in the Nikon camera. This digital camera also includes the scene Auto Selector feature that automatically recognizes the shooting situation and adjusts the camera settings accordingly. The S8100 is preloaded with a series of automatic functions including Red-Eye Fix, Face-Priority Auto Focus, Blink Warning, Smile Timer and Skin Softening.

The S8100 also offers Optical VR Image Stabilization that minimizes the effects of camera shake and helps in getting clarity in pictures. You can also set a self timer before clicking the pictures with a delay of 2 - 10 seconds. You can easily connect your Nikon Coolpix S8100 camera to PC or laptop by using the USB. The HDMI mini connector Type C is also provided with the S8100 point and shoot camera. You can connect the camera conveniently to the HDTV, computer and laptop through the Audio Video Cable.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S8100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX L110 is an easy-to-use model with an effective pixel count of 12.1-million pixels, a 15 optical zoom NIKKOR lens that covers a broad range of focal lengths from wide-angle 28mm.
productAttributes.title: Nikon L110 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The slim COOLPIX S3000, with a depth of approximately 19 mm, incorporates all of Nikons advanced shooting functions in a body size that can be easily carried in a small purse or pouch.
productAttributes.sizeVariants: [CAMCUTTFHSTGVFJH, CAMCUTTFJX75PYKA, CAMCUTTFSZQU8THU, CAMCUTTFVZ5H7YKJ, CAMCUTTFWGMSVZZ6, CAMCVYGRFMTESPH8, CAMCVYGRWYHD7PAA]
productAttributes.title: Nikon S3000 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix S1100pj is a 14.1 megapixel point and shoot camera. Powered by Nikon EXPEED C2 digital image processor, the camera has a 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor. This Nikon camera supports aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The unique feature of the Nikon Coolpix S1100pj is that it has a projector. The camera can project at a distance up to 240 cm and a size of up to 47-inch display.

Body

 The Coolpix S1100pj weighs 155 g and has dimension of 100.8 x 62.7 x 24.1 mm excluding projections. It has a 3-inch TFT LCD touchscreen monitor, which has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The camera has internal memory of 79MB and external memory can be added using SD memory card. The camera is also SDHC and SDXC memory card compliant. S1100pj comes with rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12.

Performance

 This Nikon camera uses 5x optical wide zoom NIKKOR lens. It can zoom digitally up to 4x and optically up to 5x. The S1100pj uses Contrast Detection Auto Focus and can focus up to 30cm in Normal mode and 3cm in Macro mode. The camera has Auto sensitivity from ISO 80-800 and Manual sensitivity from ISO 80-1600. Additional boost in sensitivity can be attained up to 3200 and 6400. The Shutter speed of the camera ranges from 1/1500 - 4sec. The Nikon Coolpix S1100pj has an in-built Flash, which has a range of 3.5m. The Aperture of the camera ranges from F3.9 - F5.8.

Features and Connectivity

 The Coolpix S1100pj camera features various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night, landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Copy, Backlight and Panorama assist. To assist users in taking steady pictures, the camera also has Combination Lens shift and Electronic VR Image Stabilization software. The self-timer feature in the camera supports time duration of 2 seconds and 10 seconds. The continuous mode can shoot at 1.2 fps for up to 4 shots. The Coolpix S1100pj also has additional functions like Best Shot Selector BSS and Multi-shot 16 16 frames with a single burst. This Nikon camera can record video in HD 720p at 1280x720. It supports JPEG image format and mono/wav file and MOV movie formats. Users can also connect the camera to the computer using USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S1100PJ Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX S6000 is the thinnest camera in its class despite a zoom lens that supports a broad shooting range from wide-angle 28mm through telephoto 196mm both 35mm format equivalent.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S6000 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Beautiful HD and clear movie recordings in great image quality with Fujifilm's amazing Fujinon Lens. Equipped with the 6 scene SR AUTO Scene Recognition Auto and Face Detection, scenes and faces can be captured and optimized even more with the detection functions. Capture natural optimized images regardless of the shooting conditions. Playing back your photos is as simple as it can be! With the advanced picture search function, micro thumbnail and slideshow, enliven your captured memories.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix JZ300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L22 is a 12 megapixel point and shoot camera, and is powered by Nikon?s EXPEED digital image-processing concept. The Coolpix L22 has a 4:3 aspect ratio and user can also switch to 16:9 aspect ratio. This Nikon camera uses the 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and has Nikon's Electronic VR image stabilization and Motion Detection software.

Body

 The Coolpix L22 provides a good one hand grip. The camera weighs 183g and has dimension of 97.7 x 60.5 x 28.3 mm. This Nikon camera has a 3-inch TFT LCD screen with a 230,000 dot pixels resolution and supports Live View. The camera has an internal memory of 19 MB and additional memory can be added using a SD or a SDHC memory card. The Nikon Coolpix L22 is powered by two Alkaline AA batteries which can click up to 240 pictures. A user can also buy and use EN-MH2 and Lithium batteries which can click up to 420 and 660 shots, respectively.

Performance

 The Coolpix L22 lens has a focal length of 37-134mm 35mm equivalent and has a 3.6x Nikkor optical zoom lens, with up to 4x digital zoom. The camera has an Auto Focus option with normal focus range of 30 cm and macro focus range of 5 cm. The Coolpix L22 has an automatic ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 160 to 1,600. The camera features an inbuilt flash and has various flash modes such as Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Fill-in and Slow Syncro. The shutter speed ranges from 4 sec to 1/2000 sec, while the aperture ranges from F3.1 - F6.7.

Features and Connectivity

 This Nikon Coolpix camera has 16 scene modes to shoot in various settings. This Nikon camera also has face detection feature, along with shutter function where the camera clicks the picture only if subject is laughing and warns user if subject blinks. The Coolpix L22 supports JPEG format for images and AVI format for videos. It shoots video at a resolution of 640x480 at 30fps. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix L22 supports USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung WB600 belongs to the Performance series of point and shoot cameras from Samsung. This Super-zoom camera is ideal for sports and travel photography. The digital camera has a Schneider lens with a focal length of 3.9 - 58.5 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 360 mm.

With 5x digital zoom and 15x Super-zoom options, you can be far from your subject, but still have up, close and personal images. The WB600 has a CCD image sensor with which you can take images at 12 megapixel resolution.

The Samsung WB600 weighs 210 g and has a sturdy body with rounded corners that fit nicely in your hands. A rotary dial on the top panel lets you pick scene modes and the one-touch buttons for preview and video recording on the back panel are convenient to use while shooting.

With this WB600 digital camera, you can record videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 30 fps. You can compose your images and videos with the 3 inch TFT LCD screen which has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

The Samsung digital camera has an internal memory of 128 MB and can be expanded using SD and SDHC memory cards. This Samsung WB600 has a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. You can watch your HD videos on an HDTV using the HDMI connector. To make space for more images, you can transfer images from the WB600 point and shoot camera to a computer or laptop using the USB 2.0 high speed port.

Performance

The Samsung digital camera has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 5.8. Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening that controls the light falling on the image sensor. The WB600 has an Auto Focus range of 800 mm onwards Wide and 2000 mm to infinity Tele on Auto mode. In Macro mode, the Auto Focus has a range of 30 - 800 mm Wide and 1000 - 2000 mm Tele.

The light sensitivity of this WB600 digital point and shoot camera has a range of ISO 80 - 3200. You can brighten up your memories with the built-in flash of this Samsung point and shoot camera, which has a range of 300 - 5000 mm Wide and 500 - 3000 Tele.

Features

The Samsung WB600 has 12 Photo Style Selectors like Forest, Retro, Calm, Classic and more. With the Dual Image Stabilization feature, the WB600 combines optical and digital image stabilization systems to ensure that your images are blur-free and defined.

This Samsung WB600 has a Face Recognition feature that automatically recognizes pre-registered faces and optimizes settings to ensure your closest friends and loved ones are always in focus.
productAttributes.title: Samsung WB600 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Photography is now easier than ever before. The Casio Exilim EX-H5 belongs to the Exilim H series of point and shoot cameras. This digital camera is ideal for the photography buff, as it is loaded with easy-to-use features. This Exilim camera has a focal length of 4.3 - 43 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 240 mm.

This Casio digital camera has a CCD image sensor with which you can shoot images at 12.1 megapixel resolution. The Exilim digital camera has a powerful 10x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that is the ideal travel companion.

The Casio EX-H5 weighs 174 g and has a slim body design that fits into any small pocket or bag. The back panel of this digital camera is uncluttered. The one touch playback and video recording buttons are placed conveniently for comfortable access. You can savor special moments by recording in HD at 1280 x 720 20 fps.

The Exilim EX-H5 is powered by the Exilim Engine 5.0 which supports advanced automatic noise grain reduction in every image. You can compose and preview your images with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen which has a 230,400 dot pixel resolution.

Battery and Storage

You can take up to 240 images with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery on a single charge. The Casio Exilim digital camera has an internal memory of 24.5 MB which can be expanded using SD and SDHC memory cards. You can transfer images from the Exilim EX-H5 to a laptop or PC using the USB high speed port and always have space for more pictures.

Performance

Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Exilim EX-H5 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 7.5. This Casio digital camera auto focuses from 150 mm onwards, letting you take sharp and focused images. You can adjust the Macro focus from 70 - 500 mm. The focus can also be manually adjusted in the range of 150 mm to infinity.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor of a camera. This Casio Exilim point and shoot camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 64 - 3200. The Exilim EX-H5 has a shutter speed of 1/2 - 1/2000, which can be reduced to 4 - 1/2000 in Night Scene mode. The powerful built-in flash of the EX-H5 has a range of 200 - 4200 mm Wide and 500 - 2400 mm Tele.

Features

The Casio Exilim EX-H5 has 38 scene modes like Make-up, Landscape and many more. In the Make-up mode, the EX-H5 records portraits with smoother skin textures, making images very appealing. The sensor shift image stabilizer will produce blur-free images that are sharp in detail.

With the Face Detection feature, the Exilim digital camera locates faces within the frame and optimizes focus and brightness settings to make sure they are bright and clear. The Smile Detection Auto Shutter detects smiles in your subjects and releases the shutter, recording those moments forever.

With the self-timer settings of 2 or 10 seconds delay, you never have to miss out on being with your friends in photographs. The additional Triple self-timer feature lets you take 3 images to pick the best of them to keep. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 20 images at 10 frames per second, making sure you have every moment of any performance recorded.
productAttributes.title: Casio Exilim EX-H5 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: Nikons own compact design and new, thin lens barrel design has resulted in the thinnest body in its class with a 10 optical zoom NIKKOR lens and a depth of approximately 27.3 mm.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S8000 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Coolpix S4000 is a new 12 megapixel compact digital camera from Nikon. The camera has a 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and supports aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. This Nikon camera can shoot HD videos and comes with a wide-angle 4x optical zoom NIKKOR lens. The camera uses three image stabilization software: Electronic vibration reduction, Motion detection and Best shot selector to produce images without any blur.

Body

 The Coolpix S4000 camera weighs 131 g and has dimension of 94.5 x 56.5 x 20.4 mm. The 3-inch TFT LCD has resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The display is touchscreen and has anti-reflection coating. This Nikon Coolpix camera has internal memory of 45 MB and external memory can be added through SD and SDHC memory card. The S4000 comes with rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL10, which can take 190 pictures in every charge.

Performance

 The Nikon Coolpix S4000 compact digital camera comes with wide-angle 4x optical zoom NIKKOR lens and has focal length of 4.9 mm - 19.6 mm. This Coolpix camera has Aperture of F/3.2 - 5.9. The camera can zoom digitally and optically up to 4x. S400 has TTL Contrast Detection Auto Focus and has range of 50cm in Normal mode and 8cm in Macro mode. The sensitivity of the camera ranges from ISO 80 - 1600 Auto and ISO 80 - 3200. The built-in Flash has range of 49 cm - 2.4 m.

Features and Connectivity

 The Coolpix S4000 camera has various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach/snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Copy, Backlight, Panorama assist and Draw. The camera also supports face recognition and self-timer of 2 or 10 seconds duration. The additional features of the S4000 include Blink Detection technology, Smile Detection technology, and Face-priority AF function.

The Nikon Coolpix S4000 camera can shoot videos at 720p HD, 1280 x 720 resolution. The camera supports mono/wav file, AVI movie movie formats and Compressed - JPEG - EXIF image format. The S4000 compact digital camera can also shoot in Continuous Shot mode at 0.9 fps for up to 3 shots. Files can be transferred from the camera using USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S4000 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix P7000 belongs to the Nikon Coolpix P series of point and shoot digital cameras. This feature-packed digital camera is the ideal companion for nature photography. This Coolpix digital camera has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 6 - 42.6 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 200 mm.

This 10.1 megapixel Nikon digital camera has a CCD image sensor that takes dramatic pictures with less noise grains. The P7000 has a 7.1x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that bring your distant subjects close.

Weighing 360 g, this Nikon point and shoot has a convenient rubber grip and thumb rest that make photography comfortable. The controls on the top panel are on rotary dials that are easy to access. You can use the Nikon P7000 to shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel 24 fps.

The Nikon P7000 is powered by the EXPEED C2 engine that boosts image quality and processing speed. This Coolpix camera supports aspect ratios of 3:2, 16:9 and 1:1. The Coolpix P7000 has an optical viewfinder that you can use to frame every image. You can also use the 3 inch TFT LCD monitor with a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels to preview all your images and videos.

Battery and Storage

With the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, you can take up to 350 images on a single charge. This Nikon Coolpix P7000 has an internal memory of 79 MB which can be expanded using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can transfer images from the Coolpix P7000 to a laptop or computer using the USB 2.0 high speed port. You can also watch your HD videos on an HDTV with the HDMI mini connector.

Performance

Aperture of a camera is the size of the lens diaphragm controlling the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The aperture of this Coolpix digital camera has a range of f/2.8 - 5.6. With the Coolpix P7000, you can focus in the range of 500 mm onwards Wide and 800 mm to infinity Tele in Auto mode. In Macro mode, the focus has a range of 20 mm onwards Wide.

Shutter speed refers to the time that the shutter is open to let light fall on the image sensor. This Nikon Coolpix digital camera has a shutter speed range of 8 - 1/4000 second in Auto mode. In Fireworks show mode, the shutter speed can be set at 4 seconds to get a stunning image of the burst of light.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor in a camera. The Nikon point and shoot camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 800 on Auto mode. This can be manually changed in the range of ISO 100 - 3200. You can also take bright pictures with the powerful built-in flash of this Coolpix digital camera which has a range of 500 - 6500 mm Wide and 800 - 3000 mm Tele.

Features

This Nikon Coolpix point and shoot digital camera has 18 scene modes like Beach, Snow, Sports, Fireworks and many more. A combination of lens-shift and electronic Vibration Reduction ensures every image is blur-free and defined.

With the Nikon Coolpix's Face-Priority feature, the digital camera automatically detects up to 12 faces in a frame and optimizes settings to keep them in sharp focus. The Smile Timer function automatically releases the shutter when the Coolpix camera identifies a smiling face in focus. The Nikon P7000 warns you when a subject blinks with the Blink Warning feature.

Now you can be with everybody else in every picture with the self-timer that has setting options of 2 and 10 seconds shutter release delay. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you shoot up to 45 images at a speed of 1.3 frames per second, recording every special moment.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix P7000 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon S6000 Brown
Nikon S4000 Pink
Nikon L110 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L22 is a 12 megapixel point and shoot camera, and is powered by Nikon?s EXPEED digital image-processing concept. The Coolpix L22 has a 4:3 aspect ratio and user can also switch to 16:9 aspect ratio. This Nikon camera uses the 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and has Nikon's Electronic VR image stabilization and Motion Detection software.

Body

 The Coolpix L22 provides a good one hand grip. The camera weighs 183g and has dimension of 97.7 x 60.5 x 28.3 mm. This Nikon camera has a 3-inch TFT LCD screen with a 230,000 dot pixels resolution and supports Live View. The camera has an internal memory of 19 MB and additional memory can be added using a SD or a SDHC memory card. The Nikon Coolpix L22 is powered by two Alkaline AA batteries which can click up to 240 pictures. A user can also buy and use EN-MH2 and Lithium batteries which can click up to 420 and 660 shots, respectively.

Performance

 The Coolpix L22 lens has a focal length of 37-134mm 35mm equivalent and has a 3.6x Nikkor optical zoom lens, with up to 4x digital zoom. The camera has an Auto Focus option with normal focus range of 30 cm and macro focus range of 5 cm. The Coolpix L22 has an automatic ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 160 to 1,600. The camera features an inbuilt flash and has various flash modes such as Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Fill-in and Slow Syncro. The shutter speed ranges from 4 sec to 1/2000 sec, while the aperture ranges from F3.1 - F6.7.

Features and Connectivity

 This Nikon Coolpix camera has 16 scene modes to shoot in various settings. This Nikon camera also has face detection feature, along with shutter function where the camera clicks the picture only if subject is laughing and warns user if subject blinks. The Coolpix L22 supports JPEG format for images and AVI format for videos. It shoots video at a resolution of 640x480 at 30fps. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix L22 supports USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Red
Nikon Coolpix L21 Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Fujifilms new FinePix J40 will be a hit with consumers who demand a compact thats affordable, easy-to-use and produces great images. Not only does it feature the latest technology, such as Scene Recognition AUTO and Face Detection, but its very stylish too, with a petite slim-line frame and high-gloss, double coated veneer finish. With a core specification of 12 Megapixels, pin-sharp 3x Fujinon optical zoom lens, and a huge 3.0 LCD screen, the FinePix J40 will deliver fantastic pictures with minimal effort. Offering wide photographic versatility, a new Panoramic Shooting mode allows users to create stunning shots of sweeping landscapes and large groups of people. Just slip it in your pocket and go and have fun!
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix J40 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Fujifilm JX 200

productAttributes.productDescription:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ10 is a member of the Lumix family of point and shoot cameras, ideal for the travelling photographer. This powerful digital camera comes with 12x optical zoom LEICA DC lens, which has a focal length of 25 - 300 mm. This Panasonic digital camera has 4x digital zoom. You can also use the Intelligent zoom feature to extend the zoom range up to 16x. Built with a CCD sensor, the Lumix DMC-TZ10 takes beautiful images at 12.1 megapixels.

At 218 grams, this pocket size Panasonic digital camera is the perfect companion for your travel expeditions. With a sturdy mode dial, a zoom lever and a manual exposure control button shooting pictures and video on a Lumix TZ10 is a delight.

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ10 records HD videos at 1280 x 720 30 fps resolution with brilliant clarity. This point and shoot digital camera comes with a built-in GPS module which Geotags your photos and videos by recording the longitude and latitude of the exact capture spot. The TZ10 camera is built with a Venus Engine HD II image processor for high quality and performance.

This digital camera has a Multi Aspect mode, which lets you take an image in 4:3, 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios simultaneously. The 3 inch TFT anti-reflection LCD display with a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels lets you shoot and view your captures with utmost ease.

Battery and Storage

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ10 has an internal memory of 15 MB and supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card for additional storage. The rechargeable Li-Ion battery lets you click up to 300 shots when fully charged. The camera can record up to 50 minutes of HD video.

To make room for more storage space, you can transfer your shots from the DMC-TZ10 to a computer via high speed USB 2.0. The Panasonic DMC-TZ10 is HDMI compatible,so you can directly connect the camera to an HDTV to view your pictures and videos on the big screen.

Performance

The aperture of this Panasonic Lumix digital camera ranges from f/3.3 - 4.9, while the shutter speed ranges from 1/2000 - 60 seconds. You can use the different combinations of aperture and shutter speed to a have a dramatic impact on the appearance of moving objects.

The auto focus of the DMC-TZ10 is as fast as it is accurate. In Normal mode, the camera has Auto Focus range of 50 cm Wide and 200 cm Tele, while in Macro mode and Intelligent Auto mode the Auto Focus ranges from 3cm Wide to 100 cm Tele.

The light sensitivity of this Panasonic digital camera ranges from ISO 80 -1600 in Automatic Mode, which helps you take pictures with minimal noise grains even under poor lighting. Using High Sensitivity Mode, the ISO of this camera can be further expanded up to ISO 6400. You can also use the powerful built-in flash which has a range of 5.3 m Wide and 3.6 m Tele at Auto ISO.

Features

The Panasonic DMC-TZ10 gives you 28 scene modes for images like Soft Skin, Party, Candle light, Snow, Aerial, Film grain, Underwater and many more. The most interesting of modes is the Happy Mode which optimizes color, saturation and brightness in both photos and videos.

With POWER O.I.S. Optical Image Stabilizer, the camera lens detects and corrects blurry images. The Panasonic DMC-TZ10 digital camera has Face Detection and Face Recognition features which not only detects faces in a frame but also lets you pre-tag faces for future recognition. The high-speed Burst Mode lets you take continuous shot of up to 10 frames per second, perfect to capture racing scenes, a running person or a special dance.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ10 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon S5100 Blue
Nikon S5100 Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX S80 is a stylish compact digital camera with an extremely functional design, equipped with a widescreen 3.5-inch electrostatic OLED touch panel and a wide viewing angle.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S80 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX S80 is a stylish compact digital camera with an extremely functional design, equipped with a widescreen 3.5-inch electrostatic OLED touch panel and a wide viewing angle.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S80 Point & Shoot Camera Pink
Nikon S5100 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix S1100pj is a 14.1 megapixel point and shoot camera. Powered by Nikon EXPEED C2 digital image processor, the camera has a 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor. This Nikon camera supports aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The unique feature of the Nikon Coolpix S1100pj is that it has a projector. The camera can project at a distance up to 240 cm and a size of up to 47-inch display.

Body

 The Coolpix S1100pj weighs 155 g and has dimension of 100.8 x 62.7 x 24.1 mm excluding projections. It has a 3-inch TFT LCD touchscreen monitor, which has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The camera has internal memory of 79MB and external memory can be added using SD memory card. The camera is also SDHC and SDXC memory card compliant. S1100pj comes with rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12.

Performance

 This Nikon camera uses 5x optical wide zoom NIKKOR lens. It can zoom digitally up to 4x and optically up to 5x. The S1100pj uses Contrast Detection Auto Focus and can focus up to 30cm in Normal mode and 3cm in Macro mode. The camera has Auto sensitivity from ISO 80-800 and Manual sensitivity from ISO 80-1600. Additional boost in sensitivity can be attained up to 3200 and 6400. The Shutter speed of the camera ranges from 1/1500 - 4 sec. The Nikon Coolpix S1100pj has an in-built Flash, which has a range of 3.5m. The Aperture of the camera ranges from F3.9 - F5.8.

Features and Connectivity

 The Coolpix S1100pj camera features various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night, landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Copy, Backlight and Panorama assist. To assist users in taking steady pictures, the camera also has Combination Lens shift and Electronic VR Image Stabilization software. The self-timer feature in the camera supports time duration of 2 seconds and 10 seconds. The continuous mode can shoot at 0.9 fps for up to 4 shots. The Coolpix S1100pj also has additional functions like Best Shot Selector BSS and Multi-shot 16 16 frames with a single burst. This Nikon camera can record video in HD 720p at 1280x720. It supports JPEG image format and mono/wav file and MOV movie formats. Users can also connect the camera to the computer using USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S1100PJ Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D700 is a Digital SLR camera and comes with a rugged magnesium-alloy body and dust and moisture protection. This DSLR camera uses Nikon FX format CMOS sensor and has dimension of 36.0 x 23.9 mm. This Nikon camera supports aspect ratio of 3:2 and is powered by EXPEED image processor.

Body

 The camera weighs 995 g and has dimension of 147 x 123 x 77 mm. The D700 has Optical - fixed eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder. This DSLR camera has 3-inch low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD, which has resolution of 920,000 dot pixels. In terms of memory, this digital camera supports Compact Flash Type I cards. The rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL3e can take up to 1000 shots per charge.

Performance

 A Nikon F bayonet lens can be mounted on the Nikon D700. The TTL phase detection Auto Focus in the camera uses the Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX Auto Focus module and gives up to 51 focus points 15 cross-type sensors. The focusing mode supported by this Nikon camera include Single-servo AF AF-S, Continuous-servo AF C and Manual focus M. The sensitivity of this Digital SLR camera ranges from ISO 200 - 6400 and can be further expanded up to Hi-1 ISO 12,800 and Hi-2 ISO 25,600.

The electronically-controlled vertical-travel focal-plane shutter of the D700 has range of 1/8000 sec to 30 secs using the Bulb. This digital camera has a pop up i-TTL balanced fill-flash.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon D700 DSLR camera has self-timer feature with duration of 2, 5, 10 and 20 sec. User can also shoot in Continuous Shot mode at 5 fps. This SLR camera also has many additional features such as Camera orientation detection, LCD live view mode, and PictBridge support.

This Nikon camera support TIFF, JPEG, NEF RAW, and RAW + JPEG image formats. The connectivity options of the D700 DSLR camera includes HDMI output and USB.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D700 DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription:
Canon 60D is an 18 megapixel SLR camera which is powered by DIGIC 4 Image processor. The camera uses CMOS sensor and has dimension of 22.3 x 14.9 mm. 60D supports 3:2, 4:3, 16:9, and 1:1 aspect ratios. This advanced SLR can also record Full HD video at 30/25/24 fps.

Body

 The Canon 60D has dimension of 144.5 x 105.8 x 78.6mm and weighs 675g. A user can shoot images from Eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder or a 3-inch screen at the back. The screen is a TFT LCD with the resolution of 1.04 million dot pixels. This Canon camera supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card. The Canon 60D comes with the LP-E6 battery, which is capable of taking 1100 pictures with the Viewfinder and 320 pictures in Live View shooting mode.

Performance

 A Canon EF or EFS lens can be mounted on the 60D SLR camera. A user can zoom digitally from the range of 1.5x to 10x. This camera uses Auto Focus with 9 focus points TTL secondary image-registration phase detection. It has various focus mode such as One-Shot AF, AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, and Manual. The Auto and Manual ISO range of the camera is ISO 100-6400. The ISO can further be extended to H, which is equivalent to ISO 12800. The Canon 60D has electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter with bulb option, which provides shutter speed of 1/8000 to 1/60 sec. The camera has a retractable, auto pop-up Flash and has a range of 17mm.

Features and Connectivity

 The 60D has various scene modes such as Full Auto, Flash Off, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Program, Movie, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual and Custom. The camera has self timer function of 2 and 10 seconds. It can shoot at continuous shot mode at 5.3 shots per second. This Canon camera supports MPEG-4 AVC / H. 264 movie formats and image formats such as JPEG, RAW, RAW + JPEG. In terms of connectivity, the Canon 60D supports USB 2.0 and HDMI mini.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 60D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-200 mm IS III Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon D3100 is an entry-level DX-format camera, ideal for photographers preparing to refine their skills in DSLR cameras. This camera has a CMOS image sensor of dimensions 23.1 x 15.4 mm, which enables you to capture fabulous images at 14.2 megapixels. The swift EXPEED 2 processing engine of this digital SLR supports an aspect ratio of 3:2. You can record your memories and shoot full HD movies on the Nikon D3100 at 1920 x 1080 resolution 24 fps.

Body

This Nikon DSLR is compact and easy to carry at 445 g without battery. The rubber panel on the rear of the camera gives you a firm thumb grip, while the ergonomically designed body with rounded edges lets you hold the camera steady. This Nikon digital SLR has a secure Mode dial which features 13 operating modes. The base of this dial has a lever that lets you switch between Single, Continuous, Self-timer and Quiet modes with one simple flick of the finger.

The camera works on a rechargeable Li-Ion EN-EL14 battery capable of clicking 550 images when fully charged. The Nikon D3100 camera has an eye level pentamirror viewfinder as well as a LCD screen for image composition. The 3 inch TFT LCD display with 230,000 resolution offers you a pleasant Live View experience. You can use SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards for optimum storage of the images and video captured on the D3100.

Performance

The D3100 DSLR has a Nikon F-mount that is compatible with several NIKKOR lenses. This gives you an opportunity to experiment with several types of lenses and enhance your photography skills. The Nikon D3100 has 11 point auto focus module that promises razor sharp focus and the 3D tracking gives you clearly focused images of a subject in motion. The electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter has a speed range of 1/4000 - 30 seconds. This DSLR also has a Bulb setting to help you take brighter images even in dim light scenarios.

The light sensitivity or ISO of a DSLR reduces the risk of blurry images when taking pictures at faster shutter speeds or dark situations. The Nikon D3100 has a wide ISO range of 100-3200 sensitivity which can be boosted up to ISO 12800. You can further brighten your composition by using the built-in pop up flash or the hot shoe for an attaching external flash.

Features and Connectivity

The Nikon D3100 is equipped with the Guide mode, a feature that helps you get better acquainted with the camera and its many settings. Another vital feature is the Dual Integrated Dust Reduction System of the Nikon D3100. The camera has a built in Image Sensor Cleaning and Airflow Control systems that effectively keep dust away from the CMOS sensor. Never worry about blurry clicks as the Image Stabilizing feature of D3100 detects and corrects them for you.

You can try out the cool scene modes like Sports, Close up, Night Portrait and add more personality to your captures. The in-camera editing feature lets you retouch as well as add effects to images and videos. The Nikon D3100's Face Detection feature spots up to 35 faces in a frame and focus on them to give you a sharp image. You can also delay the tripping of the shutter by 2 or 10 seconds with the self-timer function.

In the continuous mode, this DSLR will click a burst of images at 3 frames per second, capturing every single unforgettable moment. The D3100 Nikon DSLR camera stores images in RAW or JPEG and videos in MOV format. The Nikon D3100 is HDMI compatible, so you can view the pictures and videos with your family and friends on a big screen HDTV. You can also transfer your captures onto a computer or a laptop via the high speed USB 2.0 port.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3100 DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

offers.title: Exclusively for you:- Rs100 EXTRA OFF on shopping for 2 or more units from seller WS Retail on select products only. Valid till 26th Jan 2015. See final price at cart.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon D3100 is an entry-level DX-format camera, ideal for photographers preparing to refine their skills in DSLR cameras.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a highly capable 14.2 MP CMOS imaging sensor that is more that able to take high quality images across a wide range of lighting conditions. This sensor is also adept at adapting to many ISO settings that can result in better images in .lower lighting conditions as well. It is equipped with the EXPEED 2 image processing engine.

Less Blur

The lens and sensor arrangement together work in reducing the visual artefacts seen on images. The better the sensor, clearer will be the image output. The Nikon D3100 camera is capable of clicking high quality images that result in less blur even under low lighting conditions.

Active D Lighting

This camera is equipped with the Active D Lighting feature that balances out the contrast even in brightly lit scenes. When we shoot images in brightly lit areas, like outdoors on a bright and sunny day, there can be instances where pictures may appear to have extreme contrast between the light and dark areas of the frame. This anomaly is reduced greatly with the Active D Lighting feature.

Picture Control

This feature allows you to set specific control settings for 6 different picture modes. Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Landscape and Portrait mode. You also have an Easy-to-view finder that is incorporated into the system.

Auto Selection and Movies

With the Automatic Scene Selector, you can choose the right picture settings just by choosing the automatic mode and pressing a button for the onboard image sensor to select the right image settings according to the scene. It is also possible to take full HD videos with the Nikon camera. The 11 Point Auto Focus system allows you to individually focus along 11 different points through the viewfinder. It also comes with Eye-Fi Support.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3100 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D7000 is a 16.2 megapixel SLR camera and is powered by Nikon EXPEED 2 image processing technology. This SLR camera has a Nikon DX format CMOS sensor with a dimension of 23.6 x 15.6 mm.

Body

 The D7000 weighs 690g and has dimension of 132 x 105 x 77 mm. The camera has Fixed eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder and a 3-inch low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD with 921,000 dot pixels resolution. In terms of memory, the camera supports SD memory card and is SDHC and SDXC compliant. The camera kit comes with a rechargeable EN-EL15 Li-ion battery, which is capable of taking an impressive 1,050 shots per charge.

Performance

 A user can mount a Nikon F mount with AF contacts lens on the D7000 camera. This Nikon camera uses Auto Focus with 39 focus points TTL phase detection and has range of -1 to +19 EV ISO 100. The Nikon D7000 uses the Nikon Multi-CAM 4800DX Auto Focus module. The camera supports Auto Focus modes such as Single-servo AF and Continuous servo AF. The ISO of the Nikon D7000 SLR ranges from ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of 1/3, 1/2, or 1 EV and additional ISO of 12800 Hi1 and ISO 25600 Hi2 can be attained. The Nikon D7000 SLR camera utilizes electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter and has a shutter speed range of 1/8000 to 30 sec, with an additional bulb support. The camera supports external flash such as SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, and SB-400. The inbuilt flash and external flash support i-TTL balanced fill-flash and standard i-TTL flash and has 2,016-pixel RGB sensor.

Features and Connectivity

 This Nikon SLR camera supports Full HD video shooting and it can record at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 at 24fps. It supports MOV and H.264 video formats, and NEF, NEF RAW + Fine JPEG, and JPEG image formats. Portrait, landscape, child, sports, close up, night portrait, night landscape, party/indoor, beach/snow, sunset, dusk/dawn, pet portrait, candlelight, blossom, autumn colors, food, silhouette, high key, and low key are the various scene modes supported by the camera. A user can also set up a self timer of 2, 5, 10, or 20 seconds and continuous shot can be taken at 6fps. The Nikon D7000 SLR camera supports USB 2.0 and HDMI Mini connector.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D7000 DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon D90 is one the first cameras to support HD recording. This camera is an advanced digital single lens reflex SLR camera and is powered by Nikon EXPEED processor. D90 has a 12.3 megapixel camera and a 23.6 x 15.8 mm Nikon DX format CMOS sensor.

Body

 The Nikon D90 DSLR camera weighs 620g and has a dimension of 132 x 103 x 77 mm. The camera utilizes Fixed eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder and has a 3-inch TFT screen with a resolution of 920,000 dot pixels. For storage, the D90 supports SD memory card and is SDHC compliant. The camera comes with a rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL3e, which can take up to 1000 shots per charge.

Performance

 This Nikon DSLR camera can supports Nikon F mount with AF coupling and AF contacts. The D90 has TTL phase detection system for Focus and uses Nikon's Multi-CAM 1000 Auto Focus Module. The camera offers 11-point Auto Focus AF with range of -1 to +19 EV ISO 100. It supports Single-servo AF and Continuous-servo AF modes. The ISO of the camera ranges from ISO 200 to 3,200, while the shutter speed ranges from 1/4000 to 30 sec. The camera also has a bulb mode to give more control on the shutter speed. Nikon D90 has an Auto pop-up Flash and i-TTL for various types of flash such as SB-900, 800, 600 or 400.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon D90 has scene modes like Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Close Up and Night Portrait. The camera also has Scene Recognition System and Face Detection, which can detect up to 10 faces. The self timer can be set at 2, 5, 10 or 20 seconds. This DSLR camera supports two types of continuous modes: Continuous Low 1 - 4 fps and Continuous High 4.5 fps. The Nikon D90 supports HD video and shoots at 720p. The camera supports AVI movie format and NEF, JPEG, NEF + JPEG image formats. In terms of connectivity, the camera supports USB 2.0 and HDMI.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D90 DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D3S is a 12.1 megapixel SLR camera. Powered by EXPEED image processor, this Nikon camera has FX format CMOS sensor with dimension of 36.0 x 23.9 mm. This SLR camera from Nikon supports aspect ratios of 5:4 and 3:2. This Magnesium Alloy camera has integrated dust reduction system, which prevents dust accumulation on the optical low-pass filter.

Body

 This Nikon SLR camera has dimension of 159.5 x 157 x 87.5 mm and weighs 1,240 g. The D3S has fixed eye-level Pentaprism. The 3-inch low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD has resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The display allows viewing angle of up to 170 degree. External memory can be added on this camera with the help of CompactFlash Card Type I. The rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL4a available in this digital SLR camera is capable of taking up to impressive 4200 shots.

Performance

 The Nikon F lens can be mounted on this SLR camera. The TTL phase detection Auto Focus has Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX Auto Focus module and 51 focus points. The D3S supports various focusing mode such as Single-servo AF, Continuous-servo AF and Manual focus. The sensitivity of the camera ranges from ISO 200 to 12,800 and can be further expanded up to HI-3 ISO 102,400.

The electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter has speed of 30 to 1/8000 sec with the help of bulb setting. This SLR camera can be mounted with an external Flash.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon D3S SLR camera has a Scene Recognition System, which automatically selects proper settings according to the surroundings. The camera has additional features like Exif Print support, GPS ready, Audio recording, In-camera movie editing, PictBridge support, and many more.

This Nikon camera is capable of shooting 720p HD videos at 24 fps. The camera supports video formats like MJPEG, AVI and image formats such as NEF, TIFF, and JPEG. A self timer can be set at 2, 5, 10 or 20 sec duration. This Nikon camera is capable of Continuous Shooting at up to 9 fps. In terms of connectivity, this camera supports USB 2.0 and HDMI output Type C.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3S DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

Performance
