productAttributes.productDescription:
12.3-megapixel CMOS imaging sensor

The Nikon D90 is an advanced digital single lens reflex SLR camera and is powered by Nikon EXPEED processor. The D90 has a 12.3 megapixel camera and a Nikon DX format CMOS sensor. This Nikon DSLR camera can supports Nikon F mount with AF coupling and AF contacts.

Continuous shooting as fast as 4.5 frames-per-second

This camera supports Continuous shooting at 4.5 frames-per-second for some high speed photography. The Nikon D90 DSLR camera weighs 620g and has a dimension of 132 x 103 x 77 mm, which gives it the convenience of being portable while taking these high speed shots.

Low noise ISO sensitivity from 200 to 3200

The camera offers 11-point Auto Focus AF with range of -1 to +19 EV ISO 100. It supports Single-servo AF and Continuous-servo AF modes. The ISO of the camera ranges from ISO 200 to 3,200, while the shutter speed ranges from 1/4000 to 30 sec.

Built-in image sensor cleaning

The camera is equipped with a powerful sensor that can capture amazing images. This sensor needs to be squeaky clean in order to be able to capture high resolution images. In order for it to accomplish this, the sensor has a built-in cleaning feature that makes sure it stays clean.

HD Recording

This camera is equipped with HD Video recording at 720 p resolution. Along with high definition video recording on the Nikon D90 you also get high quality sound recording.

3 inch super density 920,000-dot color LCD monitor and Other Features

This camera is also equipped with a high quality 3 inch super density 920,000-dot, LCD monitor that will allow you to preview your pictures soon after clicking them. This is also augmented by the One Button Live View function that lets you view the subject in the viewfinder screen of the LCD as and when you make adjustments to the picture settings. It also comes with the Nikon 3D Color Matrix Metering II with Scene Recognition System, Auto Active D-Lighting and GPS.

11 Point AF System

This camera is equipped with a 11 point AF system that can allow for some creative photography. In the Auto Focus feature, it is possible to individually focus on 11 independent points that allow you to get a decent depth of field in all your AF photos.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D90 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S 18-105 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
Ideal for entry level digital SLR users, the D5000 is the newest addition in the DX-format digital SLR family of Nikon. Powered by EXPEED image processing system, this SLR camera has an integrated Dust Reduction System. The camera has a 12.3 megapixel Nikon DX format CMOS image sensor, with the dimension of 23.6 x 15.8 mm. D5000 supports 3:2 aspect ratio and has Active D-Lighting feature for smooth tone reproduction.

Body

 The D5000 DSLR camera weighs 560 g and has dimension of 127 x 104 x 80 mm. The digital camera has Eye-level Penta-Dach mirror. The low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD has Vari-angle monitor, which can swing down 90 degrees and rotate 180 degrees. The display size is 2.7-inch and has resolution of 230,000 dot pixel. User can add external memory to this Nikon camera using the SD and SDHC memory card. The rechargeable EN-EL9a Li-ion battery can take up to 510 shots.

Performance

 This Nikon digital SLR camera has a zoom lens with the focal length of 18 mm - 55 mm and has Aperture range of F/3.5-5.6. The D5000 has optical zoom of 3x and can mount Nikon F lenses. The TTL phase detection Auto Focus uses Nikon Multi-CAM 1000 Auto Focus module and has 11 focusing points. Various focusing modes include Autofocus AF, Single-servo AF, Continuous servo AF, Auto AF-S/AF-C selection and Manual focus.

This Nikon camera has sensitivity ranging from ISO 200 to 3200 and can be further expanded up to ISO 6400 HI-1. This DSLR camera has a built-in pop-up Flash with Nikon's original i-TTL flash control and has range of 17 m.

Features and Connectivity

 The D5000 has 19 Scene Modes, which can automatically select the correct exposure, image processing, and many other such settings. The Scene Recognition System also helps in taking better quality pictures. Other additional features include Vibration Reduction, Aspherical lens, and Silent Wave Motor, in-camera red-eye removal, Histogram display, and LCD live view mode, etc.

This digital SLR camera is capable of shooting HD videos at resolution of 1280 x 720, 24 fps. The D5000 supports AVI movie format and NEF, and JPEG image format. The camera has Face recognition feature and Self timer of 2, 5, 10 or 20 sec duration. Continuous shot mode allows users to shoot at 4 fps. The connectivity options available in the Nikon D5000 include USB 2.0 and HDMI output.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5000 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D300S is a digital SLR camera and is powered by EXPEED image processor. This 12.3 megapixel camera uses Nikon DX format CMOS sensor with dimension of 23.6 x 15.8 mm. This Nikon camera can be attached with optional GPS Unit GP-1, which automatically updates information such as latitude, longitude, altitude and time on the images.

Body

 Weighing 840 g, this DSLR camera has dimension of 147 x 114 x 74 mm. The D300S camera has Fixed eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder. The 3-inch low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD has resolution of 921,000 dot pixels and allows up to 170 degree viewing angle. External memory can be added on this Nikon digital camera with the help of CompactFlash Card Type I, SD card and SDHC card. The rechargeable EN-EL3e Li-ion battery can take up to 950 shots per charge.

Performance

 The Nikon D300S has zoom lens with the focal length of 18 mm - 200 mm and Aperture of F/3.5 - 5.6. This digital camera can zoom up to 11.1x optically and can be manually adjusted. This Nikon SLR camera has TTL phase detection Auto Focus and has 51 focus points 15 cross-type sensors with the help of Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX Auto Focus module. The focusing modes in the camera include Autofocus AF, Single-servo AF, and Continuous-servo AF.

The sensitivity of the camera ranges from ISO 200 to 3200 and can be further expanded up to HI-1 ISO 6400. The Electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter has the speed of 30 to 1/8000 sec with the help of bulb. The pop-up built-in Flash has lens coverage of 16 mm and uses Nikon's original i-TTL Flash control.

Features and Connectivity

 The D300S features Scene Recognition System, which automatically detects the necessary settings in any situation and surrounding. This Nikon digital camera also has additional features such as in-camera movie editing, PictBridge support, in-camera red-eye fix, Active D-Lighting technology, Silent Wave Motor and many more. This DSLR camera is dust and water resistant and has Vibration Reduction image stabilization software.

This Nikon DSLR camera is capable of shooting 720p HD videos with resolution of 1280 x 720 at 24 fps. The camera supports AVI movie format, and NEF, TIFF, JPEG image format. User can also shoot in Continuous Shot mode at 7 fps. The electronically controlled self timer has time duration of 2, 5, 10, and 20 sec. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon D300S DSLR camera has Mini HDMI type-C and USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D300s DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D3X is a high end DSLR camera and is ideal for professional photographers. Powered by Nikon EXPEED image processor, this camera has extreme resolution 24.5 megapixel FX-format CMOS sensor, with dimension of 35.9 x 24.0 mm. The D3X supports 3:2 aspect ratio and has a durable magnesium-alloy construction, which protects camera from dust, moisture and electromagnetic interference. The camera can also be equipped with GPS Unit GP-1, which pulls in information of the surrounding through GPS.

Body

 This Nikon camera has dimension of 159.5 x 157 x 87.5 mm and weighs 1,220 g. The D3X has SLR-type fixed eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder. The 3-inch low-temperature polysilicon TFT LCD has a resolution of 920,000 dot pixel and allows up to 170 degree wide viewing angle. External memory can be added to this SLR camera using CompactFlash Card Type I/II and Microdrive. The rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL4a can take stunning 4400 pictures in one charge.

Performance

 User can mount Nikon F lens on this digital camera. The TTL phase detection Auto Focus gives up to 51 focus points with the help of Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX autofocus module. The Nikon D3X has various focusing modes such as Single-servo AF, Continuous-servo AF and Manual focus. The ISO sensitivity of this Nikon digital SLR camera ranges from ISO 100 - 1600 and can be further extended up to Hi-2 ISO 6400. The electronically controlled vertical-travel focal-plane shutter has speed of 1/8000 to 30 sec. External Flash can be added using the Hot Shoe.

Features and Connectivity

 The D3X DSLR camera supports Neutral, Monochrome, and Vivid special effects. The camera also has Scene Recognition System, which identifies the ideal settings according to the surrounding. This SLR camera also has additional features such as In-camera red-eye fix, Cropping an image, Histogram display, LCD live view mode, and PictBridge support.

The Nikon camera supports NEF, TIFF, and JPEG image formats. The electronically controlled Self timer can be set with duration of 2, 3, 10 or 20 sec. This DSLR camera can continuously shoot at up to 5 fps at full FX-format resolution. In terms of connectivity, the camera supports USB 2.0 and HDMI Type A connector.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3X DSLR Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Canon EOS 550D is the latest SLR in the consumer focused EOS camera series. This Canon camera sports a 18 megapixel optical sensor and is capable of shooting at a Full HD resolution 1920x1080. The camera uses a 22.3 x 14.9 mm CMOS sensor powered with a DIGIC 4 processor. The Canon EOS 550D uses the standard 3:2 aspect ratio and is a suitable buy for first time DSLR buyers or enthusiasts.

Body

The camera weighs approximately 475g and has dimension of 128.8 x 97.5 x 75.3 mm. This Canon DSLR has a 3-inch TFT colour liquid-crystal screen with 1,040,000 dot pixels. The LCD is dual anti-reflection and anti-smudge, and has up to 10x playback zoom. The Pentamirror Viewfinder covers 95 percent frame and offers 0.87x magnification. In terms of memory and battery, the Canon DSLR camera supports SD, SDHC and SDXC card and has Lithium-Ion LP-E8 rechargeable battery, which can take up to 440 shots.

Performance

The EOS 550D has a Canon EF / EF-S lens mount and has a focal length of 18 - 135 mm. This SLR camera has a 9 point Auto Focus system and Auto Focus ranges from -0.5 to 18 EV at 100 ISO. The ISO of this Canon SLR camera ranges from 100 to 6400 on an automatic mode and can be expanded up to an impressive 12,800 with a special ISO option. The camera has auto pop-up retractable built in flash and it also supports external flash with the help of Hot-Shoe. The EOS 550D has shutter speed of 30 - 1/4000 sec and the Aperture ranges from F1.0 - F91.

Features and Connectivity

 The EOS 550D supports various shooting mode and scene mode such as Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night portrait, Flash off, Movie, Program AE P, Shutter priority AE Tv, Aperture priority AE Av, Manual M, and Auto depth-of-field. A user can save the pictures in loss-less RAW Canon CR2 14 Bit and compressed JPEG format. Another unique feature of the camera is the Full HD recording at the resolution of 1920 X 1080, which can be shot at 24fps / 25fps / 30fps. Additional features of the Canon EOS 550D camera includes dust reduction, continuous shooting at 3.7fps, orientation sensor, mono microphone on front and rear, and USB 3.0 connectivity along with HDMI mini output.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 550D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-135 mm IS Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
D7000The Nikon is a 16.2 megapixel SLR camera and is powered by Nikon EXPEED 2 image processing technology mainly because it is designed to be used for professional photography with a little bit of in-depth knowledge in the art of photography. This DSLR camera has a Nikon DX format CMOS sensor.

Sensor Technology

The Nikon D7000 SLR comes with an extremely powerful 16.2 MP CMOS sensor that can be used to click high quality photographs under almost any lighting condition.

Image Processing Prowess

This camera is equipped with the latest EXPEED 2 image processor that helps in delivering quality images once clicked.

Speedy Shooting

It is also possible to shoot continuously at 6 frames per second in the high speed mode. This allows for a sequence of images to be shot without actually losing out on a moment.

Wide Sensitivity in terms of ISO

This camera is able to have an ISO range that goes from 100 to 6400 which can be used to click high quality images across a wide spectrum of lighting conditions. 

Metering Levels

This camera is equipped with the 2,016-pixel RGB metering sensor that can enable you to plan out and capture some of the best shots possible.

Auto Focus

This camera is equipped with the sensor that can assist in individual focusing. The customizable 39 point AF system allows for depth of field and selective sharpness that can result in some quality drama shots.

Movie Mode for High Quality Videos

The camera is capable of high quality movies thanks to the D-Movie function for high definition videos at 1080 p and at 24 frames per second.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D7000 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S 18-105 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L22 is a 12 megapixel point and shoot camera, and is powered by Nikon?s EXPEED digital image-processing concept. The Coolpix L22 has a 4:3 aspect ratio and user can also switch to 16:9 aspect ratio. This Nikon camera uses the 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and has Nikon's Electronic VR image stabilization and Motion Detection software.

Body

 The Coolpix L22 provides a good one hand grip. The camera weighs 183g and has dimension of 97.7 x 60.5 x 28.3 mm. This Nikon camera has a 3-inch TFT LCD screen with a 230,000 dot pixels resolution and supports Live View. The camera has an internal memory of 19 MB and additional memory can be added using a SD or a SDHC memory card. The Nikon Coolpix L22 is powered by two Alkaline AA batteries which can click up to 240 pictures. A user can also buy and use EN-MH2 and Lithium batteries which can click up to 420 and 660 shots, respectively.

Performance

 The Coolpix L22 lens has a focal length of 37-134mm 35mm equivalent and has a 3.6x Nikkor optical zoom lens, with up to 4x digital zoom. The camera has an Auto Focus option with normal focus range of 30 cm and macro focus range of 5 cm. The Coolpix L22 has an automatic ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 160 to 1,600. The camera features an inbuilt flash and has various flash modes such as Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Fill-in and Slow Syncro. The shutter speed ranges from 4 sec to 1/2000 sec, while the aperture ranges from F3.1 - F6.7.

Features and Connectivity

 This Nikon Coolpix camera has 16 scene modes to shoot in various settings. This Nikon camera also has face detection feature, along with shutter function where the camera clicks the picture only if subject is laughing and warns user if subject blinks. The Coolpix L22 supports JPEG format for images and AVI format for videos. It shoots video at a resolution of 640x480 at 30fps. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix L22 supports USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L22 Champagne Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L23 is an entry level compact digital camera. L23 is a 10.1 megapixel camera and is powered by EXPEED C2 Image Processing Engine. This Coolpix camera is equipped with a 5x optical zoom NIKKOR lens and has 28mm 35mm format equivalent focal length.

Body

 The Nikon L23 weighs 170g and has dimension of 96.7 x 59.9 x 29.3 mm. The camera features a 2.7-inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The Coolpix L23 has an internal memory of 22MB and supports external memory cards such as SD, SDHC and SDXC. The camera comes with LR6/L40 alkaline battery, which can take up to 250 pictures. A user can also use rechargeable Ni-MH Battery EN-MH2 and FR6/L91 lithium battery, which can click up to 250 pictures and 660 pictures, respectively.

Performance

 The Nikon Coolpix L23 can zoom up to 5x optically and 4x digitally. This camera has a Focus range of 30cm in normal mode and 3cm in macro mode. The camera has auto ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 80-1600. The internal Flash has various modes such as Auto, Auto with red-eye reduction, Flash Off, Fill flash and Slow sync.

Features and Connectivity

 Coolpix 23 features various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, and Panorama assist. The camera features three image stabilization options: electronic vibration reduction VR, motion detection and Best Shot Selector BSS to give good quality images. A user can setup self timer for 10 seconds and shoot in a continuous mode at 1.4 fps for up to 4 shots. The Nikon Coolpix L23 can record movie in VGA format at 30 fps. The camera supports AVI movie format and JPEG image format. In terms of connectivity, the camera uses USB cable.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L23 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L23 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L23 is an entry level compact digital camera. L23 is a 10.1 megapixel camera and is powered by EXPEED C2 Image Processing Engine. This Coolpix camera is equipped with a 5x optical zoom NIKKOR lens and has 28mm 35mm format equivalent focal length.

Body

 The Nikon L23 weighs 170g and has dimension of 96.7 x 59.9 x 29.3 mm. The camera features a 2.7-inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The Coolpix L23 has an internal memory of 22MB and supports external memory cards such as SD, SDHC and SDXC. The camera comes with LR6/L40 alkaline battery, which can take up to 250 pictures. A user can also use rechargeable Ni-MH Battery EN-MH2 and FR6/L91 lithium battery, which can click up to 250 pictures and 660 pictures, respectively.

Performance

 The Nikon Coolpix L23 can zoom up to 5x optically and 4x digitally. This camera has a Focus range of 30cm in normal mode and 3cm in macro mode. The camera has auto ISO sensitivity ranging from ISO 80-1600. The internal Flash has various modes such as Auto, Auto with red-eye reduction, Flash Off, Fill flash and Slow sync.

Features and Connectivity

 Coolpix 23 features various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, and Panorama assist. The camera features three image stabilization options: electronic vibration reduction VR, motion detection and Best Shot Selector BSS to give good quality images. A user can setup self timer for 10 seconds and shoot in a continuous mode at 1.4 fps for up to 4 shots. The Nikon Coolpix L23 can record movie in VGA format at 30 fps. The camera supports AVI movie format and JPEG image format. In terms of connectivity, the camera uses USB cable.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L23 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
Coolpix L24 is the latest compact digital camera in the lifestyle series of Nikon. Coolpix L24 is a 14 megapixel camera and has a CCD sensor with 6.18 x 4.55 mm dimension. It has aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The camera also has Electronic Vibration Reduction feature, which helps in countering camera shake.

Body

 Nikon L24 weighs 182g and has dimension of 96.7 x 60.5 x 28.3 mm. It has a 3-inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. This Nikon camera has internal memory of 17 MB and additional external memory can be added using SD memory card also SDHC/SDXC compliant. The camera kit consists of two LR6/L40 AA-size alkaline batteries, which are capable of taking 220 shots. The Coolpix L24 also supports EN-MH2 and lithium batteries, which can click up to 450 and 700 shots, respectively.

Performance

 The Coolpix L24 has optical zoom of 3.6x and digital zoom of 4x. The camera has Contrast detection Auto Focus with the range of 30 cm in Normal mode and 5 cm in Macro mode. This Nikon camera has Auto sensitivity feature, which ranges from ISO 80 - 1600. The shutter speed of the camera ranges from 1/2000 to 1 sec 4 sec in Fireworks Mode. The in-built Flash has range of 7 m and the Aperture ranges from F3.1 - F6.7.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon Coolpix has scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach/Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Copy, Backlight, and Panorama assist. The Face recognition feature in this camera detects up to 12 faces. The self-timer feature can be setup for 10 seconds duration. Coolpix L24 features shooting at 0.7 fps up to 3 shots in continuous mode. It also has BSS Best Shot Selector and Multi-shot 16 16 frames with a single burst capture modes. Coolpix L24 can record video at a resolution of 640 x 480 at 30fps. The camera supports AVI movie format and Compressed JPEG EXIF image format. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix L24 can connect to computer using USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L24 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix S2500 is a 12 megapixel compact digital camera. This Coolpix camera uses Nikon's EXPEED C2 Image Processing Engine and has a 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor. The S2500 has a 20 mm slim body, which makes it easier to carry around.

Body

 This Coolpix camera weighs 117 g with battery and memory card and has dimension of 93.1 x 57.1 x 20.0 mm. The 2.7-inch TFT LCD monitor in this Nikon camera has resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The S2500 comes with an internal memory of 16 MB and additional external memory can be added using SD, SDHC, or SDXC memory card. The camera kit comes with rechargeable Li-ion battery EN-EL19, which can take up to 220 shots per charge.

Performance

 The Nikon Coolpix S2500 uses the 4x zoom NIKKOR lens with focal length of 4.9 - 19.6 mm. The camera can zoom digitally and optically up to 4x. The Auto Focus of the camera has a range of 50 cm in Normal mode and 8 cm in Macro mode. The Auto ISO sensitivity of the S2500 ranges from ISO 80 - 1600 and Manual ISO ranges from ISO 80 - 3200. This Coolpix camera has Aperture range of f/3.2-5.9.

Features and Connectivity

 The Coolpix S2500 has Electronic VR and BSS Best Shot Selector image stabilization feature. The camera supports various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting and Panorama assist.

The Self timer function can be set at 2 or 10 sec duration. The camera can also shoot in Continuous mode at 0.9 fps for up to 3 shots. The Nikon Coolpix S2500 can shoot video in VGA 640 x 480 resolution and supports mono/wav file, AVI movie formats. The images are saved in Compressed JPEG - EXIF format. The S2500 compact digital camera supports Hi-speed USB.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S2500 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix L120 is a 14.1 megapixel camera and is powered by Nikon EXPEED C2 image processor. The L120 has a 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor. The camera supports aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The Coolpix L120 has 21x optical zoom NIKKOR lens, which has a focal length of up to super-telephoto 525 mm.

Body

 The L120 weighs 431 g with battery and memory card and has dimension of 109.9 x 76.5 x 78.4 mm. The Coolpix L120 has a 3-inch TFT LCD monitor with anti-reflection coating and has resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. Coolpix L120 has an internal memory of 102 MB and external memory can be added using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card. The AA size LR6/L40 batteries that come with the camera kit are capable of taking 330 pictures.

Performance

 The 21x optical zoom NIKKOR lens of the Nikon Coolpix L120 has focal range of 25 - 525 mm 35 mm equivalent. The lens can zoom optically up to 21x and digitally up to 4x. This Nikon camera has Contrast detection Auto focus and has a range of 50 cm in Normal mode and 1 cm in Macro mode. The Auto ISO of the camera ranges from ISO 80 - 800 and Manual ISO ranges from ISO 80 - 6400. Users can also use the Sports continuous mode, which has an ISO range of 400 - 3200.

The Mechanical and charge-coupled electronic shutter has the range of 1/1000 - 1 sec on Auto ISO mode. The built-in pop up Flash has a range of 0.5 to 6.0 m wide and 1.5 to 3.0 m tele. The Aperture of the Coolpix L120 is F3.1 - F5.8.

Feature and Connectivity

 The Nikon L120 camera has various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Panorama assist, and Pet Portrait. This Coolpix camera also features image stabilization software like BSS Best Shot Selector and a combination of Image Sensor shift and Electronic VR software.

User can setup a Self timer of 10 sec duration and Continuous shot can be taken at 0.7 fps for up to 19 shots. This Nikon L120 camera can shoot HD videos 1280 x 720 at 30 fps. The camera supports JPEG image format and MPEG-4 AVC H.264 movie format. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix L120 supports HDMI and USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L120 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix S2500 Silver

productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L120 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix P500 is a compact digital camera, with the feel and look of an SLR camera. This latest Nikon camera is powered by EXPEED C 2 dual image processor. P500 is a 12.1 megapixel camera and has a 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor. The Coolpix P500 has aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The 36x wide-angle optical Zoom Nikkor ED glass lens in this camera provides the longest zoom ever integrated in the Coolpix cameras.

Body

 The Nikon P500 weighs 494g with battery and memory card and has dimension of 115.5 x 83.7 x 102.5 mm. This Nikon compact digital camera comes with an Electronic Viewfinder. The 3-inch TFT LCD monitor comes with anti-reflection coating and has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The LCD can also be tilted 82 downward and 90 upward.

The P500 has internal memory of 102 MB and supports external memory cards such as SD, SDHC, SDXC. The camera comes with rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL5, which is capable of taking 220 pictures or record 1 h 20 min of 1080p videos in one charge.

Performance

 The 36x wide-angle optical Zoom Nikkor ED glass lens has focal length of 4.0 - 144.0 mm. The zoom lens provides digital zoom of 4x and optical zoom up to 36x. The Contrast Detection Auto Focus has range of 50 cm Normal and 10 cm Macro. In terms of sensitivity, the camera has Auto ISO of 160 - 1600, while Manual ISO ranges from 160 - 3200.

The Mechanical and CMOS electronic shutter has a speed of 1/1500 sec - 2 sec. The Nikon Coolpix P500 has a built-in pop up Flash with a range of 8 m. The Aperture of this Nikon camera ranges from F3.4 - F5.7.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon Coolpix P500 has various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Panorama and Pet portrait. It also has an Scene Auto Selector option. The P500 uses a combination of Image-sensor shift and Electronic VR for image stabilization.

This Coolpix camera allows users to set up a self timer of 2 or 10 sec duration. The P500 supports Continuous shooting at 8 fps for up to 5 shots. This Nikon camera supports recording at 1920 x 1080 Full HD at 30 fps. The camera supports mono/wav, MOV movie formats and Compressed JPEG - EXIF image format. The camera can shoot at Full HD and comes with a HDMI Mini Connector along with USB 2.0.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix P500 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix S9100 falls in the Style series digital compact camera category of Nikon. This Nikon camera is powered by EXPEED C2 image processor and has 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor. The Coolpix S9100 has backside illumination CMOS sensor, which enables capturing of images with less noise. This 12.1 megapixel Nikon camera has aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9.

Body

 The S9100 has weight of 214 g with battery and memory card, and dimension of 104.8 x 62.0 x 34.6 mm. The 3-inch TFT LCD monitor comes with anti-reflection coating and has resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. This Nikon camera has internal memory of 74 MB and external memory can be added with the help of SD, SDHC, and SDXC memory card. Nikon Coolpix S9100 uses rechargeable Nikon EN-EL12 1050 mAh battery, which is capable of taking 270 pictures or 1 hr 20 min of Full HD videos.

Performance

 The S9100 has NIKKOR ED glass lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 81 mm. The TTL contrast detection Auto Focus has range of 50 cm at Normal mode and 4 cm at Macro mode. The Auto ISO ranges from ISO 160-800 and Manual ISO ranges from ISO 160-3200.

The Nikon Coolpix S9100 has Mechanical and CMOS electronic shutter, which has a shutter speed of 1/2000-1 sec. The built-in pop-up Flash has a range of 0.5 to 4.0m wide and 1.5 to 2.5 m tele. The Aperture of this Coolpix camera ranges from F/3.5-5.9.

Features and Connectivity

 The S9100 has various scene modes such as Scene Auto Selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Panorama, and a new scene mode called as Pet portrait. This Nikon camera uses a combination of image sensor shift mechanism and Electronic VR for image stabilization.

The Nikon Coolpix S9100features Face recognition software, Best Shot Selector BSS, Motion Detection Technology, Subject tracking technology, and Blink Detection technology. A user can also set a 2 sec or a 10 sec self timer. In the Continuous Mode, this camera can shoot up to 5 shots at 9.5 fps H and up to 24 shots at 1.8 fps L . This Nikon camera can shoot Full HD videos at 1920 x 1080 resolution 30fps. The S9100 supports AAC Stereo and WAV audio file formats, JPEG image file format, and MPEG-4 AVC H.264 movie format. A user can connect USB 2.0 and HDMI cable to the camera.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon Coolpix S3100 is a 14 megapixel camera, which is powered by EXPEED C2 image processing technology. The camera has 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and aspect ratios of 4:3 and 16:9. The Coolpix S3100 is slimmer than its predecessors in the Coolpix series.

Body

 The S3100 weighs 118 g with battery and memory card. The camera has dimension of 93.5 x 57.5 x 18.4 mm. This Coolpix camera uses TFT LCD monitor with anti-reflection coating. The 2.7-inch display has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The camera comes with an internal memory of 45 MB, and additional memory can be added using the SD, SDHX, and SDHC memory card. The rechargeable Li-ion battery EN-EL19 is capable of taking 220 pictures or record up to 1hr 35 min of HD video in one charge.

Performance

 The Coolpix S3100 comes with a 5x optical Zoom NIKKOR glass lens, which has a focal length of 4.6 - 23.0mm. The camera can zoom digitally up to 4x and optically up to 5x. The TTL contrast detection Auto Focus has a range of 50cm at Normal mode and 10 cm at Macro mode. The sensitivity of this Nikon camera ranges from ISO 80-1600 on Auto and ISO 80-3200 on Manual. This Coolpix camera has Mechanical and Charge-coupled electronic shutter and has a shutter speed of 1/2000 sec - 4 sec. The built-in Flash has range of 0.5 to 4.5 m Wide and 0.5 to 2.2 m Tele. The Aperture ranges from F/3.2-6.5.

Features and Connectivity

 The Nikon S3100 has various scene modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Panorama assist, and a new scene mode called Pet portrait. This camera also has Electronic Vibration Reduction and Best Shot Selector image stabilization software. This Nikon camera is capable of recording HD videos at a resolution of 720p - 1280 x 720 30 fps. The S3100 supports Mono/wav file and AVI movie formats, while for images it supports Compressed JPEG - EXIF format. A user can set up a Self timer of 2 sec or 10 sec duration. In a Continuous mode, the camera can shoot at up to 3 pictures at 0.7 fps. In terms of connectivity, the Nikon Coolpix S3100 supports USB 2.0.

productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S3100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The P300 establishes a new branch of compact, wide-angle zoom model in the P-series line. It is equipped with an f/1.8 wide-angle zoom beginning at 24mm NIKKOR lens.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix P300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX S80 is a stylish compact digital camera with an extremely functional design, equipped with a widescreen 3.5-inch electrostatic OLED touch panel and a wide viewing angle.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S80 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: The COOLPIX S1000pj is the first compact digital camera in the world to feature a built-in projector. With a simple touch of a button, the camera projects your favorite photos or movies clips.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S1100PJ Point & Shoot Camera Violet

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 600D is an 18 megapixel SLR camera. Powered by 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor, the camera uses CMOS sensor with dimension of 22.3 x 14.9 mm. EOS 600D supports various aspect ratios like 3:2, 4:3, 16:9 and 1:1.

Body

 The EOS 600D weighs 570g and has dimension of 133.1 x 99.5 x 79.7 mm. A user can take pictures using the Pentamirror Viewfinder or a 3-inch clear view TFT display screen, which can be rotated according to the need. The LCD has a resolution of 1040K dot pixels and has dual anti-reflection and anti smudge coating. The camera supports SD card, SDHC card and SDXC card. The rechargeable Li-ion battery LP-E8 available with the kit can shoot up to 440 pictures in one charge.

Performance

 Canon EF and EF-S lens can be mounted on the EOS 600D. This camera has TTL-CT-SIR Focus and can support both auto and manual focus. It has 9 AF points system 1 central cross-type sensor, that helps in accurate focusing of the object. The Canon EOS 600D has various Focus modes such as AI Focus, One Shot, and AI Servo and has a Focus range from EV -0.5 -18 ISO100. The ISO of the camera ranges from ISO 100-6400 and can be further expanded to H approx 12800.

This Canon SLR camera has an Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter, which provides the shutter speed of 30 - 1/4000 sec, with the assistance of bulb. The EOS 600D has an inbuilt Auto pop-up E-TTL II auto flash with a range of up to 17mm focal length. External flash of E-TTL II auto flash with EX-series Speedlites can also be mounted on the camera.

Features and Connectivity

 The Canon EOS 600D has a Scene Intelligent Auto feature, which automatically selects the best scene for user. A user can also manually select various scene modes such as No Flash, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Movie, Program AE , Shutter priority AE, and Aperture priority AE.

The EOS 600D allows user to set up self time of 2 and 10 seconds. The camera also can shoot at continuous mode at 3.7 fps. This Canon camera can record at Full HD 1920x1080 resolution at 30, 25 and 24 fps. It supports H.264 movie format and JPEG and RAW image format.

The Canon EOS 600D has a special function called Movie Digital Zoom, which allows 3-10x magnification even while shooting Full HD movie. In terms of connectivity, the 600D supports USB and HDMI mini.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 600D DSLR Camera
Nikon Coolpix P500 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 7D is an advanced Digital SLR camera. This Canon DSLR camera is ideal for serious photographers and semi-professionals. The EOS 7D has an 18 megapixel APS-C size CMOS sensor with dimension of 22.3 x 14.9 mm. Powered with the Dual DIGIC 4 processor, this SLR camera has an aspect ratio of 3:2. This EOS camera has magnesium body and is dust and weather resistance. The Canon 7D also features an automatic and manual sensor cleaning technology.

Body

 The Canon EOS 7D DSLR camera weighs 820 g and has dimension of 148.2 x 110.7 x 73.5 mm. This Canon camera has a Optical Eye-level Pentaprism Viewfinder. The 3-inch TFT color, liquid-crystal monitor has resolution of 920,000 dot pixels. The EOS 7D camera supports CF card type I and II along with other UDMA-compliant CF cards. The camera has a unique feature of allowing users to record directly on an external USB Media through Wireless File Transmitter WFT-E5. This Canon DSLR camera has one LP-E6 battery pack, which can take up to 1000 pictures 23?C.

Performance

 A user can mount Canon EF lens on the EOS 7D camera. The DSLR camera has 19-point all cross-type Auto Focus, with dual cross sensor. This Canon camera has various Auto focus modes such as Auto, One-Shot AF, Predictive AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, along with Manual focusing MF. The sensitivity of the camera ranges from ISO 100-6400, which can be further extended up to 12,800.

The EOS 7D DSLR camera has vertical-travel, mechanical, electronically-controlled, focal-plane type of shutter, which has shutter speed of 1/8000 to 30 sec bulb. This DSLR camera has retractable auto pop-up Flash with range of 12 m.

Features and Connectivity

 The Canon EOS 7D has various special effect modes such as Portrait, Landscape, Faithful, Neutral and Monochrome. This DSLR camera has various additional features such a Digital noise reduction, Auto Lighting Optimizer, Histogram display, Automatic display brightness adjustment, Highlight point display, Camera orientation detection, and In-camera movie editing.

The Canon EOS 7D DSLR camera is capable of shooting Full HD 1920 x 1080 videos at 30/25/24 fps. The camera supports MOV H.264 movie format and JPEG, RAW, RAW + JPEG image formats. The EOS 7D has face recognition software and self-timer of 2 and 10 sec delay. A user can shoot in the continuous mode fast at 8 shots per second. The connectivity features of the Canon EOS 7D DSLR camera include USB 2.0 and HDMI mini out.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 7D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-135 mm IS II Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
The PL120 belongs to the PL series of Samsung point and shoot cameras. The 14.2 megapixel camera has a CCD sensor installed for clicking pictures with clarity. The digital camera has a 5X Zoom Lens with focal length of 4.7 - 23.5 mm and 26 - 130 mm in the 35 mm equivalent format. You can zoom your camera up to 5x optically to view the entire field or area instantly. This Samsung camera weighs 110 g and can easily fit in your bag or pocket during trips. You can also record High Definition videos using this digital camera at the resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels 30 fps.

The PL120 has made it a cakewalk for you to capture self-portraits as it has a dynamic dual display feature. Apart from the regular 2.7-inch Intelligent LCD with resolution of 230,000 dot pixels, this camera also has a 1.5-inch Front LCD with resolution of 61,000 dot pixels. You can easily preview the self-portraits and capture yourself with more clarity with the help of the Front LCD.

Battery, Storage and Connectivity

The Samsung PL120 has a rechargeable BP70A battery and an internal memory of 30 MB. You have the freedom to extend the storage space of your camera by using the SD and SDHC media cards. This Samsung compact camera can be easily connected to your PC or laptop with the high-speed USB to view or transfer pictures.

Performance

This point and shoot camera has TTL contrast detection Auto Focus with modes like normal, macro and auto-macro. The normal mode ranges between 80 cm Wide and 100 cm Tele, the macro mode between 5 - 80 cm Wide and100 - 150 cm Tele and the auto-macro mode between 5 cm Wide and 100 cm Tele.

You can capture pictures even in low-light situations as PL120 can automatically adjust its sensitivity between ISO 80 - 3200. This compact camera has a fill-in flash with a range of 0.2 - 3.4 m Wide and 1.0 - 1.9 m Tele.

Features

Scene modes such as Landscape, White, Natural Green, BlueSky, Sunset, Macro, Macro Text and many others are included in this point and shoot camera. The Smart Face Recognition technology automatically focuses on the subjects for clarity shots. The PL120 also includes technologies like Red-Eye Reduction, Motion Detection and Self-Timer with 2 - 10 seconds delay. The Front LCD installed in the camera will get turned on when the Self-Timer mode is selected.
productAttributes.title: Samsung PL120 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: The latest ST90 packs a lot of performance into an ultra-slim design. Measuring just over 16.5mm, the ST90 allows users to have the sleekest, most stylish compact camera around with 5 fascinating colors. It is slim enough to slip into a pocket, so you can take it with you wherever you go.The ST90 artfully combines a professional-grade still camera with a compact HD video camera. You get 720p HD quality video at 30 frames per second. Use the 5x zoom to get up close and vividly personal.
productAttributes.title: Samsung ST90 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung PL210 belongs to the PL series of point and shoot cameras from Samsung. This slim and feature packed digital camera is ideal for everyday use. The PL210 digital camera has a Samsung lens with a focal length of 4.85 - 48.5 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 27 - 270 mm.

With 10x optical zoom and 5x digital zoom of this Samsung digital camera, you can get clear and detailed images of distant subjects with ease. The PL210 has a CCD image sensor and you can take images at 14.2 megapixel resolution.

This slim body digital camera weighs 148 g and can be slipped into a small pocket or bag. The Samsung digital camera has buttons that are easy to access while shooting. With the Samsung PL210, you can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 30 fps. You can compose your images and preview them with the 3 inch TFT LCD screen which has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

This Samsung camera has an internal memory of 30 MB and can be expanded using SD or SDHC memory cards. This PL210 digital camera comes with a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. You can store your images and videos on a laptop or PC using the USB 2.0 high speed port.

Performance

The Samsung PL210 digital point and shoot camera has an aperture range of f/3.3 - 5.9. Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With this compact Samsung digital camera, you can focus in the range of 800 mm onwards Wide and 2000 mm to infinity Tele in Auto mode. In Macro mode, this focus range increases to 50 - 800 mm Wide and 1500 - 2000 mm Tele.

This slim PL210 camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200, letting you take defined and precise images even in the dark. In Auto mode, this Samsung digital camera has a shutter speed range of 8 - 1/2000 second, which helps in taking dramatic images of moving objects or pictures in low-light situations. You can also use the built-in flash to light up the darkest days, as it has a range of 300 - 3300 mm Wide and 500 - 1800 mm Tele.

Features

This Samsung digital camera has 27 scene modes like Text, Sunset, Beach, Snow and many more. Also available are a myriad set of filters that can be used to jazz up your pictures like Vignetting, Soft Focus and Palette effect. With the Palette effect, you can add extra color to your pictures to make them more special.

The Dual Image Stabilization of this Samsung digital camera combines optical and digital stabilization systems to ensure your images turn out sharp and well defined. You can make those close to you stand out in images with the Smart Face Recognition feature of the Samsung point and shoot camera, which adjusts the focus and exposure for up to 20 designated faces.

With the Blink Detection function of the Samsung PL210, you can always retake pictures in which a subject has blinked and ensure everyone is caught at their best in every image. With the Smile Detection feature, this compact PL210 digital camera releases the shutter automatically when it detects a smiling face within the frame. With the self-timer, you can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and always be with your loved ones in every image.
productAttributes.title: Samsung PL210 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: The Nikon COOLPIX S9100 is a high-performance model equipped with a slim new 18x zoom lens and a backside illumination CMOS sensor that effectively suppresses noise in photos.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9100 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription: The Nikon COOLPIX S9100 is a high-performance model equipped with a slim new 18x zoom lens and a backside illumination CMOS sensor that effectively suppresses noise in photos.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon Coolpix S8100 belongs to the Coolpix S series of point and shoot cameras. This digital camera uses CMOS sensor, which have a resolution of 12.1 megapixel. The NIKKOR ED glass lens of the Coolpix camera provides 10x optical zoom and has focal length of 5.4 mm - 54.0 mm. The 35 mm equivalent focal length of the camera is 30 mm - 300 mm.

This Nikon camera weighs 209 g including the battery and memory card and is handy to be carried anywhere. It has an appealing design with the black coated metal body which has a glossy finish. The Coolpix camera can record Full HD moviesat the resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels 30 fps. S8100 has a unique feature in which you can also take still images while recording an HD video. This point and shoot camera includes a creative slider, which allows the adjustment of brightness, saturation and color.

The S8100 is powered by Nikon EXPEED C2 image processor, which is customized to each COOLPIX model. The camera has a 3-inch TFT-LCD of resolution 921,000 dot pixels with a wide viewing angle and anti-reflection coating.

Battery and Storage

The rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 is the power source of the camera and can take 210 shots before discharging completely. The internal memory of this Coolpix camera is 102 MB. To increase the storage space of the camera, you have the freedom to opt for SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards.

Performance

This Nikon point and shoot camera has TTL contrast detection Auto Focus. The aperture of the camera ranges between f/3.5 - f/5.6. The sensitivity of the Coolpix camera can be automatically adjusted from ISO 160 - 3200 if you need to take pictures in low light situations.

The shutter speed of the camera ranges between 1/2000 - 2sec that provides you the freedom to capture the fast moving objects with clarity. The point and shoot camera has an in-built flash that ranges between 0.5 m - 4.0 m Wide and 0.5 m - 2.5 m Tele.

Features and Connectivity

Scene modes such as Sports, Portrait, Snow, Fireworks, Portrait and many more are included in the Nikon camera. This digital camera also includes the scene Auto Selector feature that automatically recognizes the shooting situation and adjusts the camera settings accordingly. The S8100 is preloaded with a series of automatic functions including Red-Eye Fix, Face-Priority Auto Focus, Blink Warning, Smile Timer and Skin Softening.

The S8100 also offers Optical VR Image Stabilization that minimizes the effects of camera shake and helps in getting clarity in pictures. You can also set a self timer before clicking the pictures with a delay of 2 - 10 seconds. You can easily connect your Nikon Coolpix S8100 camera to PC or laptop by using the USB. The HDMI mini connector Type C is also provided with the S8100 point and shoot camera. You can connect the camera conveniently to the HDTV, computer and laptop through the Audio Video Cable.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S8100 Gold

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 600D is an 18 megapixel SLR camera. Powered by 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor, the camera uses CMOS sensor with dimension of 22.3 x 14.9 mm. EOS 600D supports various aspect ratios like 3:2, 4:3, 16:9 and 1:1.

Body

 The EOS 600D weighs 570g and has dimension of 133.1 x 99.5 x 79.7 mm. A user can take pictures using the Pentamirror Viewfinder or a 3-inch clear view TFT display screen. The LCD has a resolution of 1040K dot pixels and has dual anti-reflection and anti smudge coating. The camera supports SD card, SDHC card and SDXC card. The rechargeable Li-ion battery LP-E8 available with the kit can shoot up to 440 pictures in one charge.

Performance

 Canon EF and EF-S lens can be mounted on the EOS 600D. This camera has TTL-CT-SIR Focus and can support both auto and manual focus. It has 9 AF points system 1 central cross-type sensor, that helps in accurate focusing of the object. The Canon EOS 600D has various Focus modes such as AI Focus, One Shot, and AI Servo and has a Focus range from EV -0.5 -18 ISO100. The ISO of the camera ranges from ISO 100-6400 and can be further expanded to H approx 12800.

This Canon SLR camera has an Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter, which provides the shutter speed of 30 - 1/4000 sec, with the assistance of bulb. The EOS 600D has an inbuilt Auto pop-up E-TTL II auto flash with a range of up to 17mm focal length. External flash of E-TTL II auto flash with EX-series Speedlites can also be mounted on the camera.

Features and Connectivity

 The Canon EOS 600D has a Scene Intelligent Auto feature, which automatically selects the best scene for user. A user can also manually select various scene modes such as No Flash, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Movie, Program AE , Shutter priority AE, and Aperture priority AE.

The EOS 600D allows user to set up self time of 2 and 10 seconds. The camera also can shoot at continuous mode at 3.7 fps. This Canon camera can record at Full HD 1920x1800 resolution at 30, 25 and 24 fps. It supports H.264 movie format and JPEG and RAW image format.

The Canon EOS 600D has a special function called Movie Digital Zoom, which allows 3-10x magnification even while shooting Full HD movie. In terms of connectivity, the 600D supports USB and HDMI mini.

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 600D is a great DSLR camera that beginners and intermediates can use. Powered by 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor, the camera uses CMOS sensor with dimension of 22.3 x 14.9 mm. EOS 600D supports various aspect ratios like 3:2, 4:3, 16:9 and 1:1.

Sensor Technology

The camera sports a highly efficient and capable 18 MP sensor that comes with the APS-C Size. This translates to better photos due to the larger image sensor size. This also allows you to take different scenes that range from beautiful landscapes to even portrait images and close up shots. The 18 MP resolution that you get means that the images clicked with it can still be blown up to a decent size while retaining the clarity and detail.

LCD Monitor

The 3 inch wide Vari-Angle Clear View monitor is perfect for viewing your images after you have clicked them. The high quality monitor is handy for those pictures that you need to examine in greater detail when you do not have access to a computer immediately. The flexibility of the monitor is also such that you can use the monitor as a viewfinder for taking images from difficult angles. The camera is also capable of taking high quality HD videos in 24, 25 and 30 fps.

Scene Intelligent Auto Mode

One of the latest innovations from Canon is the Scene Intelligent Auto Mode in the camera. This mode is great for scenes that need to be photographed quickly without having the time to select the right set of settings manually to create a beautiful photo. The Auto Mode analyses all the elements of the scene before it and chooses the right set of settings to create a beautiful picture. This also means that you do not have to worry too much about manually setting it. There is also a Basic+ mode as well as a feature guide where you can learn in detail what each major feature of the camera does.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 600D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-135 mm IS II Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
DSLR cameras are always preferred over others as they are much more capable in terms of pure photography and can also be more flexible in the quality of photos taken. The Canon EOS 600D is an advanced entry level DSLR that is extremely user friendly.

Sensor Quality

This camera is equipped with a powerful CMOS sensor with an 18 MP APS-C size. This translates to better photos and enhanced light capturing. This is augmented by the electronically controlled focal plane shutter that allows for accurate image capture.

Auto Mode

There will be many photographers who just got into the hobby to learn and get better. For them, the Scene Intelligent Auto mode will help in getting a hang of the workings of the camera. The shutter speed, focal length and exposure are all values that have been taken care of with the auto mode, and this allows the user to purely concentrate on the art of photography in terms of image angles and framing.

HD Recording

With the Canon EOS 600D, you can also undertake some HD Video recording at varying frames per second. This is possible mainly in three settings, one is at 24 fps, the other at 25 fps and finally, you can even take HD videos at 30 fps.

Feature Guide

The Canon EOS camera is packed with features that can at times, overwhelm new users. This is the main reason for the Basic + mode and also the feature guide that is present at the click of a button. These modes when used judiciously allow you to easily and efficiently pick up the simple basics of photography faster and take great photos.

Viewing Mode

A DSLR usually translates into better photography, though not all the time. If you cannot get that perfect angle or the right elevation for assisting in the perfect angle, then your photos will be far from great. This is why the camera is equipped with a three inch LCD monitor that can be swiveled along various angles until you get a clear shot of the subject no matter where or how you stand.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 600D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-55 mm IS II Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
Intelligent and compact, this digital camera's aesthetically appealing design is bound to catch your eye. Built for all ages, this J series point and shoot camera has an easy-to-operate user interface. The Fujifilm camera's wide focal length of 5.7 - 17.1 mm, translates to a 35 mm equivalent of 32 - 96 mm. The Fujinon 3x optical zoom lens along with 6.7x digital zoom takes you closer to subjects for those detailed shots. The powerful CCD image sensor of this Fujifilm FinePix JV200 takes stunning images at 14 megapixels.

Slender and handy, this FinePix digital camera has an ergonomically designed body with rounded edges for a better grip. At a mere 125 g, this Fujifilm product is pocket-friendly. The back panel of this camera is clutter-free with an all essential 5-way multi-function key.

You can click images and record video by composing them on a 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixel. You can also shoot HD videos 30 fps to capture rare moments with the Fujifilm FinePix JV200.

Battery and Storage

The Fujifilm FinePix JV200 runs on rechargeable Li-Ion battery pack, which lets you shoot 180 images when fully charged. This FinePix camera supports SD or SDHC memory cards for image and video storage. You can retrieve your captures by connecting the JV200 to a computer or laptop via high speed USB 2.0 port.

Performance

The aperture of a camera regulates the amount of light reaching the sensor. This Fujifilm FinePix has an aperture range of f/2.6 - 6.2. The shutter speed, on the other hand, is the amount of time light is allowed to fall on the camera's image sensor. The shutter speed ranges from 1/4 - 1/1400 seconds in Auto mode, which can be extended to 8 - 1/1400 seconds in other modes. The light sensitivity range of this Fujifilm point and shoot camera ranges from ISO 100 - 3200.

This Fujifilm FinePix camera automatically focuses every frame for a crystal clear output. In Normal mode, the JV200 camera auto focuses from 45 cm Wide and 80 cm Tele onwards; while in Macro mode the auto focus ranges from 5 cm - 80 cm Wide and 50 cm - 1 m Tele.

This FinePix camera has a powerful built-in flash, with a range of 45 cm - 3 m Wide and 80 cm - 2 m Tele in Normal mode. You can compensate for dim light in Macro mode as the flash has a range of 30 - 80 cm Wide and 50 cm - 1 m Tele.

Features

 You can dabble with several fun scene modes like Baby, Motion Panorama, Party, Beach, Fireworks, Sports and others. In the Motion Panorama scene mode, the camera automatically stitches three consecutive images to give you a well-aligned panoramic image. You can also rest assured as this Fujifilm camera corrects blurry images with its digital image stabilizer.

This camera also has Smile and Shoot mode which triggers the shutter release only when a smile is detected. The FinePix camera also has a Blink Detection feature which alerts you when your subjects blink and gives you an option to retake the image.

You can wave goodbye to unclear faces as the Face Detection function identifies up to 10 faces in a single frame and optimizes settings accordingly. You can join your friends in group photos as well by setting the self-timer to a 2 or 10 second delay.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix JV200 Point & Shoot Camera Black
