productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nikon D5100, is a member of the popular series meant for the entry level enthusiastic photographer. You can not only take great pictures with it, but you can also record videos in Full-HD mode at 1920 x 1080 p.

Horizontal Swing

The Nikon D5100 is equipped with a variety of features that can help during photography sessions spanning a range of conditions and situations. Functions like the Horizontal Swing mode add a level of flexibility to the abilities of a photographer.

Swivel that Monitor

The viewing screen of the camera is designed in such a manner that it allows for a variable angle of swing. This gives you ample opportunities to take pictures no matter how and where the subject is located.

Special Effects Mode

Photography is all about creativity and self expression, which is a fact as seen by the images that get captured by passionate lensmen. The Nikon camera can also augment the pictures with a host of special effects that can be configured on it through the special effects mode. Some of these effects can be, Selective Color, Color Sketch and also the Miniature Effect.

High Speed Shooting

When you come across that perfect shot, there are instances where you know instinctively that one picture just won’t cut it. Use the camera’s High Speed Continuous Shooting mode to capture the whole series of events in high quality details.

Silent Shutter

This camera by Nikon is also equipped with a revolutionary new Silent Shutter mechanism that greatly reduces the sound made by the mechanical shutter commonly used by DSLR cameras. The lack of loud sounds associated with the shutter release will allow for better photography thanks to less distractions and miniscule vibrations caused by the excess noise, as sound after all, is derived from vibrations.

Sensor Technology

This Nikon camera is equipped with a high quality DX format CMOS image processing Sensor that is capable of taking high quality images thanks to the camera’s excellent lenses. The CMOS image sensor is also more advanced than previous forms of sensors used by Nikon as it allows for greater details and colour reproductions.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5100 DSLR Camera Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription: Small in size, big on features. The ultra-compact DCR-SX45E features 3.07.6cm touch panel LCD, as well as a Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens. With powerful 60x optical zoom that lets you capture extremely tight shots, even from far away.
productAttributes.title: Sony DCR-SX45E Camcorder Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The sleek and compact Fujifilm FinePix T200 is perfect for those who want a camera they can carry anywhere they go. The first model in the Fujifilm T Series, the FinePix T200 digital camera is ideal for travellers and incredibly social people.

The FinePix T200 digital camera comes with a focal length of 5 - 50 mm and 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 280 mm. An optical zoom of 10x and a digital zoom of 6.7x takes you closer to the subject. Equipped with a CCD image sensor and a resolution of 14 megapixels, the FinePix Camera offers wonderful crystal clear images.

The smooth and glossy texture is comfortable to hold and carry. The curved edges and contoured shape of the camera give it a bold finish. The FujiFilm T200 weighs only 151 g and will easily fit into your pocket or handbag.

The 2.7 inch TFT Colour LCD monitor has a resolution of 230,000 dots, delivering outstanding image clarity. The display sits in perfectly with all the buttons and an 8-way mode dial positioned ergonomically on the right side of the screen.

The FinePix T200 digital camera comes with a Fujinon lens which delivers sharp and crisp images just as they appear in real life. This Fujifilm T200 camera captures images and videos in HD with resolution of 4288 x 2416 pixels for images and 1280 x 720 pixels for videos. With the capability of capturing HD videos, you can now experience the impact of full-screen HDTV image display in the aspect ratio of 16:9.

Battery and Storage

 All your images and videos can be stored in an SD or SDHC memory card supported by the Fujifilm T200. The USB 2.0 connectivity allows you to transfer data to your laptop or PC with ease. Powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, the T200 digital camera can take up to 180 images on Auto Mode when fully charged.

Performance

The FinePix digital camera has shutter speed ranging from 1/2 - 1/2000 seconds in Auto Mode and 8 - 1/2000 seconds in all other modes which helps in shooting pictures in low light situations and also while the subject is in motion.

The FinePix T200 camera has aperture range of f/3.4 - 5.6. This digital camera offers TTL Through The Lens Auto Focus system with a focus range starting from 450 mm Tele and 2000 mm Wide. In Macro Mode, the camera auto focuses from 50 mm Wide and 900 mm Tele onwards. This Fujifilm digital camera comes with automatic ISO settings ranging from ISO 100 - 3200.

The Fujifilm T200 has a built-in flash with varying modes which helps in shooting a clear photograph even in low-lighting. The flash unit covers a range of 500 - 2600 mm Wide and 900 - 1700 mm Tele.

Features

 The FinePix digital camera offers an assortment of shooting modes to experiment with. These special shooting modes include Panorama, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Party and much more. One of the outstanding features is the High Sensitivity sensor shift image stabilizer. This Dual Image Stabilization works wonders by eliminating blurred images. This is achieved by freezing and minimizing blurs even at maximum zoom range.

The T200 also offers Face Recognition technology which gives an added advantage of automatically recognising faces. Up to 8 people can be registered in this camera and next time you take a photo of them it will bring up their name and automatically optimise the settings for your convenience.

The Blink Detection technology warns you when the subject has blinked, allowing you to retake the photo. The Smile and Shoot mode automatically shoots the picture when the subject smiles, making sure you do not miss that special moment as it happens.

The Continuous Shooting mode, when activated, shoots at the rate of 1.2 frames per second. This mode proves very useful when you are shooting pictures of a baby taking his or her first steps or an athlete performing a long jump. Self-timer in the Fujifilm T200 has a delay of 10 - 2 seconds. Loaded with a hoard of convenience features, the Fujifilm FinePix T200 digital camera is your one-stop solution for an efficient and portable digital camera.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix T200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Fujifilm X100 is tailor-made for the keen and classy photographer. With a fixed focal length of 23 mm, the Fujinon lens with Super EBC coating clicks stunning images at 12.3 megapixels. This digital camera has a CMOS sensor that promises high-performance.

At 445 g, this Fujifilm point and shoot digital camera is compact and sleek. Designed to resemble the yesteryears classic camera, the X100 has neatly placed buttons and knobs for easy accessibility. The magnesium alloy top and base-plate casting makes this digital camera sturdy, while its leather look and feel adds an old school charm.

Letting you record those prized fleeting moments, Fujifilm X100 record HD videos at 1280 x 720 resolution 24 fps. Another noteworthy feature of the X100 is its hybrid viewfinder. The Fujifilm X100 digital camera lets you switch between a sharp optical viewfinder OVF and an ultra-fine electronic viewfinder EVF with a simple one touch control. The camera also gives you detailed shooting information on both, optical and electronic viewfinders.

This Fujifilm X100 has an EXR Processor, which gives you a vibrant range of image quality at 16:9 aspect ratio. This point and shoot camera is equipped with a 2.8 inch color LCD with resolution of 460,000 dot pixel for comfortable Live View shooting and easy image reviewing.

Battery and Storage

Fujifilm X100 digital camera supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards on which you can store pictures and videos. This point and shoot digital camera also has built-in memory of 20 MB. The X100 comes with a rechargeable Li-Ion NP-95 battery which shoots up to 300 images when fully charged.

Make more storage space on your camera for newer captures by transferring your pictures and video to a computer or laptop via the high speed USB 2.0. The Fujifilm X100 is HDMI compatible, with which you can view the images and pictures you shot on an HDTV.

Performance

The powerful Fujifilm X100 has an aperture range of f/2 - 16 and a shutter speed range of 1/4000 - 30 sec. The wide range of aperture and shutter speed helps you compose pictures in Manual mode. Get sharper and focused images with the X100. The auto focus of this Fujifilm point and shoot camera ranges from 80 cm in Normal mode and 10 cm onwards in Macro mode.

The ISO sensitivity of the camera ranges from ISO 100 - 6400. This light sensitivity can be extended to ISO 100 and 12800 equivalent to suit light situations. This Fujifilm digital camera has a built-in flash with a range of 50 cm - 9 m at ISO 1600. If you need more light support, the hot shoe facility lets you attach an external flash.

Features

You can also make a difference in your clicks by playing with Fujifilm X100 camera's scene modes. Choose from modes like Candlelight, Children, Bright, Film Simulation, Fireworks, Night Portrait, Night Landscape and many more. The Film Simulation mode that lets you choose from effects like Velvia vivid, PROVIA standard and ASTIA soft, making each shot look distinct.

The X100 point and shoot camera comes with a self-timer which can delay the shutter release for 2 or 12 seconds. Choose a Continuous Mode with 5 or 3 frames per second to make sure you don't miss a moment.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix X100 Mirrorless Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: World's Smallest Zoom Camera: The Samsung ST30 has the incredibly small size with 82.0x51.9x16.9mm. This wonderful camera is the world's smallest zoom camera that make possible to carry it with you whenever and wherever. Additionally, the design of ST30 is so cute and lovely, it can be a part of your fashion items in everday life. The Samsung ST30 that has the smallest size and trendy design will make you stand out of the crowd wherever you go. The Samsung ST30 is light and portable yet durable with an aluminium cover. The aluminium metal exterior enhances durability and protects the camera from outside forces. The ST30 boasts stylish and luxurious design in your choice of five fascinating different colors.
productAttributes.title: Samsung ST30 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: The samsung ES80 delivers true-to-life Color and detail with its ultra wide lens and 5x zoom. The Samsung ES80 delivers true-to-life Color and detail with its ultra wide lens and 5x zoom. Once you have taken the photo, thats when you can start being creative with the editing tools. The Perfect Portrait system allows for you to create visual effects while also removing unwanted blemishes giving your pictures that professional look. And with VGA quality video recording capabilities, you can really capture all of lifes precious moments.
productAttributes.title: Samsung ES80 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
This trendy camera by Fujifilm will make photography detailed and easy with its megazoom features. The Fujifilm F500EXR belongs to the FinePix F series of point and shoot cameras. This stylish digital camera is ideal for the fashion conscious party goer. The FinePix digital camera sports a Fujinon lens with a focal length of 4.4 - 66 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 360 mm.

The EXR CMOS image sensor of this Fujifilm FinePix camera lets you take images at 16 megapixel resolution. You can take images in dramatic detail with the 15x optical zoom and 5x digital zoom of this FinePix point and shoot digital camera, which when combined, offer you up to 75x zoom.

This slim digital camera by Fujifilm weighs 215 g and sports a sleek body designed to give you a comfortable experience when you use it. The modes are ergonomically placed on a slant rotary dial on the top panel, while the control buttons are on a familiar 5-way button on the back panel. The one-touch video recording and preview buttons on the back panel make photography very easy. You can shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and chronicle every moment in crystal clear clarity.

The EXR processor by Fujifilm boosts performance and speed of shooting and delivers enhanced image quality. Your images can be enjoyed in 4:3, 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels and can be used to preview and compose your images just the way you like them.

Battery and Storage

The images that you take can be stored in the 20 MB internal memory of this Fujifilm digital camera. They can also be stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. You can use the USB 2.0 high speed port to transfer photos from your camera to a computer or laptop, to open up more space for all your photographs. The HDMI mini connector lets you connect the FinePix F500EXR to an HDTV to enjoy your images on a large screen. You can take up to 300 images with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery of this Fujifilm FinePix digital camera.

Performance

The FinePix point and shoot camera has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.3. Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Auto Focus of this digital camera has a range of 45 cm to infinity Wide and 2.5 m onwards Tele on normal mode. In Macro mode, this range increases to 5 cm - 3 m Wide and 1.2 - 3 m Tele, letting you experiment with close up shots.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of a camera. The Fujifilm F500EXR has a light sensitivity with a range of ISO 100 - 12800. The Fujifilm F500EXR has a shutter speed range of 1/4 - 1/2000 second on Auto mode that can be decreased to a range of 8 - 1/2000 second in all other modes. This variable shutter speed can be used to take images of moving subjects. You can also use the built-in flash, which has a range of 15 cm - 3.2 m Wide and 90 cm - 1.9 m Tele, to light up events in the evening for sharp images.

Features

The Fujifilm FinePix F500EXR has 18 scene modes like Party, Flower, Beach, Snow and more. In the Pet mode, the FinePix camera optimizes focus and exposure for your pet and automatically releases the shutter when your dog or cat is looking directly at the camera.

With the Face Recognition feature, you can register up to 8 faces in your camera, who will be automatically recognized when you take a picture of them next. The Fujifilm FinePix will bring up their name and optimize focus settings in their favor, keeping them in sharp focus always. With the self-timer feature, you can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and never miss out on being in a picture again. In Continuous Shooting mode, you can take images at 3 frames per second.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix F500EXR Point & Shoot Camera Black
Casio Exilim EX-ZS5 Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Canon EOS 1100D is an advanced and affordable camera that encourages DSLR beginners with its user friendly interface. The camera is also quite robust with a 0.1 Sec start time.

Sensor Technology

The high performing DIGIC 4 image processor allows you to freeze fast paced action and take remarkable images at 12.2 megapixels. This CMOS sensor is well suited for high speed photography as well as relatively high performances across low light conditions.

Superior Low Light Shots

The camera is equipped with a great lens-sensor arrangement that allows you to take pictures across a wide spectrum of lighting conditions. This is also seen in the low light performance of the camera. Dimly lit subjects can be captured with minimum image noise and without resorting to the flash by changing ISO, bulb and shutter speed settings. The settings within the camera can be used to optimize the lighting levels around the subject in focus.

Amazing HD Quality Videos

The Canon EOS 1100D has a great feature of recording videos in HD at 720 p resolution at 25 and 30 frames per second. The Canon EOS 1100D lets you experiment with several lenses as it is compatible with all EF and EF-S lenses. The focal length range of the 1100D SLR is 18 - 55 mm, while the aperture ranges from f/3.5 - 5.5.

Creative Modes and 9 Point Auto Focus system

This camera is also incorporated with the Basic+ and Creative Auto Mode. Both these modes allow you to experiment with photography and the shutter speed. This DSLR camera has a fast and accurate 9 point auto focus system, thus giving you sharp images every time. The 9 Point system allows for more creativity as it lets you experiment with photography. The camera also comes with the 63 - zone iFCL exposure metering.

Continuous Shooting Mode and Other Features

In Continuous Shooting Mode, the camera shoots at 3 frames per second making sure you never miss a moment. The images you shoot get saved in RAW or JPEG format whereas your videos are in MOV format. The Canon DSLR has an anti-static coating on the sensor which helps increase the durability of the camera. The camera also corrects blurriness with an image stabilizing feature.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 1100D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-55 mm IS II Lens

offers.title: Exclusively for you:- Rs100 EXTRA OFF on shopping for 2 or more units from seller WS Retail on select products only. Valid till 26th Jan 2015. See final price at cart.

productAttributes.productDescription:
The EOS 7D by Canon combines versatility, performance and cinematic HD movies all in one amazing ergonomically designed package.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with the latest in APS-C CMOS sensors with 18 MP. This is a great sensor for some high quality photography even under low light conditions.

Continuous Shooting

The camera by Canon is equipped with a Continuous Shooting Mode where in you can shoot high speed images at a rate of 4.5 FPS which allows you to shoot multiple images in high quality along a short span of time.

ISO Sensitivity

The ISO settings are usually tweaked when the lighting varies along the brightness scale. When you are shooting under bright conditions, you generally need to set a low ISO setting of around 100 though this needs to be increased as the lighting dims. This camera can range between ISO 100 to 6400.

Wide Area AF

This camera is able to focus along 19 points when in the auto focus mode and can also be used for manual focusing along these points. The 19 point wide area focusing will allow you to focus on individual areas of an object that will let you get some nice perspective based and depth of field shots.

iFCL Metering and Intelligent Viewfinder

The new system stands for Focus Color Luminance metering system that is very helpful in getting the right luminance levels for varying color shades across subjects that are in focus. This also lets you pick out the right settings based on the readings displayed so that all your photos may be reproduced with the closest resemblance to the original subject that is photographed. This is also possible thanks to the Intelligent Viewfinder that comes with the Canon Camera. This display can show a set of read-outs that can accurately help in correcting your image settings before you go ahead and click the final image.

Stunning Full HD Videos

With the Canon EOS 7D, you can take photos in Full HD at a resolution of 1080 p which translates into high quality and highly detailed videos that can accurately capture all your favorite moments in a digital format.

Other Important Features

This camera is also equipped with Dual DIGIC 4 processors that allow you to take high quality images that get rendered accurately thanks to the processing engine. You can also easily view all your images with the Clear View II LCD. The camera also comes with an Integrated Speedlite Transmitter.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 7D DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription: This sleek compact digital camera is tough enough to take on any wild adventure that you can imagine. The Lumix DMC-FT2 is waterproof to a depth of 10 metres, freeze-proof to -10, shockproof for falls up to 2 metres, and dust-proof. The FT2 delivers exceptional picture quality in extreme conditions and even records high-quality movies, so every action-packed memory can be captured in exquisite detail.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FT2 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription: HDC-SDT750 comes with a 3D conversion lens that records right-eye and left-eye images simultaneously through its two lenses. The right/left images each with 960 x 1080 pixels that enter through the lenses are recorded using the side-by-side method. By attaching the lens, and connecting it to a TV that is capable of side-by-side method 3D playback, vividly colorful 3D images can be viewed at home. A TV that is capable of side-by-side method 3D playback, 3D Eyewear, and HDMI cable connection are required.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic SDT750 Camcorder Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Fujifilm S3300 belongs to the FinePix S series of digital cameras. This compact camera uses a CCD sensor that captures pictures in 14 megapixel resolution. The focal length of the camera is 4.3 mm - 111.8 mm, while the focal length in the 35 mm equivalent format is 24 - 624 mm. This Fujifilm camera can zoom up to 26x optically and 6.7x digitally.

The camera weighs 540 g including accessories, batteries and memory card. The S3300 camera is capable of recording movies at an HD resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels 30 fps with monoaural sound.

This point and shoot camera supports various aspect ratios such as 4:3, 3:3 and 16:9. S3300 also includes an electronic viewfinder to help you focus easily without glare and reflection problems. The 3-inch TFT color LCD monitor has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

The Fujifilm S3300 comes with 4 x AA alkaline batteries that can take 300 photos before discharging completely. You may also opt for 4 x AA Ni-MH rechargeable batteries and 4 x AA lithium batteries, which can take 500 and 700 photos, respectively. You can increase the storage capacity of the camera by using SD and SDHC memory cards.

Performance

This Fujifilm camera has TTL contrast detection Auto Focus. The Aperture range of this point and shoot camera is f3.1 - f5.9. The camera can automatically adjust its sensitivity between ISO 64 - 6400. Higher ISO sensitivity allow you to click pictures even in low light conditions.

The shutter speed of the digital camera ranges between 1/4 sec to 1/2000 sec in the auto mode and 8 sec to 1/2000 sec in manual mode. The wide range of shutter speed allows you to capture the fast moving objects with clarity. The Point and Shoot camera has an auto flash that ranges from 0.4 m - 7.0 m Wide and 2.5 m - 3.6 m Tele.

Features and Connectivity

The digital camera includes shooting modes such as Natural Light Flash, Natural Light, Portrait, Baby, Smile, Landscape and many others. The camera comes loaded with the CCD - shift type digital image stabilizer to reduce the blur in pictures.

Technologies like Face Detection, Auto red-eye removal and blink detection are also preloaded in this Fujifilm camera to help you click photos at ease. The self-timer mode in the S3300 camera provides the delay range of 2 - 10 seconds in clicking pictures.

The Fujifilm S3300 can be connected easily to your PC or laptop by using the high speed USB 2.0. The camera also features the HDMI Mini connector that lets you view HD pictures on HDTV, PC, laptop or any other HD device.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix S3300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
A unique camera that is rugged, fashionable and feature-packed is hard to find. This amalgamation, built under Panasonic's Tough series of point and shoots cameras, certainly fits the bill. The Panasonic DMC-FT2 is tailor-made for outdoorsy folks, who love capturing images and videos their active lifestyle for posterity.

This digital camera has a LEICA DC VARIO ELMAR lens with a wide angle focal length of 4.9 - 22.8 mm, which translates to an equivalent of 28 - 129 mm in a 35 mm camera. You can take close up images of distant objects with 4.6x optical zoom as well as combine with an additional 4x digit zoom. The CCD image sensor of the Panasonic DMC-FT2 lets you take striking images at 14.1 megapixels.

Sturdy and trendy, the Lumix DMC-FT2 has a clutter-free back panel that houses a mode dial, a 5-way multifunction key and a dedicated video recording button. This Panasonic camera weighs 188 g and fits with ease in your pocket or backpack.

One of the many noteworthy features of this Panasonic digital camera is its ability to record quality videos in HD at 1280 x 720 pixels. You can confidently take this camera along when you go swimming, trekking, dirt bike riding or even skiing, as its built to be waterproof up to 10 m, freeze-proof up to -10 degree Celsius, shockproof up to 2 m and dust-proof.

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FT2 runs on a Venus Engine HD II processor and supports multiple aspect ratios of 4:3, 3:2 and 16:9. You can enjoy a pleasant Live View experience as you compose images on the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixel. The anti-reflection coating on the LCD screen gives you the freedom to easily compose videos and pictures even under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

For optimal storage of videos and pictures captured, you can use a SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. To further increase storage space on your compact digital camera, you can transfer the data to a PC or a laptop via high speed USB 2.0.

You can also view your capture on a HDTV directly from the Panasonic DMC-FT2 camera using mini HDMI port. This Panasonic Lumix digital camera functions with a rechargeable Li-ion battery that lets you take up to 360 images when fully charged.

Performance

The aperture of a lens refers to size of the lens opening that allows light to pass through. The aperture range of the camera is f/3.3 - f/5.9. This digital camera from Panasonic can focus from 30 cm Wide and 30 cm Tele onwards in Normal mode, giving you sharp images always. The light sensitivity of this camera ranges from ISO 80 - 1600, which can be extended to ISO 6400 in High Sensitivity mode.

The shutter speed of a camera is a measure of total amount of time the shutter remains open letting light fall on the image sensor. The shutter speed of this Panasonic Lumix point and shoot camera ranges from 8 - 1/3000 seconds in Still mode, which extends in Starry Sky Mode to 15, 30 or 60 seconds.

To brighten up dim light situations, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FT2 also has a powerful flash with a range of 0.3 - 5.1 m Wide and 0.3 - 2.8 m Tele in ISO Auto mode.

Features

The Panasonic DMC-FT2 is home to an assortment of interesting scene modes like Food, Party, Candle Light, Panorama Assist, Sports and many more. You no longer have to worry about unclear images as the digital camera's optical image stabilizer Power O.I.S corrects blurriness with accuracy.

This Lumix camera also has a Face Recognition features that lets you register up to 3 face images of a single individual to precisely detect and distinguish faces. Using the self-timer feature on the Panasonic DMC-FT2 camera, you can join family and friends in memorable huddle photographs by delaying the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds.

Rest assured with an advanced Continuous Shooting mode, all your daring and adventurous moments will be captured. In Standard mode, the camera shoots a maximum of 5 images at 1.8 fps, while in Fine mode it shoots up to 3 images at the same rate.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FT2 Orange
Panasonic DMC-FX68 Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The D3000 is categorized in the Nikon's DX-format DSLR family. The camera's user-friendliness makes it an idyllic choice for photographers looking to upgrade to a digital SLR. The high performance EXPEED image processor lets you capture images at 10.2 megapixels.

This DSLR has a CCD sensor of dimensions 23.6 x 15.8 mm and supports 3:2 aspect ratio. The Nikon D3000 has an Integrated Dust Reduction System which removes accumulated dust from the sensor, thus maintaining its durability and quality.

Body

Weighing 485 g, this Nikon DSLR has a compact body with round edges, giving you a firm hand grip. The mode dial of this digital SLR is has a diamond-patterned knurling which helps in an easier grip. The back panel of the camera has the four function buttons on the left of the LCD, while the right side has the four-way selector and the delete button. This leaves ample space to hold the camera steady and access buttons easily.

The D3000 is built with an eye-level Pentamirror type Viewfinder. This DSLR's 3 inch polysilicon TFT LCD with 230,000 dot pixel has a large text size for strain-free reading. The D3000 stores pictures on SD as well as SDHC memory cards. The Nikon camera works on rechargeable Li-Ion EN-EL9a battery, which lets you click 510 shots when fully charged.

Performance

This digital SLR camera also supports interchangeable lenses on its Bayonet Nikon F mount. The Nikon D3000 has a NIKKOR AF-S lens with a focal length range of 18 - 55 mm. The D3000 digital SLR camera has an aperture ranges from f/3.5 - 5.6. Bringing distant objects closer, you optically zoom to 3x with this DSLR.

The Nikon D3000 has a MultiCam 1000 module that allows for a 11-point auto focus, giving you fast and accurate focus across the frame. You can choose from 5 focusing modes including the 3D Tracking Mode for fast moving objects, wherein the camera predicts the movement and focuses accordingly.

The D3000 is built with an Electronically controlled vertical-travel focal plane shutter. The shutter speed ranges from a slow 30 seconds to super-fast 1/4000 second, which will let you take a wide variety of shots if your subject is on the move. Alternatively, you can also use the Bulb Exposure to gain higher control over the shutter speed.

The ISO sensitivity of the Nikon D3000 ranges from ISO 100 - 1600 which can be manually extended up to ISO 3200 equivalent. With a higher the ISO, faster shutter speeds and brighter pictures can be shot, even with low external light. The D3000 has a powerful built-in pop up flash and you can also attach an external flash via the hot shoe.

Features & Connectivity

The Nikon D3000 has a unique in-camera Guide Mode which will assist you every step of the way. Another interesting feature is the Scene Recognition System. This corrects the exposure accuracy, white balance, illumination and auto focus of the entire frame milliseconds before you trip the shutter release.

The D3000 digital SLR also has a self-timer facility that can delays the shutter release up to 20 seconds. Never miss a moment with the Continuous Shooting mode which allows you to capture a speedy action at 3 frames per seconds.

This Nikon DSLR camera saves images in RAW and JPEG formats and has a USB 2.0 port with which you can connect the camera to a computer. The Nikon D3000 camera is designed to be a helpful and intelligent companion to facilitate a smooth transition from Point and Shoot to DSLR.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3000 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.sizeVariants: [CAMCWAPDU4P9W6DV, CAMCWN7MFQYZAYE3, CAMCWN7MGY2WPTXY, CAMCWN7MHWFTGYJM, CAMCWW3FVVCVFQV2, CAMCX6YJXZ9F6G66, CAMCY9UHZSZCXHMA]
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S3100 Yellow

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon's latest consumer DSLR, Nikon D5100, is a member of the popular D5000 series meant for the enthusiastic photographer. The DSLR camera is built with 23.6 x 15.6 mm CMOS image sensor and EXPEED 2 processor giving you exquisite image quality at 16.2 megapixels. You can record videos in Full-HD mode at 1920 x 1080p 24, 25, 30 fps.

Body

The Nikon D5100 weighs 509 g, with dimensions of 129 x 97 x 79 mm. The camera is compact and has a rounded firm hand grip. The camera has an eye level pentamirror optical viewfinder with 0.78 x magnification and a 95 percent field of view.

This Nikon digital SLR camera's hallmark feature is the vari-angle 3-inch TFT LCD screen with 921,000 dot pixels for a truly enjoyable Live View at any angle. This articulated LCD opens 180 degrees to the left and can be rotated up to 90 degrees clockwise. It also moves 180 degrees anti-clockwise for a more comfortable view when your DSLR is tripod bound.

A convenient lever is placed at the top of the DSLR which lets you switch to Live Mode with one easy move. The Video Record button is placed next to the shutter release for easy access to record those sudden yet fleeting moments. This SLR camera has a rechargeable Li-Ion EN-EL14 battery with which you can take 660 shots when completely charged. As for storage, you can use SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards to store your photos and videos on the camera.

Performance

The D5100 has a Bayonet Nikon F mount. The focal length multiplier of this Nikon camera is 1.5 x, while the zoom ratio is 3 x. The D5100 comes 11 point auto focus sensor and a 3D tracking facility allows for superior photography. The 3D tracking helps you automatically sharp focus moving objects by predicting its movement.

The ISO sensitivity of the Nikon DSLR ranges from 100 to 6400. You can extended up to a whopping 25600 equivalent to give you better results in dim light situations. The four noise reduction settings give you the freedom to shoot good pictures in any lighting. The shutter speed ranges from 1/4000 - 30 sec in, and also includes bulb setting for long exposures. The Nikon D5100 DSLR has built in pop up flash with several sync modes and a hot shoe for external flash.

Features & Connectivity

This Nikon DSLR comes with anti - dust systems like image sensor cleaning and airflow control, which gives you spotless images every time and increases the durability of the image sensor. High Dynamic Range HDR is another noteworthy feature of the Nikon D5100 camera. With every click of the shutter release, High Dynamic Range HDR feature takes two shots at varying exposures which are combined by the camera to give you a perfectly exposed image.

The D5100 is the first Nikon DSLR camera designed with in-camera filter and editing effects in still and video mode. Special effects like Selective Colour, Miniature Effect, Colour Sketch, Night Vision and the likes enriches your photographs and videos. The D5100 has the ability to detect 35 faces simultaneously for those memorable group photos. The self-timer setting with options ranging from 2 to 20 sec allows you ample time to be a part of your photographs.

You can get continuous shooting speed of 4 fps and Active D-Lighting with your Nikon D5100 DSLR. The Nikon also has a built in microphone and added provision for an external one. The two IR sensors lets you can connect your camera wirelessly via Wi-Fi. You can save images as either RAW or JPEG and videos is MOV format. The camera has high speed USB 2.0 port. You can also optionally connect your Nikon D5100 to a GPS device to Geotag your photos and videos. The camera is HDMI compatible and can be connect with an HD output monitor via an optional cable.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5100 DSLR Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.sizeVariants: [CAMCWAPDU4P9W6DV, CAMCWN7MFQYZAYE3, CAMCWN7MGY2WPTXY, CAMCWN7MHWFTGYJM, CAMCWW3FVVCVFQV2, CAMCX6YJXZ9F6G66, CAMCY7ZYJWEC5RQM]
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S3100 Green

productAttributes.productDescription:
You can now take photographs at all social events in full style. The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 belongs to the Panasonic Lumix FH series of point and shoot cameras. This camera is ideal to take along to parties or other family outings that demand precise chronicling. This DMC-FH5 has a Leica DC Vario-ELMAR lens with a focal length of 5 - 20 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 112 mm.

This Panasonic DMC-FH5 features a CCD image sensor and takes images at 16.1 megapixel resolution. The 4x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom of this Lumix digital camera lets you take close up shots of distant objects. This Lumix camera can reduce the image resolution to 3 megapixels to boost the zoom to 9x with the Extra Optical Zoom EZ feature.

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 has a sleek body design with sharp corners that increase comfort of grip. Weighing 121 g, The Panasonic Lumix digital camera can fit conveniently in a bag of almost any size. The conventional 5-button Menu controls and one touch buttons for recording, playback and modes makes this an easy-to-use point and shoot camera. You can record videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 24 fps with this Lumix DMC-FH5 digital camera.

This Panasonic Lumix camera is powered by the Venus Engine with enhanced signal processing and advanced noise reduction systems. This Lumix digital camera supports 4:3, 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios in still image shooting. Images can be composed and previewed with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD display screen with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

The rechargeable Lithium Ion battery lets you take up to 260 images on a single charge. This Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 has an internal memory of 70 MB and are compatible with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. To make more space for images, you can transfer all the images from this Lumix camera to a PC or laptop using the USB 2.0 high speed port.

Performance

This camera has an aperture range of f/3.1 - 6.5, which can control the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Auto Focus in this Lumix digital camera has a range of 500 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity Tele in Normal mode. With the Macro mode, this range can vary in the range of 50 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity Tele.

The light sensitivity of this Panasonic Lumix camera has a range of ISO 100 - 1600. This range increases from ISO 1600 - 6400 in High sensitivity mode. The Panasonic DMC-FH5 has a shutter speed range of 8 - 1/1600 second in the Normal mode. In Starry sky mode, this speed can be reduced to 15, 30 or 60 seconds to get sensational images of the night sky.

The Lumix DMC-FH5 has a built-in flash with a range of 400 - 3300 mm Wide and 1000 - 1600 mm Tele. You can use this to light up every corner of your memories.

Features

The Lumix DMC-FH5 has 28 pre-set scene modes like Party, Food, Candle, Beach and many more. In Baby mode, the Panasonic camera will record the name and birthday of your child and embed this date in images of them. The MEGA O.I.S optical image stabilizer of the Panasonic DMC-FH5 ensures that your images will be steady and blur-free by auto-correcting any shake in the camera.

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH5 has Face Detection Feature, which can identify up to 15 faces in a frame. This feature can optimize focus and exposure settings to keep all faces in sharp focus. With the self-timer settings of 2 or 10 seconds, the shutter release can be delayed long enough for you to join people in photos. With Continuous Shooting mode, you can take 15 - 100 pictures at 4.4 frames per second to record every moment of a race or dance without missing anything.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic DMC-FH5 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Endearing and intelligent, this Panasonic compact camera is an ideal choice for photography enthusiasts of all ages. The Panasonic DMC-S3 belongs to the Lumix S-series of trendy and versatile point and shoot cameras. The Lumix DC Vario lens of this digital camera has a focal length of 5 - 20 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 112 mm.

You can bring your subjects closer with an optical zoom of 4x and an additional digital zoom of 4x. The CCD image sensor of the Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 lets you take detailed images at 14.1 megapixels. This 117 g camera has a distinctive curvy-edged body that fits comfortably in the palm of your hands.

The rear panel of this Lumix digital camera has a 2.7 inch TFT LCD Screen with a resolution of 230,000 dots. For controls, this point and shoot camera also has a 5-way buttons and a dedicated Mode button. You can also record videos in HD with the Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3. This digital camera from Panasonic is powered by Venus Engine IV and takes images at aspect ratios of 4:3, 3:2 and 16:9.

Battery and Storage

The Lumix DMC-S3 has an inbuilt memory of 70 MB, which can be extended using a SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. The camera works on a rechargeable Li-Ion battery and lets you click up to 250 images. You can also transfer images and videos onto your laptop or desktop PC via high speed USB 2.0 port.

Performance

The aperture of a camera refers to the lens opening which controls light falling on the image sensor. The aperture of the Lumix DMC-F3 is f/3.1 - 6.5. The camera auto focuses from 0.05 m Wide and 1 m Tele onwards. The shutter speed of a camera is the amount of time the shutter remains open, allowing light to reach the sensor. The shutter speed of this Panasonic digital camera ranges from 8 - 1/1600 seconds.

The DMC-F3 also has an inbuilt flash which you can use to fill shadows or for dim light shots. The flash of this camera ranges from 0.3 - 4.9 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.9 m Tele.

Features

 The Panasonic Lumix DMC-F3 lets you experiment with several scene modes such as Night Scenery, Food, Baby, Fireworks, Beach, Snow. You can wave goodbye to blurry images as the MEGA ISO optical image stabilizer corrects the pictures for you. You can join your family and friends in group photos as the Panasonic DMC-F3 has a self-timer feature with 2 or 10 second delay options.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
To chronicle the most precious moments of your life, an impressive video camera is a must-have gadget in your arsenal of audio-visual gadgets. And this camcorder by Panasonic will not disappoint you. The Panasonic SDR-S71 is a standard definition camcorder that is perfect for everyday shooting and for moments that demand to be recorded for posterity.

The SDR-S71 has a CCD image sensor that delivers high quality videos even in zoom without image degradation. The Pure Color Engine processes videos and images to reproduce life-like footage with excellent color reproduction. The Panasonic SDR-S71 records videos in MPEG2 and images in JPEG file formats.

The stereo microphone of this standard definition camcorder has a zoom function that records audio tracks effortlessly even when your subjects are far away from you. The Advanced O.I.S optical image stabilizer ensures that your videos are blur-free, even if the camera has shaken while recording.

Body

The SDR-S71 weighs 212 g and is a lightweight video recorder that can be easily transported in a small bag or jacket pocket. With easy-to-access buttons next to the LCD screen, this camcorder will be an instant hit with your family and friends. The Panasonic video camera has a 2.7 inch LCD screen with a resolution of 123,200 dot pixels. You can use this screen to preview and compose your home videos.

You videos and images are saved on SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards, and can be viewed using a memory card reader on a computer or laptop. The SDR-S71 comes with a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery with a capacity of 895 mAh.

Performance

The Panasonic lens of this camcorder has a focal length of 1.48 - 104 mm with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 36.5 - 2571 mm in 16:9 aspect ratio. The SDR-S71 camcorder has 70x optical zoom and 100x digital zoom, which in combination gives you up to 3500x zoom magnification. This takes you closer to your subjects for stunningly detailed videos.

The Auto focus feature finds and focuses on your subjects automatically for sharp videos. The shutter speed of this camera has a range of 1/25 - 1/8000 second on Auto Slow Shutter ON mode and 1/50 - 1/8000 second on Auto Slow Shutter OFF mode. This feature lets you take dramatic images of moving subjects without blurs. The LED video light will also brighten up every video of yours.

Features and Connectivity

The SDR-S71 has scene modes like scenery, portrait, spotlight and more. The face detection technology identifies faces in every frame and optimizes focus and exposure settings for them , ensuring that your family and friends are always in the frame.

The SDR-S71 has a USB 2.0 high speed port that lets you connect it to a laptop or a computer to watch your videos directly on a bigger screen. You can alternately also connect the Panasonic camcorder to a television with the AV out port. The VideoCam Suite 3.5 software lets you edit your images and videos. It also makes sharing your videos with your friends easily as it includes a Web mode that lets you upload your creation to popular websites YouTube with ease.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic SDR-S71 Camcorder Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Panasonic SDR-H101 belongs to the standard definition series of camcorders by Panasonic. Ideal for people who spend a lot of time on the road, the SDR-H101 features a CCD image sensor that lets you take a wide range of videos with one gadget. The Pure Color Engine of this video camera strives to deliver high color reproduction to give you life-like videos.

This Panasonic camcorder supports video files in MPEG2 and image files in JPEG format. The stereo microphone with a zoom microphone function captures all the sound that accompanies your video footage, even in full zoom videos. The Advanced O.I.S optical image stabilizer relays videos without blurs, eliminating shakes due to hand movement.

Body

The SDR-H101 weighs 273 g and is a compact camcorder that will change the way you chronicle your favorite moments. The buttons and controls of this video camera are easy to access while it is in use, while the zoom rocker on the top panel is readily available when you are shooting in a crowd. The joystick controls of the SDR-H101 are intuitive and handy. The 2.7 inch LCD screen has a resolution of 123,300 dot pixels and is the perfect tool to compose your videos with.

The Panasonic SDR-H101 has a hybrid memory system of an 80 GB built-in hard disk drive and SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card support. The camcorder runs on a Lithium Ion battery that has a capacity of 1790 mAh.

Performance

The Panasonic lens of this camcorder has a focal length of 1.48 - 104 mm with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 36.5 - 2571 mm in 16:9 aspect ratio when Enhanced Optical Zoom is switched On. The SDR-H101 has 70x optical zoom and 100x digital zoom, which in combination can give you up to 3500x zoom magnification. With the Auto Focus feature, the video camera will focus on your subjects for you, leaving you free to enjoy the moments of your friends and family.

The Panasonic camcorder has a shutter speed of 1/25 - 1/8000 second on Auto Slow Shutter ON mode which can reduce to a range of 1/50 - 1/8000 second on Auto Slow Shutter OFF mode. The LED video light can be turned on when the scene is too dark, to light up every corner of your memories.

Features and Connectivity

Shooting modes like Portrait, Scenery, Spotlight and more are useful while shooting videos in popular settings. In Spotlight mode, the camcorder helps in taking clear videos while preventing washed-out areas. The Face Detection feature adjusts exposure and focus for up to 15 faces identified in a frame to capture them perfectly.

The USB 2.0 high speed mini AB connector of this camcorder can be used to transfer your videos from the hard disk drive to a computer, so that you always have space for more videos. The AV out port allows you to watch your videos on a television, by connecting your camcorder directly to the TV or through a home theatre system or video player. And with the VideoCam Suite 3.5 software, editing and saving your videos on a computer will never be difficult again.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic SDR-H101 Camcorder Camera Black
Panasonic HDC-TM900 Camcorder Camera Black
Panasonic DMC-FH5 Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Fujifilm Finepix AX300 belongs to the FinePix A series of point and shoot cameras from Fujifilm. With an easy to use interface, this Fujifilm digital camera is ideal for photography enthusiasts. This Fujifilm Finepix AX300 has a Fujinon lens with a focal length range of 5.9 - 29.5 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length range of 33 - 165 mm.

You can bring your subjects closer with this camera's 5x optical zoom and 6.7x digital zoom. The CCD image sensor of this FinePix digital camera lets you take detailed pictures at 14 megapixel resolution.

This stylish Fujifilm AX300 weighs 168 g. The uncluttered back panel of this Fujifilm point and shoot digital camera makes it convenient for you to access buttons and change settings. You can comfortably handle this FinePix camera as the rounded corners make for an easy grip.

The Fujifilm FinePix AX300 captures videos in full HD at a resolution of 1280 x 720 dot pixel 30 fps. The Fujifilm FinePix AX300 has a 2.7 inch TFT color LCD display with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixel that you can use to compose and preview your pictures and videos.

Battery and Storage

With this Fujifilm AX300, you can take up to 180 frames by using standard AA Alkaline batteries. Alternatively, you can also take up to 480 frames with the optional NiMH batteries. The Fujifilm digital camera is compatible with SD and SDHC memory cards. You can store your pictures on a laptop or PC using the 2.0 high-speed USB port.

Performance

This FinePix point and shoot camera has an aperture range of f/3.3 - 8.0 Wide and f/5.9 - 14.4 Tele, letting you take sharp pictures even in the dark. The FinePix AX300 has a TTL Contrast Auto focus with a range from 450 mm to infinity Wide and 800 mm to infinity Tele. You can take close up pictures on the Macro mode with a focus range of 100 - 800 mm Wide and 600 - 1000 mm Tele.

The light sensitivity of the AX300 digital camera ranges from ISO 100 - 3200, letting you take clear images even in dim light. Shutter speed is the amount of time that the shutter is open to expose the image sensor to light. The shutter speed of this FinePix digital camera ranges from 8 - 1/1400 sec.

The built-in flash of the FinePix digital camera ranges from 600 - 3000 mm Wide and from 600 - 2000 mm Tele on Auto mode. The flash ranges from 300 - 800 mm Wide and from 600 - 1000 mm Tele in the Macro mode, brightening every corner of your detailed picture.

Features

This Fujifilm FinePix digital camera comes with many preset modes such as Baby mode, Sunset mode, Snow mode, Text mode and many more. The expanding burst of light from fireworks is captured using slow shutter speed in the Fireworks mode. The digital image stabilizer ensures that you can take blur-free pictures of your friends and loved ones. The Face Detection software optimizes pictures of people by adjusting the focus and exposure to ensure crisp and clear pictures.

The Smile and Shoot feature of this FinePix AX300 automatically releases the shutter when a smile appears, ensuring you never miss out on those moments. This Fujifilm AX300 comes with Blink Detection function, which gives you the option of taking another picture if your subject has blinked.

You can tag up to 5 friends with their names, and this Fujifilm camera will tag them in future pictures using the Tagging Technology. Now you never have to miss out on being in a picture. The self-timer of this FinePix point and shoot digital camera has two setting options of 2 seconds and 10 seconds delay. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you take 1.2 frames per second, letting you record every precious moment of your life.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix AX300 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Fujifilm FinePix AX300 Silver
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH2 Blue
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH2 Silver
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH2 Pink
Panasonic SDR-H101 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Panasonic recognizes the importance of zoom and its functions in professional photography, and brings to you a performance-packed ultra-zoom camera that will blow you away. The Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ40 is a powerful digital camera belonging to the Super Zoom series of cameras from Panasonic. This point and shoot camera performs best in wildlife and outdoor settings, for long-range shooting.

The Panasonic digital camera has a LEICA DC VARIO ELMARIT lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 108 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 600 mm. The Lumix DMC-FZ40 has a massive 24x optical zoom and digital zoom of 4x that bring all the details of your subject in focus. Experiment with the CCD image sensor, which enables the 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

The camera channels powerful features in a professional-esque body. With a rounded grip on the front panel for a firm hold and a sturdy body to house the mechanics of a super-zoom camera, the DMC-FZ40 will be the ideal gadget to have along at any event. The back panel is dominated by the 3 inch TFT LCD screen which has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. The controls of the camera are located at convenient distances from the lens, shutter release button and the grip, making the use of this camera as easy as pie.

Record every adorable moment in your life in high definition clarity with the HD video recording feature that records at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps. The Venus Engine HD II undertakes signal processing that enables crystal clear images and videos. Your images are shot in 4:3, 3:2, 16:9 and 1:1 aspect ratios, which are ideal to play on multiple kinds of media. The Lumix digital camera boasts of an electronic viewfinder that can be used to compose perfect snapshots that capture the essence of your memories.

Battery and Storage

The Panasonic camera stores your cherished photos on SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards, which are easy to find and store. Powered by a Lithium Ion battery, the DMC-FZ40 camera can take up to 580 pictures on full charge, keeping you equipped through long events. Images in your camera can be transferred out into a computer or a laptop with the USB 2.0 high speed port. Watch your HD videos and high resolution images on a compatible large screen television by simply connecting the two with the HDMI mini connector in the camera.

Performance

The super zoom lens of this Panasonic camera has an aperture range of f/2.8 - 5.2, which controls the density of the light ray falling on the image sensor. The DMC-FZ40 uses the Auto Focus feature to focus in the range of 30 cm onwards Wide and 200 cm to infinity Tele, taking care of the elbow grease for you while you enjoy photography.

Low light photography will now be spectacular, with a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600 and a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 60 sec. Breathe new life into your images with the built-in pop-up flash that has a range of 0.3 - 9.5 m wide and 1 - 5.1 m Tele, all of which endeavor to deliver high resolution, bright and sharp images every time. Toggle the dial on the DMC-FZ40 to access the manual mode, which allows you complete control on your photographs.

Features

The Panasonic digital camera features automatic shooting modes like Portrait, Sports, Close-up modes and more, which optimize settings for popular scenes. The POWER O.I.S optical image stabilizer corrects unintended hand-shake for blur-free photographs that remind you of perfect sunny afternoons and exciting vacations.

The Face Recognition feature can identify faces in a frame that have been pre-registered, to sort photographs depending on the people in them. With the self-timer, the camera allows you to delay releasing the shutter by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you ample time to set the camera down on a secure ledge for a full family photograph. You can also use the self-timer feature to capture steady and sharp images of moving objects.

The Continuous Shooting mode lets you take up to 5 images in a sequence at a speed of 1.8 frames per second, recording every nuance of the scene in front of you. These convenience features, with the phenomenal performance of the camera, will make your journey with the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ40 truly memorable.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ40 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you were searching for a feature packed superzoom digital camera, you need to look no further. The Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ18 belongs to the Lumix TZ series of point and shoot digital cameras. Ideal for travel photographers looking to hone their skills, the DMC-TZ18 comes equipped with the LUMIX DC VARIO-ELMAR lens with a focal length of 4.3 - 68.8 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 384 mm.

The Panasonic DMC-TZ18 has 16x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom. With the Extra Optical Zoom EZ feature, the Lumix camera lets you achieve up to 135x zoom, taking you immeasurably closer to your subjects. The MOS image sensor of this Lumix digital camera lets you capture images at 14.1 megapixel resolution.

The Lumix digital camera weighs 210 g and has a sleek design that is easy to hold while capturing images. The rotary dials on the top panel are convenient to handle even while shooting photographs, while the one-touch button for video capture makes this camera ideal for beginners. You can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixels 30 fps.

The Panasonic DMC-TZ18 features the Venus Engine, which enables higher quality signal processing and advanced noise reduction in all your images. Your images can be taken and played back in 4:3, 3:2, 16:9 and 1:1 aspect ratios, letting you choose the dimensions of your images. You can compose and preview your images in the 3 inch TFT LCD display screen, which has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

With the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery of this digital camera, you can take up to 340 photographs on a single charge. The Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ18 has an inbuilt memory of 70 MB and can be expanded with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. The images you take can be transferred to computer or laptop using the USB 2.0 high speed port and always have more space for your favorite memories.

Performance

The Lumix FMC-TZ18 has an aperture range of f/3.3 - 5.9, which is the size of the lens opening which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Auto Focus of this camera has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 200 cm to infinity Tele, which automatically focuses on your subject, leaving you free to compose beautiful images.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor in a camera. The light sensitivity of this Lumix digital camera has a range of ISO 100 - 1600. This range increases to ISO 1600 - 6400 in the High Sensitivity mode, adding dramatic detail to low-light photographs.

The shutter speed in this Panasonic digital camera has a range of 60 - 1/4000. In the Starry Sky mode, you can alternate between shutter speeds of 15, 30 or 60 seconds to get sharp pictures of the night sky. The built-in flash of this Lumix digital camera has a range of 0.6 - 5 m Wide and 1 - 2.8 m Tele, which can brighten up every corner of all your images.

Features

The Panasonic digital point and shoot camera has 29 scene modes like Candle Light, Baby, Beach, Party and many more. In the Underwater mode, the Panasonic camera reproduces color as close to the natural light as possible while subduing the strong blue of the water. The POWER O.I.S optical image stabilizer gives you sharp images with reduced blurs by compensating for camera shake.

The Face Recognition function lets you register up to 6 of your closest friends and family members in this Panasonic camera. The Lumix digital point and shoot will automatically recognize them in photographs and optimize focus settings for them. The self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 and 10 seconds so that you never have to miss out on being in a photograph with your loved ones ever. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you take up to 5 images at 1.9 frames per second so that you can chronicle every instance of those precious moments.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ18 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
This point and shoot camera is perfect for casual photographers out to make a fashion statement. Belonging to the Lumix FP series, this compact camera is packed with modern technology and user-friendliness, thus assuring a fun and interesting experience. The Lumix DMC-FP7 has a focal length of 6.3 - 25.2 mm, which translates to a 35 mm equivalent of 35 - 140 mm.

You can bridge the distance between yourself and a faraway object using 4x optical zoom and an additional 4x digital zoom. The camera is built with a CCD sensor and lets you capture fascinating images at 16.1 megapixels. You can also record precious memories in HD at 1280 x 720 pixels 24 fps.

Slender and sophisticated, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP7 camera fits effortlessly in your pocket, bag or purse. The front of the camera has a lens cover which turns the camera on as you slide it open. The rear panel is solely dominated by a wide 3.5 inch TFT LCD touchscreen that lets you slide, sweep, touch and click your way through photography. This 230,000 dot resolution touchscreen enables you to control the auto focus, zoom, shutter and scene selector by a mere touch of the finger.

An ideal companion for the social butterfly, this Lumix camera makes sharing snaps on social networking sites easy. All you have to do go to Upload Set option in the playback menu and select the photos and videos you want to share. Once the selection is done, connect the camera or memory card to a computer and sit back as your memories are shared with the world.

This Lumix digital camera runs on a Venus Engine VI image processor with Intelligent Resolution technology. With the multiple aspect ratio feature, you can click images in 4:3, 3:2, 16:9 and 1:1 aspect ratios.

Battery and Storage

This Panasonic point and shoot camera has an inbuilt memory of 70 MB, which can be expanded using SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. To transfer images onto a PC or laptop, you can connect the camera via high speed USB 2.0 port. The camera runs on a rechargeable Li-ion battery pack which clicks up to 240 images per charge.

Performance

The aperture of a camera refers to the lens opening that allows light to pass through. The aperture range of the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP7 digital camera is f/3.5 - 5.9. This digital camera from Panasonic focuses from 50 cm Wide and 50 cm Tele onwards in Normal mode. In Macro mode, the camera focuses in range of 10 cm - infinity Wide and 50 cm - infinity Tele.

The shutter speed is the total amount of time the shutter is allowed to remain open, exposing the sensor to light. The shutter speed range of the Panasonic Lumix camera is 8 - 1/1600 seconds. In Starry Sky mode, this speed can be extended to 15, 30 or 60 seconds as per you requirements.

The light sensitivity of this Lumix compact camera has a range of ISO 100 - 1600, which can be expanded in High Sensitivity mode up to IS 6400. To assist you in dim light or indoor scenarios, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP7 is built with a powerful flash. This flash has an operational range of 0.3 - 4.9 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.9 m Tele.

Features

The Panasonic Lumix digital camera has several fun and fascinating scene modes such as Night Scenery, Food, Party, Candle Light, Starry Sky, Fireworks, Beach and Snow. To avoid unwanted blurriness in images, this camera has an inbuilt optical images stabilizer MEGA O.I.S that automatically corrects fuzziness. The end result is a clear and crisp image.

This Panasonic digital camera has a Face Detection feature that optimizes focus and exposure settings for faces. Moreover, the camera can detect up to 15 faces in a single frame. By using the self-timer features which delays the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, you can join family and friends in group photographs.

If you are required capture every second of a fast-paced action sequence, you can switch to the Continuous Shoot mode. This mode lets you click a maximum of 100 shots at 4.4 frames per second, making sure you never miss a precious moment.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic DMC-FP7 Black

productAttributes.productDescription: LUMIX Compact Digital Camera, f/2.0 LEICA DC VARIO-SUMMICRON Lens with 24mm Wide-angle, 1/1.63-inch, 10.1-megapixel High-sensitivity CCD, Venus Engine FHD featuring Intelligent Resolution Technology, HD Movie in AVCHD Lite with Creative Movie Mode, Intuitive Manual Control and Creative Option Featuring My Color Mode, Expandability with Optional Accessories.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC LX5 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sony DSC-HX100V belongs to the Cyber-shot family of point and shoot cameras. This Sony camera uses the Exmor R CMOS sensor with 16.2 megapixel resolution. The Carl Zeiss Vario Sonnar T lens of the Cyber-shot camera provides 30x optical and 4x digital zoom. The focal length of this digital camera is 4.8 mm - 144 mm and 27 mm - 810 mm in the 35 mm equivalent format. The DSC-HX100V is ideal for those who are photo enthusiasts and travel regularly.

This Cyber - shot camera weighs 577 g including the accessories, memory card and batteries. The camera body has a rounded, classic DSLR shape. The Sony DSC-HX100V point and shoot camera can record Full HD movies at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 30 fps. This digital camera can also capture 3D images by automatically taking two consecutive offset shots and combining them to create a 3D effect.

The camera comes preloaded with the BIONZ image processor. An electronic viewfinder is also installed in the Cyber - shot camera. This Sony camera has a 3-inch Xtra Fine TruBlack LCD display with a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

A rechargeable Lithium Ion battery powers this point and shoot camera. To increase the storage space of the camera, SD, SDXC and SDHC memory cards can be used. This Sony camera also supports Memory stick and its various types like Memory Stick Duo, Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo, Memory Stick PRO Duo and Memory Stick PRO Duo Mark2 .

Performance

The Sony DSC-HX100V point and shoot camera has TTL contrast detection Auto Focus that has a range of 1 cm Wide and 200 cm Tele. The aperture of this Sony camera ranges between f/2.8 - f/5.6. The compact camera can automatically adjust its sensitivity between ISO 100 - 3200. The shutter speed of this Sony camera is 2 - 1/4000 sec that lets you capture even the fast moving objects with clarity. This Cyber-shot camera has the Pop-up flash installed in it and ranges between 0.3 m - 12.7 m.

Features and Connectivity

Scene modes such as Soft snap, Landscape, Twilight Portrait, Twilight, Gourmet and many others are included in this Sony camera for you to experiment with. The DSC-HX100V also includes technologies like Scene selection, 3D Sweep Panorama, Blink Detection, Smile Detection, Motion Detection and Face detection.

In order to avoid motion blur, this point and shoot camera is installed with Optical SteadyShot image stabilizer. The continuous shooting speed of this Sony camera is 10 fps. You can also set a self timer before clicking the pictures with a delay of 2 - 10 seconds.

A high speed USB 2.0 can easily connect your Sony camera to your PC or laptop where you can view or transfer the pictures and videos. The HDMI Output is also provided with the Sony DSC-HX100V point and shoot camera for you to view the videos and pictures on HDTV.
productAttributes.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-HX100V Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription: This compact digital camera is a stylish choice, with a range of intelligent features, high definition movie recording and a large LCD screen.The DMC-S3 features a 28mm wide-angle LUMIX DC VARIO lens with 4x optical zoom 35mm camera equivalent: 28-112mm. The wide-angle lens lets you easily capture large groups of people indoors or wide architectural structures and landscape shots.. The 4x optical zoom with 14.1-megapixel resolution allows beautiful close up shots when you need to get in close to your subject. The Extra Optical Zoom function uses the centre part of the camera sensor to extend this 4x zoom ratio to a powerful 8.4x zoom at a resolution of 3-megapixel or less for extra zoom power.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The SX150 IS digital camera will be an exciting buy if you are a photography enthusiast. This Canon point and shoot camera has a focal length of 5 - 60mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 336 mm. The SX150 IS has a 12x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom, which in combination, let you zoom up to 48x closer to your subject.

With the CCD image sensor of this Canon PowerShot digital camera, you can take images at 14.1 megapixel resolution. With full Manual controls and HD movie recording at 1280 x 720 dot pixels, this camera is feature packed to your heart's content.

The Canon PowerShot SX150 IS weighs 306 g and has a sophisticated metal body design. This bridge camera has ergonomic contours that fit comfortably in your hands. The control buttons on the back panel are conveniently accessible while shooting, making this an easy-to-use camera.

The Canon SX150 IS is powered by the DIGIC 4 image processor, which delivers dramatic image quality. Images at 4:3 aspect ratio are supported by this Canon digital camera. This PowerShot camera has a 3 inch TFT LCD display with 230,000 dot pixel resolution, which you can use to compose and preview your images and videos.

Battery and Storage

Your images and videos can be stored in external storage devices like SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can also transfer images to a computer or a laptop using the USB 2.0 high speed port. With 2 AA Alkaline batteries, you can take up to 110 shots with this PowerShot camera. You can also use 2 AA NiMH batteries to take up to 320 shots on a single charge.

Performance

The iris type aperture of this PowerShot SX150 IS has a range of f/3.4 - 5.6. Aperture controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Canon PowerShot digital camera has an Auto Focus range of 10 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity Tele in Normal mode. In Macro mode, this range decreases to 10 - 500 mm Wide. This Canon PowerShot's light sensitivity has a range of ISO 80 - 1600, which can be manually changed to control noise grain and brightness of images.

In Auto mode, the shutter speed of this camera has a range of 1 - 1/2500 second. This can be manipulated in a range of 15 - 1/2500 second in the Manual mode. The built-in pop-up flash of this camera has a range of 500 - 3000 mm Wide and 1000 - 2000 Tele, which you can use to take defined images even in the dark.

Features

This Canon PowerShot digital camera can identify 32 scenes like Beach, Foliage, Snow, Fireworks and more and optimize settings for you to take perfect images. The lens-shift image stabilizer system of the Canon PowerShot SX150 IS compensates for camera shake and gives you blur-free images.

With the Face Detect feature, this PowerShot digital camera can identify faces within the frame and optimize focus settings for them. In the Continuous Shooting mode, you can shoot up to 0.9 frames per second or up to 0.6 frames per second until the memory card is full, letting you capture whole sequences of action in a single burst.

With the Smart Shutter function, the shutter release can be triggered by a smile, ensuring that you always have a picture of those adorable moments. With the Wink self-timer and Face self-timer mode, when a new face enters the frame or someone in the frame winks at the camera, the PowerShot SX150 IS automatically releases the shutter, capturing the moment.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot SX150 IS Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Nikon Coolpix AW100 Blue
Nikon Coolpix AW100 Orange
Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera White
Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera Pink
Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
The classic look of this Nikon camera will stand out as a work of art. The Nikon Coolpix S8200 belongs to the Coolpix S series of point and shoot digital cameras by Nikon. Ideal for the regular party-goer, this feature packed Coolpix camera will aid in storing your memories in dramatic clarity. This S8200 digital camera features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 63.0 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 350 mm.

The Coolpix S8200 has up to 14x optical zoom and up to 2x digital zoom that you can experiment with to get clear images of distant subjects. The backside illuminated CMOS image sensor lets you take stunning images at 16.1 megapixel resolution. This lets you enlarge images and still retain the original brilliance of your favorite moments.

The compact Nikon camera weighs 213 g and is sleek enough to fit into a jacket pocket or handbag. The portable camera has an elegant back panel with dedicated buttons for video recording and previewing images, making the Nikon S8200 an easy-to-use camera. You can also take professional looking videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution 30 fps, recording your precious moments in high-resolution detail.

The Nikon Coolpix S8200 sports the EXPEED C2 image processing engine which delivers high resolution images coupled with fast performance. Videos and images can be viewed in 16:9 aspect ratio, letting you watch your favorite memories on a large screen TV. You can compose and preview these images on the 3 inch TFT LCD monitor, which has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The anti-reflection coating of the LCD screen makes it easy to view images even in bright sunlight.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S8200 has an internal memory of 89 MB and can be expanded using compatible SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. The Nikon point and shoot camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, with which you can take up to 250 shots on full charge. You can use the USB 2.0 high speed port to transfer your images to a computer or laptop and always have more space in your camera for those precious memories. The HDMI port allows you to connect the Nikon Coolpix S8200 to an HDTV to watch your photographs and videos in full screen clarity.

Performance

Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening which controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. The Coolpix S8200 has an aperture with a range of f/3.5 - 5.9. With the Nikon point and shoot camera, you can focus in the range of 500 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity in Auto mode. In Macro mode, the focus ranges from 10 mm onwards Wide.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of a camera. This Nikon S8200 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 3200. With the shutter speed range of 1 - 1/1600 second, you can take blur-free images of subjects even in low light situations. The shutter speed decreases to 4 seconds when the scene mode is set to Fireworks show mode, which enables clear image capture of astounding light bursts. The built-in pop-out flash has a functioning range of 500 - 5500 mm Wide and 1000 - 3000 mm Tele, which will light up every corner of your images.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix S8200 has 18 scene modes like Pet Portrait, Food, Museum, Sunset and many more modes. You can use these scene modes to experiment with different photo effects. The lens shift Vibration Reduction of the S8200 ensures that pictures of moving objects are blur-free and sharp in focus. In the Easy Panorama mode, you only need to move the camera in the desired direction following the guidelines that appear on the screen, and the S8200 digital camera combines multiple shots into a single panorama photograph.

The Face Priority feature finds and focuses on up to 12 faces to get clear and sharp images. The Blink Warning function warns you when your subject blinks, so that you can take another picture and always have perfect images of your favorite people. The Smile Timer mode of the Nikon S8200 automatically recognizes a smiling face and releases the shutter, ensuring you never miss out on adorable moments.

The self-timer of the Coolpix point and shoot camera lets you delay the shutter release by 2 and 10 seconds, letting you join your friends in every photograph. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 5 shots at 10 frames per second. This lets you record still images of whole sequences of actions, saving all your special moments forever.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S8200 Point & Shoot Camera Red
Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
