Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The MV800 from Samsung is a highly advanced and capable digital point and shoot camera, that comes packed with a wide variety of special features and functions. Its innovative design and sophisticated operations makes it the ideal choice for hobbyists or budding photographers, to explore new and innovative camera angles and shooting techniques.

The MV800 makes use of a Schneider Kreuznach optical lens that has 5x optical zoom along with an additional 5x of digital zoom that gives you a considerable level of magnification.  It also has an operational focal length of 4.7 mm - 23.5 mm and a 35 mm equivalent to 26 mm - 130 mm. Operating a CCD image sensor, this Samsung digital camera allows you to capture images at an incredible 16.15 megapixel resolution and is capable of recording video in 720p at 30 fps.

Sporting a very sophisticated new age body design and weighing about 130 g, the Samsung MV800 is as stylish as it is compact. The MV800 has a 3-inch smart touch screen that occupies almost the entirety of the camera’s rear plate. The top of the camera features the shutter release button that is located on the inside of the zoom control ring along with the main power control button.

One of the unique features of the Samsung MV800 is the advent of a highly sophisticated 3 inch flip-out TFT LDC display with a resolution of 288,000 dot pixels and 16:9 aspect ratio. The tilt-up option gives the screen an unprecedented 180 degrees of tilt, making almost any shooting angle possible.

Battery and Storage

The base of the camera houses the camera’s power source in the form of a BP-70A rechargeable battery that uses a 5V DC power input. Also present is the memory card slot which is compatible with SD and SDHC memory cards.

The recorded files on the memory card can easily be transferred onto a PC or a laptop using the high-speed USB port or a memory card reader. This camera to PC connection is extremely easy as the MV800 is both Windows and MAC OS compatible. The presence of an HDMI port along with an analog video out, lets you enjoy all your images and videos on a standard definition or a high definition TV.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens of the camera. The aperture control on this Samsung compact camera has a range of f/3.3 - f/5.9. It also features TTL or through the lens auto focus that ranges from 80 cm Wide and 150 cm Tele to infinity in the normal mode along with 5 cm to 80 cm Wide and 100 cm to 150 cm Tele while in Macro mode.

The light sensitivity of this camera ranges from ISO 100 to 3200, letting you take clear images even in low light situations. The camera also features a wide range of adjustable shutter speeds to helps you achieve your desired result. The shutter speed on the MV800 ranges from a maximum 1/2000 sec to a minimum of 8 sec. A built-in flash with a range of 0.2 m - 3.2 m Wide and 0.5 m – 1.8 m Tele, allows you to light up every corner of your desired frame.

Features

This Samsung MV800 features the smart auto setting which has a range of automatic shooting modes that can be used to suit very specific conditions or situations. This includes the likes of 3D Photo, Live Panorama, Self Shot, Picture in Picture and more. The camera also has a built-in mono microphone that allows for recording clear sound quality along with video.

The MV800 uses Dual Image Stabilization, which employs both digital and optical stabilization techniques to counter any camera shake or eliminate the blurring of the captured images or video. The list of extra features goes on with the inclusion of Pictbridge, Self timer, Red eye reduction, Face detection and more.

The PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing. The self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, so that you can join your friends and other loved ones in every image. The face detection technology lets the camera determines the locations and sizes of human faces within the frame so it can prioritise the focus and clarity of the facial gestures rather than arbitrary elements like trees or buildings.
productAttributes.title: Samsung MV800 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon D3100 is an entry-level DX-format camera, ideal for photographers preparing to refine their skills in DSLR cameras.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a highly capable 14.2 MP CMOS imaging sensor that is more that able to take high quality images across a wide range of lighting conditions. This sensor is also adept at adapting to many ISO settings that can result in better images in .lower lighting conditions as well. It is equipped with the EXPEED 2 image processing engine.

Less Blur

The lens and sensor arrangement together work in reducing the visual artefacts seen on images. The better the sensor, clearer will be the image output. The Nikon D3100 camera is capable of clicking high quality images that result in less blur even under low lighting conditions.

Active D Lighting

This camera is equipped with the Active D Lighting feature that balances out the contrast even in brightly lit scenes. When we shoot images in brightly lit areas, like outdoors on a bright and sunny day, there can be instances where pictures may appear to have extreme contrast between the light and dark areas of the frame. This anomaly is reduced greatly with the Active D Lighting feature.

Picture Control

This feature allows you to set specific control settings for 6 different picture modes. Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Landscape and Portrait mode. You also have an Easy-to-view finder that is incorporated into the system.

Auto Selection and Movies

With the Automatic Scene Selector, you can choose the right picture settings just by choosing the automatic mode and pressing a button for the onboard image sensor to select the right image settings according to the scene. It is also possible to take full HD videos with the Nikon camera. The 11 Point Auto Focus system allows you to individually focus along 11 different points through the viewfinder. It also comes with Eye-Fi Support.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D3100 Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
For those who are regulars at the party scene, Canon has released its most recent camera in the IXUS HS series. This elegant camera is designed for the fashion conscious socially active. The Canon digital camera has a focal length of 5 - 40 mm with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 224 mm.

This Canon IXUS digital camera boasts of an 8x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom, which in combination can take you up to 32x closer to your subjects. The CMOS image sensor lets you take images at 12.1 megapixel resolution. The zoom and high resolution features let you capture your subject in detail that would otherwise be elusive.

This slim Canon camera weighs 140 g and is compact enough to fit comfortably in your hand while you take images. The back panel sports the 5 way dial with one-touch buttons for video recording and image preview. This IXUS point and shoot camera is sleek enough to slip into a pocket conveniently. You can shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels 24 fps.

The DIGIC 4 image processor designed by Canon delivers high performance shooting while maintaining the original vivid colors of your life. These images are saved in 4:3 aspect ratio, letting you enjoy images on a large screen TV. You can use the 3 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels to compose perfect images.

Battery and Storage

Your images are saved on SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can also transfer your images from the camera to a computer or a PC with the USB high speed port to open up more space on your camera. The HDMI output port lets you enjoy your favorite memories on an HD television. The Canon IXUS point and shoot camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. You can take up to 210 shots on a full charge with this battery.

Performance

This Canon point and shoot camera has a circular aperture with a range of f/3 - 5.9, which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Auto Focus of this IXUS digital camera has a range of 1 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele, which can be decreased to 1 - 50 cm Wide in Macro mode, letting you experiment with dramatic images freely.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of a camera. This Canon IXUS camera has a light sensitivity in the range of ISO 100 - 3200. This shutter speed has a range of 15 - 1/2000 second, and helps in taking artistic photos of moving subjects and low light events. The built-in flash has a range of 50 cm - 4 m Wide and 50 cm - 2 m Tele, lighting up every scene around you for sharper images.

Features

The 32 scene modes of the Canon IXUS 230 HS include Kids and Pets, Low-light and many more; these can be used to take images in peace while the camera optimizes the settings to take perfect pictures. The lens shift image stabilizer automatically compensates for camera-shake or a moving subject to take sharp images. The Smile and Wink self-timer features of the IXUS 230 HS recognize when a face in the frame is smiling and winking, and automatically snaps the picture, making sure you always have a picture of those heart-warming moments.

The Face self-timer takes a picture the instant a new face enters the frame, and lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you ample time to join your friends in every image. With the Continuous Shooting mode on High-speed Burst mode, you can take shots at 8.7 frames per second, recording every precious moment of your baby's first steps forever.
productAttributes.title: Canon IXUS 230 HS Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Nikon S1200pj Pink

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 1100D is one of the finest economical SLR cameras in the market today. The multiple features in this camera are quite supportive for those who are relatively new to SLRs. This entry level camera is also powerful enough to capture some truly impressive images across a wide range of lighting conditions.

Sensor Technology

The DSLR camera is equipped with a powerful 12.2 MP APS-C sized CMOS sensor that can capture more detail and light than other, older sensors. This is also highly useful when you want to photograph subjects along varying degrees of lighting conditions that also require different ISO settings.

Auto Focus

This camera can also focus on 9 different points as seen through the view finder. Aiming each point along the focus line allows you to even get differential focus when using the Auto Focus feature. The images will not have the perspective and depth of field though they will still be uniquely focused along the 9 point cross type AF system. The system is also incorporated with the Eye-Level Pentamirror for better photography.

Flash Forward

When using the Auto Mode, you can also get the flash to engage automatically according to the lighting conditions outside. This is possible with the light sensor as well as the auto scene detection present in the camera. When the lighting conditions are less than adequate, the flash pops open and fires when the shutter is released.

Layout and Intelligence

The system sports a new look with the body being incorporated with a whole new, redesigned control layout. The system uses the Scene Intelligent Auto mode effectively to gauge the lighting conditions. The layout on the other hand makes it all the more easy to control the camera across a wide range of circumstances and also allows for easy access to most if not all the commonly used control settings.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 1100D DSLR Camera Black, Body with EF-S 18-55 mm IS II & EF-S 55-250 mm Lenses

productAttributes.productDescription:
The newest entry in the Olympus PEN series of digital cameras is the E-PL3 which offers wonderful image enhancing properties. Combining the features of high-end cameras in this compact design, this Olympus micro four thirds provides superior images at 12.3 megapixels. The built-in High Speed Live MOS image sensor captures images with utmost clarity and class.

This is a perfect camera for those who are always on the go. The TruePic VI image processor in the E-PL3 records Full HD videos at 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution at 60 fps. This micro four thirds camera supports 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 6:6 and 3:4 aspect ratios.

Body

 The metal body of the E-PL3 is quite durable and strong. The rounded edges of this bridge camera provide a comfortable and steady hold while capturing images. The ergonomically placed control buttons and dial are effortlessly reachable and facilitate easy access. This Olympus PEN camera weighs just 265 g and can easily fit in your pocket or handbag. The 3 inch LCD screen comes with Anti-Reflection Coating and has a resolution of 460,000 dots which gives you crystal-clear, 100 per cent field of view while shooting.

Compatible with SD, SDHC, SDXC and UHS-I storage, you can easily increase the storage capacity of this camera by simply changing the memory card. Powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery pack, this bridge camera can shoot up to 300 images when fully charged.

Performance

 The Olympus E-PL3 comes with Micro Four Thirds lens mount. This camera has a focal length of 14 - 42 mm and 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 84 mm. The aperture setting controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor when clicking photographs. With the aperture setting ranging from f/3.5 - 5.6, you can capture detailed and sharp images irrespective of the time of day. The E-PL3 has a minimum focus range of 9.8 inch and provides 35-area multiple Auto Focus with contrast detection.

The M. Zuiko Digital lens offers an optical zoom of 3x. The E-PL3's shutter speed of 60 - 1/4000 second allows you to capture delightful images of subjects even when they are in motion. In the Bulb mode, the shutter speed further reduces to 30 minutes. The ISO setting ranging from 200 - 12800 gives this camera the ability to capture noiseless photographs even in the dark. This camera is compatible with FL-50R, FL-36R, FL-50, FL-36, FL-20, FL-14 and FL-300R external flashes.

Features & Connectivity

 One of the highlights of this Olympus camera is the Art Filter which consists of 6 different types of special effects which include Pop Art, Soft Focus, Grainy Film, Pin Hole, Diorama and Dramatic Tone. These special filters give your images an artistic touch and help express your creativity when capturing images.

The Supersonic Wave Filter in the E-PL3 ensures that the image sensor remains free from dust and other particles. This camera offers a variety of scene modes which include Macro, Night Scene, Sunset and 3D for capturing perfect and impeccable images. The Olympus bridge camera comes with a Sensor Shift Image Stabilizer which makes sure that none of your photographs get distorted due minor shakes or jerks even at maximum zoom.

The Face Detection feature can detect up to 8 faces and optimize the image by focusing more on the faces and adjusting the aperture. You can take memorable group photographs with your family and loved ones using the self-timer which gives a delay of 2 or 12 seconds for you to join the group before clicking.

In the Sequential Shooting mode, this Olympus camera can click images at 5.5 fps. The E-PL3 camera records splendid videos in AVCHD / AVI Motion JPEG format and captures images in JPEG, RAW, JPEG+RAW and MPO format. The various connectivity features of the Olympus digital camera include USB 2.0 cable for connecting the camera to a laptop or PC in order to transfer images and HDMI port to connect to an HDTV for watching videos and images in high resolution. The combined Video and USB offers NTSC or PAL selection. Loaded with technology, this Olympus camera will never let you down when it comes to quality and reliability.
productAttributes.title: Olympus PEN Lite E-PL3 Mirrorless Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Panasonic introduces one of the smallest and lightest Micro Four Thirds cameras to hit the market, in its Lumix series, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2. This compact digital camera feels light in your pocket and offers plenty of features that help in shooting high quality images.

The GF2 is quite suitable for photography enthusiasts and offers quality with class. This Micro Four Thirds digital camera comes with a built-in 17.3 x 13.0 mm Live MOS Sensor which captures images at 12.10 megapixels. The Venus Engine Full HD processor ensures crystal clear Full HD video recording with 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution. This camera supports 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1 aspect ratios.

Body

 The sleek and trendy design of the Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2 digital camera is quite easy to hold and provides a good grip. The all-metal body casing adds quality to the overall build of the camera, which weighs 475 g including an SD Memory Card, Battery and H-FS014042 lens. The controls are placed ergonomically near the LCD Display providing an easy access to all the buttons. The 3 inch TFT LCD with Touch panel, has a resolution of 460000 dots and provides 100 percent field of view. The all new Graphical User Interface with the touch control makes it easy for users to operate this camera.

This Panasonic Lumix digital camera is compatible with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards providing you with the flexibility of increasing the memory capacity when necessary. The rechargeable Lithium Ion battery lets you take up to 300 images when fully charged.

Performance

 The most prominent feature of the Panasonic Lumix DMC- GF2 digital camera is that it can be mounted with various Micro Four Thirds compatible lenses like the Lumix G and Leica DG lenses. This Lumix DMC-GF2 camera has a focal length of 14 mm to 42 mm 35 mm camera equivalent 28 mm to 84 mm.

The aperture setting controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor when the shutter opens. The aperture range of this DMC-GF2 camera falls between f/3.5 - 5.6. The 14 - 42 mm Lumix G Vario Lens provides digital zoom up to 4x. The closest focusing distance by the DMC-GF2 is 0.3 m. This Panasonic camera also allows Manual Focus for a finer control while focusing on a subject.

With an ISO ranging from 100 - 6400, you can shoot sharp and colourful images even during low light conditions. The shutter speed of this Lumix digital camera ranges from 1/4000 - 60 seconds allowing you to take pictures of subjects even when they are in motion. The Panasonic Lumix camera features an impressive built-in flash which pops up when activated.

Features & Connectivity

 The stand-out feature in this Panasonic digital camera is the touch-control shooting. You get to experience a completely new way of shooting with this new interface which allows you to operate the auto focus and shutter release at the same time using just the touch-control.

The Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2 offers a list of shooting modes which help in shooting beautiful and lively photographs like Portrait, Soft Skin, Scenery, Architecture and a lot more. The built-in Optical Image Stabilizer in the Lumix DMC camera eliminates blurs and makes sure your photographs do not turn out grainy even at maximum zoom.

The self-timer gives a 2 or 10 seconds delay allowing you to join your family or bunch of friends for a group photograph. The Burst Shooting mode, when activated, shoots images at 3.2 fps High, 2.5 fps Medium and 2 fps Low settings. The GF2 mirror-less camera can record high resolution Full HD movies in AVCHD format which provides much more recording time than other formats.

The Face Recognition technology gives the Lumix camera an added advantage of automatically recognizing faces. Once faces get registered in this camera, next time you take a photo of them, it will bring up their name and automatically optimise the settings for sharp focus and exposure on them.

This Lumix camera is JPEG DCF, Exif 2.3, RAW, DPOF and MPO compatible when it comes to shooting still images. For motion images, this camera supports AVCHD and QuickTime Motion JPEG formats.

The mini HDMI connectivity allows you to connect this camera to an HDTV and watch the recorded videos in high resolution. The USB 2.0 connectivity allows you to transfer images and videos to your laptop or PC without any difficulty. You can also connect the Lumix camera to your TV using the AV connectivity cable. The Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF2 is one-of-a-kind Micro Four Thirds camera which comes with all the necessary features which is sure to meet your complete photography requirements.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic DMC-GF2 White

productAttributes.productDescription:
With an exterior inspired by old-school cameras and interiors that house the latest technology, this point and shoot camera is feature-packed. Belonging to Fujifilm's X series of stylish point and shoot cameras, the X10 is a perfect buy for photography enthusiast. The Fujifilm X10 digital camera has a focal length of 7.1 - 28.4 mm, which translates to a 35 mm equivalent of 28 - 112 mm.

This camera is fitted with a Fujinon optical zoom lens that can zoom up to 4x. You can manually control this zoom to suit your requirements, a luxury offered by few point and shoot cameras. To meet that extra distance, you can use the camera's 2x digital zoom and bring your subjects closer. The EXR CMOS sensor of this camera from Fujifilm lets you take impressive images at 12.0 megapixels.

Mighty sophisticated with its elegant design, this slim and compact digital camera is a classy companion. Retro to look at and modern to use, the Fujifilm X10 digital camera combines the best of both ages.

The back panel houses several direct control buttons and is neatly designed to give your digits ample room to move. On the top panel, you will find a mode dial, exposure compensation dial, function button and the all-important shutter release. The front panel also holds a switch to change focus modes.

Weighing only 350 g, this point and shoot camera fits with ease in your bag or purse. You can also record your memories in high quality, thanks to the Full HD video recording capability of this digital camera. Your videos are recorded at a resolution of 1280 x 1080 pixel 30 fps.

This compact camera runs on the high-performing EXR processor. The X10 camera is equipped with an optical viewfinder that helps you take images with higher precision. Alternatively, you can also compose images and video on Live View using the 2.8 inch TFT color LCD screen with a resolution of 460,000 dots.

Battery and Storage

For optimal storage of your captures, you can use SD, SDHC or SDXC UHS-I memory card. The Fujifilm X10 functions on a rechargeable lithium-ion battery pack that can shoot up to 640 images in LCD Off mode and 270 images in LCD On mode.

You can retrieve memories from your retro photography companion by simply connecting the X10 camera to a laptop or PC via high-speed USB 2.0 port. You can also view those rich images and videos on a big screen HDTV. All you have to do is link the camera to the television set via HDMI mini connector.

Performance

The aperture range of this point and shoot camera is f/2.0 W - f/2.8 T. To give you grain-free images even in dim light scenarios, the Fujifilm X10 digital compact camera has a wide light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 12800.

This camera has a shutter speed range of 1/4 - 1/4000 seconds in Auto mode, while in other modes the speed range is 30 - 1/4000 seconds. This Fujifilm X10 camera is armed with a built-in flash that has a range of 30 cm - 7 m W and 50 cm - 5 m T, giving you bright pictures even in poor light.

This camera uses TTL contrast auto focus system to give you sharp images always. The Fujifilm X10 digital camera has the ability to let you focus manually, giving you ample creative freedom. In Normal mode, you can focus from 50 cm W and 80 cm T onwards, while in Macro mode you can focus in the range of 10 cm - 3 m W and 50 cm - 3 m T. When required, you can also use the Super Macro mode that focuses in the range of 1 cm - 1 m.

Features

This Fujifilm X10 digital camera lets you explore several shooting modes like Fireworks, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Party, Text and more. You no longer have to worry about blurry images as this Fujifilm point and shoot camera has a lens-shift image stabilizer that compensates for any unwanted fuzziness.

This camera also has Face Recognition feature that lets you pre-tag faces that the camera will detect and identify henceforth. You can join your family and friends in memorable group photographs by using the self-timer feature, which can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. To capture every second of a fast-paced action sequence, choose the Continuous Shooting mode that shoots up to 10 fps in Super High.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix x10 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
One of the newest models in the Sony Cyber-shot series, the DSC-S5000 is an impressive point and shoot camera. This inexpensive digital camera is a good choice for those looking to enter the colourful world of digital photography. The S5000 camera has a focal length of 5 - 25 mm and 35 mm equivalent focal length of 30 - 150 mm at 16:9 aspect ratio.

The Sony Cyber-shot can zoom 5x optically and offers a digital zoom of 10x for getting close-up shots of subjects that are far. The built-in Super HAD CCD sensor captures vibrant and lively images at 14.1 megapixels. The sleek and lightweight Cyber-shot camera weighs only 172 g with accessories. The ergonomically designed Sony digital camera is built for functionality and has easily accessible control buttons and dials.

This camera is quite portable and can be easily carried in your pocket or handbag. The Sony S5000 can shoot wide images in Sweep Panorama mode with just a press of a button. You can capture detailed and animated images with this feature. In addition to 16:9, this camera also supports 4:3 aspect ratio. The 2.7 inch Clear Photo TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 230,400 dots and offers 5 levels of brightness.

Battery Storage

 The Sony digital camera is quite flexible when it comes to data storage. This Cyber-shot camera supports MS Duo, MS PRO Duo, MS PRO Duo- High Speed, MS PRO HG Duo, SD, SDHC, MS Micro, MS Micro Mark2, Micro SD and Micro SDHC memory cards to store images and videos.

The S5000 can be effortlessly powered by easily available AA Alkaline Batteries. When you run out of juice, just replace these batteries with new ones and you're ready to go. The Cyber-shot can capture up to 190 images in normal shooting conditions.

This Sony camera can be connected to your laptop or PC with USB 2.0 cable for transferring images and videos when the memory runs out. You can also connect the digital camera to a TV with the AV out. Additionally, the multi-use terminal allows you to connect to various other devices.

Performance

 The aperture setting controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. The Cyber-shot S5000 comes with an aperture ranging from f/3.2 - 9.1. This compact digital camera features Multi-Point auto focus which ensures quality images. The focus range starts at 10 cm W and 100 cm T in both, iAuto mode and in the Program Auto mode respectively.

The ISO sensitivity ranges from 100 - 3200 and lets your take vivid and clear images under different lighting conditions. The Cyber-shot has shutter speed ranging from 1/2000 - 2 seconds, which allows you to shoot flawless photographs even when the subjects are in motion. The Sony Cyber-shot has a built-in flash which covers a range of 0.5 - 3.0 m W and 0.5 - 1.5 m T when the ISO is set in Auto mode. At ISO 3200, the flash covers a range of 6.0 m W / 3.0 m T.

Features

 The Sony digital camera has an assortment of Scene Modes which include Landscape, Night Portrait, Beach, Snow and a lot more. This feature saves you a lot of time and also eliminates the need to manually change the settings of the camera in different shooting situations. The Sony digital camera has Artistic Picture Effects like Toy Camera, Partial Colour, Soft High-Key and Pop Colour which can be used while shooting images to give your photographs a personal touch.

You can capture high resolution videos with 640 x 480 pixels resolution at 30 fps. The Face Detection feature of the Cyber-shot camera can detect up to 8 faces and automatically adjust the camera's setting to capture perfect and faultless images. The S5000 also comes with Smile Detection feature which automatically releases the shutter on detecting a smiling face.

The self-timer feature gives you a delay of 2 or 10 seconds allowing you to join your family or friends for a group photograph. In the Burst Mode, this camera can shoot images at 1.1 fps. The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-S5000 is one of the best cameras which facilitates easy operation and offers features that make photography fun and entertaining.
productAttributes.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-S5000 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sony Cyber Shot Camera is a great point and shoot camera that will be handy for beginners and intermediates alike.

Sensor Technology with 14.1 MP

This camera is equipped with a powerful 14.1 MP CCD Sensor that can take amazing pictures across a wide range of lighting conditions.

Optical Zoom with 5 X

This Sony Cyber Shot Camera is able to Zoom up to a 5 X level that can let you get closer to the action without really having to move physically close to the subject. This zoom is more quality oriented than digital zoom as it involves the magnification of the image, and not the pixels as in digital zoom.

Intelligent Auto Mode

This Cyber Shot camera is also capable of the Intelligent Auto Mode where the camera is aware of the scene in front of it, and the sensor makes the necessary changes accordingly. This is also what sets the flash intensity in the auto mode, after analyzing the lighting conditions in the environment around the subject.

360 Sweep Panorama

The Cyber Shot camera is one of the few point and shoot devices that come with a 360 degree Sweep Panorama mode that can expand your creative horizons.

Power Source

This camera is powered by commonly available, conventional AA batteries that can be bought from almost any store around you. This way, you can always have a set of juiced up batteries on hand before you set off on a photographic adventure.

Say Cheese

The Smile Shutter Technology preset in the camera lets you automatically click pictures when the subject breaks into a smile.

LCD Monitor

The in-built 2.7 inch Clear LCD monitor lets you view all your pictures in the camera itself before having to get a computer just so you can view them. This monitor also doubles up as an effective viewfinder that helps you line up the perfect shot before you need to click it.

Nikon Coolpix AW100 Camouflage
Sony Cybershot DSC-W610 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix S6300 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
Dazzle your friends with photographs that will blow them away with its performance. The Nikon Coolpix S3300 is a handy little camera from the Nikon Style series of digital cameras. This digital point and shoot is ideal for everyone who is interested in recording special moments of their lives. The stylish S3300 has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.6 - 27.6 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 156 mm.

With the 6x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom, you can bring your subjects immeasurably closer for a detailed and sharp image, no matter how far away from you there are. The CCD image sensor allows you to take images at a 16 megapixel resolution, allowing you to enlarge images to bigger sizes without losing the integrity of the images.  

This digital camera weighs 128 g and is ergonomically designed for comfort and fit. This compact camera has a sleek design that fits in with all your plans seamlessly. The back panel features one-touch buttons for popular functions like movie recording, preview of images and menu selection. You can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The S3300 features the EXPEED C2 image processor that promotes high speed processing to deliver pictures that are crystal clear. Compose and preview your favorite photographs with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen. The screen features an anti-reflection coating that ensures your images are brightly visible even when you’re out in the sunlight, without any reflections.

Battery and Storage
The Coolpix S3300 can store photographs in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. The Nikon digital camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 210 shots on full charge. You can transfer photographs and videos from the camera to a computer or PC with the high speed USB port available on the Nikon S3300 digital camera.

Performance
The Coolpix S3300 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto Focus feature, you can focus in the range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele to take sharp photographs automatically.

The Coolpix S3300 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200, which indicates the light sensitivity of this camera. The Nikon camera has a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode for spectacular images. And you can use the built-in flash to take bright images even at night, with a functioning range of 0.5 - 4.5 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.4 m Tele.

Features
The Nikon Coolpix S3300 has 18 shooting modes like Snow, Food, Fireworks Show, Pet Portrait and more. In the Snow mode, the camera captures images with the whitest whites, making your photographs glow immeasurably. The lens-shift Vibration Reduction of the camera delivers blur-free photographs by compensating for hand-shake. The Face Tracking feature ensures that every face in the frame is in focus.

The Blink Proof feature lets you know when subjects have blinked or closed their eyes, so you can replace the first picture with a more perfect one again. The Smile Timer functions can identify when a smiling face enters the frame and can take a photograph automatically to record those precious moments.

The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you enough time to join your friends in front of the camera to be a part of every memory. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 6 images at 1.3 frames per second, which lets you record whole sequences of events seamlessly.
productAttributes.sizeVariants: [CAMD72H4FKNBV8YR, CAMD72H4QCFAFYZF, CAMD72H4S2K8QHGU, CAMD72H4SQZUCPCX, CAMD72H4WVMYWGEG, CAMD72H4XTPFMQAG, CAMD7FNWZHGFMFFP]
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S3300 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Pull out all the stops and explore photography with all guns blazing. The house of Nikon brings to you an everyday camera with unique features that will elevate your memories to another level altogether. The Nikon Coolpix S2600 is a trendy little camera from the Style series of digital point and shoots. The easy-to-use camera is ideal for regular use. The S2600 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm.

You never have to take a distant photograph again. The Coolpix digital camera sports a 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that can bring your subject 20x closer to you. The CCD image sensor lets you take high resolution pictures at a stunning 14 megapixels. This lets you blow up pictures to larger sizes without losing the sharpness of every detail.

This handy camera weighs a light 121 g and is tiny enough to fit in with all your plans, whether in a crowd or when you’re alone. The back panel features small buttons that are comfortable to use. One-touch buttons for video shooting, preview and menu controls revolutionize photography to new levels of convenience. You can also shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor of the Coolpix S2600 delivers high quality images while suppressing noise or grains. You can compose and preview your favorite moments with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen that has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

Your images are recorded on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, and can be accessed through memory card readers on your computer or laptop. You can alternately also transfer images from the camera to your computer with the high speed USB port to free up additional space for more photographs. Your camera will run on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 220 shots on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S2600 sports an aperture of f/3.2 - 6.5, which is the measure of the diaphragm of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto focus feature, you can focus on a subject in the range of 50 cm to infinity Wide and 80 cm onwards Tele.

Every camera has a different level of sensitivity to light, and this is measured in ISO. The Nikon Coolpix S2600 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200, which enables bright images even in low light situations. You can further augment your images with the built-in flash, which has a range of 0.5 - 4.5 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.2 m Tele. The shutter speed has a functioning range of 1/2000 - 1 sec on Auto mode and can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode for stunning images of bursts of light in the dark.

Features

The Coolpix S2600 features 18 shooting modes that optimize settings for popular settings. These include Night Portrait, Close-up, Sunset, Beach mode and more. In Sunset mode, the camera captures pictures with brighter reds and oranges for dramatic pictures of the sun. The electronic Vibration Reduction stabilizes images and ensures every detail is recorded in sharp detail.

The Blink Proof feature warns you when a subject has blinked in a photograph, so you can replace it with another picture that records the moment perfectly. With the Smile Timer function, the S2600 take a photograph automatically when it identifies a smiling face in the frame. This way, you can be sure to capture those heart-warming moments every time. 

The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, which gives you ample time to get in front of the camera to join your friends in every picture. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take a series of up to 8 pictures at 0.9 frames per second. This lets you record full sequences of actions, letting you video tape your children’s performances or a golf swing in its entirety. So go ahead and let the Nikon Coolpix S2600 change the way you chronicle the moments of your life.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S2600 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you have ever felt the itch to start a new hobby that will keep you company for many years to come, now is the time to start. Nikon brings to you a digital camera that is easy-to-use and convenient, even for first timers. The Nikon Coolpix S6300 belongs to the Style series of digital point and shoot cameras by Nikon. Ideal for everyday use, this camera comes packed with features that will blow you away.

The Coolpix S6300 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 45 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 250 mm. The lens sports a 10x optical zoom and up to 4x digital zoom that can be used to take close-up pictures of your subjects. The CMOS sensor of the Nikon point and shoot enables the 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

This compact camera is easy to carry around in your pocket or a handbag. The back panel features easy-to-reach one-touch buttons for video recording and menu controls. Weighing a light 160 g, this digital camera by Nikon will become a favorite take-along on vacations and social events. You can also shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The Coolpix S6300 is powered by the EXPEED C2 processor which captures clear shots even in low light situations. The 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels and features an anti-reflection coating that reduces glare on the screen, especially if you are standing under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

Your images are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. To open-up more space, you can also transfer photographs from the camera to your computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. The S6300 also features an HDMI mini connector Type C port that can be used to watch your Full HD videos on a large screen television. The Nikon S6300 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 230 shots on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S6300 features an aperture range of f/3.2 - 5.8, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. The Auto Focus feature of this camera has a functioning range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele. This lets you focus on your subject automatically, allowing you to enjoy the special moments in your life.

The Nikon digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which governs the clarity of your images under different light conditions. The shutter speed of this Nikon camera has a range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacularly lit up night skies. You can also use the built-in flash in the range of 0.5 - 5.6 m Wide and 1 - 3.1 m Tele to brighten your memories immeasurably.

Features

The S6300 features 19 scene modes like Close-up, Food, Museum, Pet Portrait and more. In Food mode, the camera delivers images that are vibrant and bright, making your food look tempting and succulent. The lens shift Vibration Reduction feature compensates for any shakes in your hand or by your subject, relaying blur-free and sharp images every time.

The face detection feature ensures that your subject’s faces are in sharp focus for crystal clear images of your favorite people. The Blink Proof function lets you know if a subject has blinked, letting you take another picture of those heart-warming moments. Smile Timer can identify when a person in the frame smiles, taking a picture automatically. This ensures you never miss out on adorable events.

Always join your friends in every picture now with the self-timer of the Coolpix S6300, which lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. The Continuous Shooting H mode lets you take images rapidly at 6 frames per second, capturing dramatic images of performances or sporting events. So go ahead and explore the world of photography with the Nikon Coolpix S6300 point and shoot digital camera.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S6300 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Nikon Coolpix L25 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

Nikon Coolpix L25 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Everyday photography can be a lot of fun when you have the ideal camera to keep you company while you’re chronicling the moments of your life. The Nikon Coolpix L26 is a handy camera that belongs to the Life series of point and shoot digital cameras from Nikon. The L26 is easy to use and is ideal for those who are new to the hobby of photography.

The Coolpix L26 features a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm. The camera sports an optical zoom of 5x and digital zoom of 4x. The CCD image sensor of the Nikon L26 lets you take pictures at a 16.1 megapixel resolution.

The compact Nikon L26 is designed for an increased level of comfort. The L26 weighs 164 g and can be slipped into your pocket and easily carried around, even in crowds or when you’re in a hurry. The buttons are all grouped closely on the back panel, making menu changes easy even when you’re in the middle of taking a photograph. You can record every moment of your precious memories in high definition video quality. The HD video mode captures footage at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor lets you take high quality photographs with minimum noise grains. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen enables you to preview and compose your images every time, ensuring that your photographs reflect your memories perfectly.

Battery and Storage

Photographs taken with this Nikon point and shoot camera are stored in SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. For further space, you can transfer images from the camera to a computer or PC using the high speed USB port of the Coolpix L26. This Nikon camera is powered by 2 AA size alkaline batteries that let you take up to 200 images on full charge. You can alternately use 2 Lithium Ion or rechargeable NiMh batteries and take up to 680 or 350 shots respectively, on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix L26 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor of the camera. The Auto Focus feature of the camera lets you focus in the range of 50 cm to infinity Wide and 80 cm onwards Tele. The camera sports a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600, which indicates that the camera is acutely sensitive to light and can take images in most light conditions.

The Coolpix L26 has a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode. This lets you take spectacular images of lights in the dark. The built-in flash of this Nikon digital camera has a functioning range of 0.5 - 3.6 m Wide and 0.8 - 1.7 m Tele, lighting up your subject dramatically for clear and sharp images, whether at dawn or dusk.

Features

Pictures taken in standard and popular settings will now be more breathtaking, with the 21 shooting modes available in this camera. These include Food, Museum, Panorama, Snow mode and more. In Food mode, the settings are optimized to make food look healthier and juicier, enhancing your photographs immeasurably. The electronic Vibration Reduction feature ensures that your pictures are stable and blur-free.

The Face Detection feature detects faces in the frame and ensures that the focus and exposure settings are optimum to catch them in sharp relief. The Smile Timer function captures a shot the instant it recognizes a smiling subject in the frame. In Blink Proof mode, the Coolpix L26 lets you know when a subject has blinked, letting you take another image to replace the earlier one.

The self-timer of this Nikon digital point and shoot camera lets you delay shutter release by 10 seconds, so that you never have to miss out on being in a picture with your friends and family ever again. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 4 images at 1.2 frames per second, and record long sequences in action for quirky and memorable photographs.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L26 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

Battery and Storage
The Coolpix S3300 can store photographs in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. The Nikon digital camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 210 shots on full charge. You can transfer photographs and videos from the camera to a computer or PC with the high speed USB port available on the Nikon S3300 digital camera.

Performance
The Coolpix S3300 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto Focus feature, you can focus in the range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele to take sharp photographs automatically.

Features

The Blink Proof feature lets you know when subjects have blinked or closed their eyes, so you can replace the first picture with a more perfect one again. The Smile Timer functions can identify when a smiling face enters the frame and can take a photograph automatically to record those precious moments.

The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you enough time to join your friends in front of the camera to be a part of every memory. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 6 images at 1.3 frames per second, which lets you record whole sequences of events seamlessly.

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you have ever felt the itch to start a new hobby that will keep you company for many years to come, now is the time to start. Nikon brings to you a digital camera that is easy-to-use and convenient, even for first timers. The Nikon Coolpix S6300 belongs to the Style series of digital point and shoot cameras by Nikon. Ideal for everyday use, this camera comes packed with features that will blow you away.

The Coolpix S6300 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 45 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 250 mm. The lens sports a 10x optical zoom and up to 4x digital zoom that can be used to take close-up pictures of your subjects. The CMOS sensor of the Nikon point and shoot enables the 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

This compact camera is easy to carry around in your pocket or a handbag. The back panel features easy-to-reach one-touch buttons for video recording and menu controls. Weighing a light 160 g, this digital camera by Nikon will become a favorite take-along on vacations and social events. You can also shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The Coolpix S6300 is powered by the EXPEED C2 processor which captures clear shots even in low light situations. The 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels and features an anti-reflection coating that reduces glare on the screen, especially if you are standing under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

Your images are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. To open-up more space, you can also transfer photographs from the camera to your computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. The S6300 also features an HDMI mini connector Type C port that can be used to watch your Full HD videos on a large screen television. The Nikon S6300 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 230 shots on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S6300 features an aperture range of f/3.2 - 5.8, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. The Auto Focus feature of this camera has a functioning range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele. This lets you focus on your subject automatically, allowing you to enjoy the special moments in your life.

The Nikon digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which governs the clarity of your images under different light conditions. The shutter speed of this Nikon camera has a range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacularly lit up night skies. You can also use the built-in flash in the range of 0.5 - 5.6 m Wide and 1 - 3.1 m Tele to brighten your memories immeasurably.

Features

The S6300 features 19 scene modes like Close-up, Food, Museum, Pet Portrait and more. In Food mode, the camera delivers images that are vibrant and bright, making your food look tempting and succulent. The lens shift Vibration Reduction feature compensates for any shakes in your hand or by your subject, relaying blur-free and sharp images every time.

The face detection feature ensures that your subject’s faces are in sharp focus for crystal clear images of your favorite people. The Blink Proof function lets you know if a subject has blinked, letting you take another picture of those heart-warming moments. Smile Timer can identify when a person in the frame smiles, taking a picture automatically. This ensures you never miss out on adorable events.

Always join your friends in every picture now with the self-timer of the Coolpix S6300, which lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. The Continuous Shooting H mode lets you take images rapidly at 6 frames per second, capturing dramatic images of performances or sporting events. So go ahead and explore the world of photography with the Nikon Coolpix S6300 point and shoot digital camera.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S6300 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Preserve the most beautiful and heart-felt moments of your life in style with the new digital camera from the house of Nikon. The Nikon Coolpix S9300 is from the Style series of point and shoot cameras. This stylish little camera is ideal for fashion conscious photographers who like an ideal mix of performance and good looks in their gadgets.

The Nikon S9300 features a focal length of 4.5 - 81 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 450 mm. The powerful 18x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom will work tirelessly to bring the subject of your admiration exceptionally close. The Nikon Style series camera has a CMOS sensor that enables 16 megapixels of beautiful photographs.

This compact camera weighs 215 g and can be conveniently transported over distances, long and short. Pop it into your pocket or in a backpack and you will be prepared to chronicle every moment of your adventures conveniently. The camera is elegantly designed, with buttons that are comfortable to use and easy to reach when you’re on a photo shooting spree. The controls on the top panel feature on a rotary dial that can easily be toggled on-the-move. Record videos to savor your favorite moments in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor boosts shooting speed to unimaginable new levels, recording images and movies with maximum image quality. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels comes in handy when you want to compose a perfect picture or want to preview the image you just took. The LCD screen also features an anti-reflection coating that reduces any unwanted glare on the screen when you’re in the sun.

Battery and Storage

Your images are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, which are easily replaceable when full. The Coolpix S9300 is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you shoot about 200 images on full charge. Be always prepared with enough battery life to take you through long events.

You can transfer images from your Nikon digital camera to a computer with the high speed USB port, and always have more space to take photographs. The HDMI mini connector Type C port can be used to connect your Coolpix digital camera to a large screen LCD television, so you can watch you Full HD videos and 16 megapixel images in full size.

Performance

The Coolpix S9300 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.9, which lets you experiment with different objects in the foreground and background of your images. The Auto focus of this point and shoot has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele. The light sensitivity of the camera ranges between ISO 125 - 3200, letting you take clear images with low noise grains even in dark scenes.

The shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec can also be reduced to 4 seconds in the Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacular images. Also use the built-in flash with a range of 0.5 - 5.1 m Wide and 1.5 - 3 m Tele to light up every corner of your memory for sharp images.

Features

This Coolpix point and shoot digital camera sports 19 scene modes that optimize settings automatically for traditional and popular scenes like Beach, Snow, Pet Portrait, 3D photography modes and more. In 3D photo mode, you can shoot images that can be played on a compatible 3D television for photographs that closely emulate real-life dimensions. The lens shift Vibration Reduction reduces blurs in images by compensating for unintentional shaking of the camera.

The face priority feature automatically recognizes faces in the frame and ensures they are in focus in every image. The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 secs, giving you ample time to join your friends and family in front of the lens for memorable images. In the Continuous Shooting mode, images are captured rapidly at 6.9 frames per second for electrifying effects of your subjects.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix S4300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Performance and quality come together to bring to you a camera that will blow you away with an experience crafted for professionals and hobbyists alike. The Nikon Coolpix P510 belongs to the Performance series of digital cameras that bring advanced features to the palm of your hands. Ideal for traveling and sports photographers, the Coolpix P510 features a 42x optical zoom and 2x digital zoom. Take close-up shots from a safe distance to analyze a golf swing or a running gazelle with the precision performance of this digital camera.

The Coolpix digital camera has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.3 - 180 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 - 1000 mm. The Nikon camera sports a CMOS image sensor that enables images at a resolution of 16.1 megapixels. 

The camera is designed like a professional DSLR, with a rounded grip on the front right panel that lets you hold on to your camera firmly. The back panel features a one-touch button for video recording, image preview and menu controls. The rotary dial lets you switch between modes like flash, timer and the likes. This Nikon point and shoot camera weighs 555 g and is reassuringly bulky in your hands. You can use the Nikon P510 to shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processing system delivers high-sensitivity performance which, in turn, provides crystal clear images every time. The P510 features an electronic viewfinder with a diopter adjuster that can be used to compose your images. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels and an anti-reflection coating that reduces glare on the screen when you’re standing under the bright sun. This screen is also tiltable to 82 degrees, which lets you take pictures even in awkward places as it affords a better angle of view.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix P510 has an internal memory of 90 MB in which you can store your photographs. You can also expand this memory with SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. The P510 is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. This lets you take up to 240 images on full charge. The high speed USB cable allows you to transfer images from your laptop to a computer or PC, making more space in your camera for additional images. The HDMI mini connector Type C allows you to beam your images and Full HD videos on a large screen television.

Performance

The Coolpix P510 features an aperture range of f/3 - 5.9, which controls the size of the lens opening that allows light to fall on the image sensor. The Auto focus feature has a functioning range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele, giving you a wide canvas of subjects to choose from. The light sensitivity of the camera has a range of ISO 100 - 3200, letting you take bright and sharp images even in low light situations.

Images in the dark will never be the same again, with a shutter speed of 1/4000 - 1 sec. You can take bright images even at night, with the additional built-in flash. The flash has a range of 0.5 - 8 m Wide and 1.5 - 4.5 Tele, which will light up every corner of the scene in front you.

Features

Experiment with the 16 shooting modes of this camera, like Snow, Pet Portrait, Landscape, Food and more. In these popular shooting modes, the settings are automatically adjusted to make you unique photographs bright and sharp, with emphasis on the right parts. The lens shift Vibration Reduction ensures that your images are blur-free by compensating for accidental camera shaking.

The face detection feature of the P510 identifies when the frame includes a face. It then adjusts settings to ensure the people in the frame are in sharp focus. The camera also features a built-in GPS with geo-tagging features. You can tag photographs depending on where you took them, and relive those moments in their entirety when you look at the photographs again in the future.

The self-timer lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and leave the camera on a stable surface to take blur-free images even in the dark. You could also use this to join friends in a photograph. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you capture snaps at 7 frames per second to record every heartwarming and adorable moment in your life.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix P510 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Canon IXUS 125 HS Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
When photography becomes larger than life and takes over as more than just a hobby, it becomes a lifestyle. Nikon acknowledges this transformation and brings to you a point and shoot camera that integrates into your new lifestyle seamlessly. The Nikon Coolpix L810 is a powerful digital camera, with features that will blow you away with their performance. If you are looking to up the ante in the game of photography, this camera will be the ideal companion to your adventures.

The Coolpix L810 has a focal length of 4 - 104 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 22.5 - 585 mm.  The camera sports an incredible 26x optical zoom and a 4x digital zoom which can take you closer for a detailed look of your subject. The CCD image sensor of this Nikon digital camera enables the 16.1 megapixel resolution of your images.

This point and shoot camera features a body design that is reminiscent of professional cameras. A rounded grip on the right front panel and the controls on the back panel make this an easy-to-use digital camera. All the buttons are places for ease of access while in the middle of a photo shoot. The L810 weighs 430 g - impressive for the amount of features that come packed in this camera. You can also record your favorite memories in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor of this Nikon digital camera enhances every function for superior performance. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels, giving you a clear and sharp impression of your images. The screen also features an anti-reflection coating that lets you use this LCD monitor even in when you’re under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

The camera stores images in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards that can be accessed through computers too. Images can also be transferred from your camera directly into your laptop or computer using the high speed USB port. The Nikon L810 is powered by 4 alkaline batteries that let you take up to 300 shots on full charge. This camera can also use Lithium or NiMh batteries, with which you can take up to 740 and 450 shots on full charge respectively. The HDMI Type C mini connector allows you to beam your photos and HD videos on a compatible large screen television.

Performance

The L810 features an aperture range of 3.1 - 5.9, which determines the amount of light falling on the image sensor of the camera. The Auto focus of the camera functions in the range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele. The Coolpix L810 also features a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600.

The Nikon L810 has a shutter speed range of 1/1500 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode. This lets you take magnificent and magical images of bursts of light in contrast with the dark blue sky. You can also light up your photographs with the built-in, pop-up flash that has a range of 0.5 - 5 m Wide and 1.5 - 2.5 m Tele.

Features

The Coolpix L810 digital camera boasts of 19 shooting modes that include exciting pre-programmed settings like Close-up, Food, Museum, 3D photography mode and more. In the 3D photography mode, the camera stitches together 2 images of the same scene taken from 2 different positions to give you a three dimensional image that can be played back on a compatible 3D television. The lens shift Vibration Reduction can automatically compensate for an unintentional tremor to deliver blur-free and sharp photographs.

The face detection feature of this Nikon Coolpix camera automatically identifies faces in a frame and optimizes exposure and focus settings to take flattering and striking images of your favorite people. The Blink Proof mode can alert you when a subject has blinked or closed their eye in an image, letting you replace it with a better one. The Coolpix L810 also comes with the Smile Timer, which takes a picture when it identifies a smiling face in the frame.

With the self-timer function, you can delay shutter release by 10 seconds, giving you enough time to join your friends and family in all your favorite photos. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you take up to 4 images at about 1.2 fps, letting you chronicle every endearing nuance of your subject for posterity. So go forth and explore the exciting new possibilities the Coolpix L810 offers you.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L810 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix S30 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gear up for a lifelong experience of fun and frolic in high resolution with Nikon’s new camera. From the Style series of photography, the Nikon Coolpix S9200 is a power-packed digital camera that will change the way you perceive the world forever. This digital point and shoot camera is ideal for the style-conscious photographer, both professionals and hobbyists.

The focal length of this Nikon digital camera is 4.5 - 81 mm, which is a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 450 mm. The Coolpix S9200 features a powerful 18x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that performs tirelessly to bring your subjects closer for detailed photographs. The S9200 features a CMOS image sensor that takes images at a very cool 16 megapixel resolution.

This feature-packed performance is encased in a compact, yet elegant body, with a groove on the right front panel that affords a comfortable grip on the camera when you’re shooting from a precarious angle. The Coolpix S9200 weighs 209 g and will fit in a bag or the pocket of your jacket conveniently. You can shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps for high definition home movies that look professional.

This Coolpix camera is powered by the EXPEED C2 image processor that delivers high speed shooting and many features effortlessly. You can compose and preview images in the 3 inch TFT LCD screen monitor that has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The preview screen also features an anti-reflection coating that will reduce glare and make viewing images in the sun a pleasure.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S9200 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 200 shots on full charge. The Nikon digital camera stores images on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, which can be replaced easily, owing to their easy availability. You can transfer images from your camera to a computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. You can also view your images and videos on a large screen television using the HDMI Type C mini connector port. 

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S9200 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.9, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. This lets you experiment with depth in your images. The Auto focus of this Coolpix camera has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele, focusing automatically on your subject for sharp photographs.

This digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which enables you to take bright images even in low light situations. The shutter speed has a functioning range of 1/2000 - 1 second, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacular images of fireworks and bright lights in an otherwise dark night. You can also use the built-in, pop-up flash, which has a range of 0.5 - 5.1 m Wide and 1.5 - 3 m Tele, to light up every image for sharp and blur-free images.

Features

The Coolpix S9200 has 19 shooting modes that make photography easier, like Food, Sports, Museum, Pet Portrait mode and many more. In the 3D photography mode, the camera captures 2 images of the same scene from 2 different positions to stitch them together for a realistic, 3 dimensional image that can be played on a compatible 3D television. The lens shift Vibration Reduction compensates for any camera-shake to deliver bright and sharp images every time. The Face Priority feature of this point and shoot digital camera automatically identifies and tracks faces in the frame to ensure the exposure and focus settings are optimized for them.

The self-timer of this camera delays shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, helping in taking blur-free images. This lets you leave the camera on a secure ledge or table to take the photo automatically, avoiding any unintentional shaking of the camera on your part. With the Continuous Shooting H mode, you can take images in a sequence at a speed of about 6.9 frames per second, which lets you capture multiple images with a single shutter release, preserving every one of your favorite moments perfectly.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Professional photography has been transformed many times over in the past, with new designs taking the market by storm. Nikon joins the technology revolution with its new line of mirror-less interchangeable lens cameras that combine power and style in one small and miraculous package.

The Nikon 1 V1 is a beautifully crafted SLR with all the wholesome goodness of a professional camera packed into the compact body of a point and shoot. Ideal for amateurs and serious photographers, the Nikon 1 camera features a 10.1 megapixel resolution that enhances your photography immeasurably.

This Nikon DSLR camera sports the EXPEED 3 image processor that delivers faster speeds and high image quality. The CMOS image sensor measures 13.2 x 8.8 mm and enables the fast performance of the camera and its light sensitivity. The camera can shoot images in both 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios, letting you watch your photographs on televisions or projectors. The camera can also shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels resolution and 60i, so you can chronicle special moments in high resolution quality.

Body

The 1 V1 weighs 383 g, when the battery and memory card have been installed. The body of the DSLR is designed to be ultra-compact, with a groove on the front right panel that lets you grip the body firmly. The simple back panel features the traditional buttons that are easy to reach when the camera is in use. The rotary dial lets you flip through modes on the fly. 

The electronic TFT LCD viewfinder has a resolution of 1,440,000 dot pixels with diopter controls that can be customized to fit the individual needs of every photographer. You can also use the 3 inch TFT LCD screen on the back panel to compose and preview your images. This screen has a resolution of 921, 000 dot pixels - bright enough to give you an accurate impression of how the image will look when printed.

Your photographs are saved on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. The Nikon 1 camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, which allows you to take up to 350 shots on full charge.

Performance

The camera body features a Nikon 1 mount that can accept interchangeable lenses. The lens included in this kit has a focal length of 10 - 30 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 27 - 81 mm. The lens has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.6, letting you take spectacular images on aperture-priority. The 3xx zoom lens gives you a slight zoom that can be experimented with when you’re a fair distance away from you subject.

The hybrid Auto Focus has modes like single-point, auto-area and subject tracking. The 1 V1 features 135 focus areas in single-point Auto Focus mode and 41 focus areas in auto-area Auto Focus mode. The light sensitivity of this mirror-less camera has a range of ISO 100 - 3200, letting you take bright images regardless of the time of the day or night.

The Nikon 1 V1 features both an electronic and mechanical shutter with a speed range of 1/16.000 - 30 seconds that let you take dramatic images even in the dark, or of a moving subject. The bulb mode allows you to leave the shutter open for as long as you keep the shutter release button depressed. The built-in flash lets you light up the scene to catch every move of your subject, every time.

Features and Connectivity

The dust shield glass protects you Nikon 1 system devoid of dirt particles for crystal clear images. The 1 V1 includes shooting modes like still image, Smart Photo Selector, Movie and Motion Snapshot that let you use automatic settings to shoot in popular settings with ease. The Vibration Reduction feature of the lens compensates for unintentional tremors to deliver sharp images at every click of the shutter release button.

The face priority mode can identify faces in the frame and optimize settings to ensure they are in sharp focus, for memorable pictures. The Nikon V1 features a self-timer that lets you delay shutter release by 2, 5 or 10 seconds. Leave your camera on a stable and secure ledge with the self-timer on, and be assured to get blur-free images automatically. On Continuous Shooting mode, you can capture images at 5, 10, 30 or 60 frames per second and record every nuance and expression of your subject for magical creations.

The camera captures images in RAW and JPEG formats, which are easy to edit and to transfer between storage devices. The Type C mini-pin HDMI connector lets you play your images and videos on large screen HD ready televisions, while the high speed USB connector lets you transfer images from your camera directly to a computer or PC. The Nikon 1 V1 therefore will be the most advanced yet convenient gadget you’ve ever experimented with.
productAttributes.title: Nikon 1 V1 Mirrorless Camera Black, 10-30 mm

productAttributes.productDescription:
You can now take professional looking photographs in ultimate style with the new ultra-thin Nikon 1 digital cameras. The revolutionary style of the Nikon 1 J1 digital SLR camera will be a pleasure to work with, especially with the pancake-lens that comes in the kit included with this DSLR camera. Ideal for those who pursue photography as a serious hobby, The J1 SLR camera delivers images at 10.1 megapixels.

The Nikon 1 DSLR camera is powered by the EXPEED 3 image processor which reduces noise grains in your photos with 2 powerful engines that work simultaneously to process up to 600 megapixels a second. The high-speed AF CMOS sensor measures 13.2 x 8.8 mm and augments the speedy performance of the J1 DSLR beautifully. 

The J1 lets you take photographs in 3:2 and 16:9 aspect ratios, encompassing all popular formats in one small device. You can also capture stunningly detailed videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution and 60 fps.

Body

The body of the 1 J1 weighs 277 g when the battery and memory card are in it, while the body alone weighs 234 g. This makes the Nikon digital SLR camera easy to transport, whether in a camera backpack or even slung over your shoulder. The smooth and rounded body of the camera fits easily in your hands and is comfortable to use, even in crowds.

The trendy back panel of the Nikon J1 is dominated by the 3 inch LCD monitor, which has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The rest of the panel features a rotary dial for shooting modes, one-touch buttons for preview, delete and menu controls and a 5-way switch that can be used to toggle between the settings of the camera. The simple controls of the camera provide a basic visage to front the powerful performance of this little DSLR camera by Nikon.

The Nikon 1 J1 supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards to store your photographs. The DSLR camera runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 230 shots on full charge.

Performance

The 1 J1 features a Nikon 1 mount that can accept interchangeable lenses, letting you take multiple kinds of images with a single camera. You can use F mount NIKKOR lenses with this camera. The lens in this kit features a focal length of 10 - 30 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 27 - 81 mm.

The lens has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.6, which controls the amount of light that the image sensor is exposed to. You can even zoom to a limited amount at full telephoto. This Nikon DSLR camera has a hybrid autofocus with an AF-assist illuminator that lets you be in control of how and where you focus. With single-point, auto area and subject tracking focus modes, the camera has 135 auto focus areas and 41 focus areas that can be achieved with the auto area focus mode.

With a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 3200, you have additional control on your photographs. The electronic shutter has a functioning speed of 1/16000 - 30 sec, with a bulb that lets you keep the shutter open for however long you need to compose spectacular images. The built-in pop-up flash synchronizes with the shutter to light up your canvass better, ensuring bright and sharp images every time.

Features and Connectivity

The dust-shield glass of the Nikon 1 J1 ensures that your camera system is protected from small dirt particles and preserved for long. With shooting modes like Smart Photo Selector, Motion Snapshot and more, you can diversify your portfolio to enhance it immeasurably.

With the face-priority AF function, you can be sure to capture every face in the frame to sharp perfection every time. The self-timer will delay shutter release by 2, 5 or 10 seconds, allowing the camera to stabilize and take blur-free images on its own. The Continuous Shooting mode can take up to 5 frames per second, while increasing that to 10, 30 or 60 fps in the Electronic Hi shutter mode. 

The Nikon SLR camera supports RAW and JPEG formats in image shooting and AAC in video shooting. You can transfer images from your camera to computer using the USB port, to free up additional space for more photographs. The Nikon J1 lets you watch your Full HD videos and high resolution images on a large screen television, with the HDMI Type C mini-pin connector.
productAttributes.title: Nikon 1 J1 Mirrorless Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
