productAttributes.title: Nikon 1 V1 White

productAttributes.productDescription:
Trendy, handy, compact, convenient, affordable and feature-packed; these are just a few words to describe this cool new point and shoot digital camera by Nikon. The Nikon Coolpix L25 belongs to the Life series of point and shoot cameras, that are designed for easy yet dramatic photography. This camera is ideal for daily use, to chronicle the moments of your life.

The Coolpix L25 has a focal length of 4 - 20 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm. You can take detailed images of distant objects with the 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom of the Nikon digital camera. The CCD image sensor of this point and shoot enables images at a 10.1 megapixel resolution.

This handy little digital camera is designed to fit to any kind of plan, be it a formal occasion or an evening party. The small camera fits comfortably in your hands, with controls that can be easily reached while taking pictures. The Nikon camera features one-touch buttons for video shooting and image preview, letting beginners adapt easily to a new hobby.

The Nikon Coolpix L25 weighs 171 g, which is light enough to slip into your jacket pocket without hassles. Record the precious moments of life, not only in still images but clear videos as well. The Coolpix L25 can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

This Nikon digital camera processes your images and delivers high quality pictures with low noise grains, thanks to the EXPEED C2 image processor. You can preview and compose images to look perfect with the 3 inch TFT LCD screen that has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

Images shot by you are saved on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. To free up further space, you can also transfer images and videos from your camera to a computer or PC with the high-speed USB port available in the camera. The Coolpix L25 runs on 2 alkaline batteries, and can also draw power from 2 Lithium or NiMh batteries. While using alkaline batteries, you can shoot up to 220 images on full charge. With Lithium batteries, you can shoot up to 680 pictures on full charge.

Performance

The Coolpix L25 features an aperture range of f/2.7 - 6.8, which is the measure of the lens diaphragm which controls the amount of light reaching the image sensor. With the Auto Focus feature of the Nikon Coolpix L25, you can focus in a range of 30 cm to infinity Wide and 60 cm onwards Wide.

This Coolpix camera has an ISO range of ISO 80 - 1600, which measures the camera’s sensitivity to light. The shutter speed of the Nikon L25 has a range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in the Fireworks show scene mode, letting you take splendid images of bursts of light on Diwali or other occasions. The built-in flash of the camera has a range of 0.3 - 4.2 m Wide and 0.6 - 1.6 m Tele, lighting up every corner of your memories for sharp and detailed images.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix L25 has 21 shooting modes like Party/Indoor, Snow, Food, Fireworks show and more. In Snow mode, you can shoot images with bright whites while avoiding washout of other colors. The electronic Vibration Reduction feature ensures that your images are blur-free and sharp, even if your hand or subject moved while the picture was being taken.

The face detection feature detects each face in a frame and ensures that the settings are optimized to get the faces in sharp focus. The blink proof feature lets you know when subjects have blinked or closed their eyes, letting you take another image. In smile timer mode, the camera automatically takes a picture when it detects a smiling face in the frame.

With the self-timer, you can delay the shutter release by 10 seconds and join your friends in every memorable image. On continuous mode, your camera can take up to 4 images at a speed of 1.2 frames per second, letting you record any sequence of action for a quirky set of photographs.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L25 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Pull out all the stops and explore photography with all guns blazing. The house of Nikon brings to you an everyday camera with unique features that will elevate your memories to another level altogether. The Nikon Coolpix S2600 is a trendy little camera from the Style series of digital point and shoots. The easy-to-use camera is ideal for regular use. The S2600 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm.

You never have to take a distant photograph again. The Coolpix digital camera sports a 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that can bring your subject 20x closer to you. The CCD image sensor lets you take high resolution pictures at a stunning 14 megapixels. This lets you blow up pictures to larger sizes without losing the sharpness of every detail.

This handy camera weighs a light 121 g and is tiny enough to fit in with all your plans, whether in a crowd or when you’re alone. The back panel features small buttons that are comfortable to use. One-touch buttons for video shooting, preview and menu controls revolutionize photography to new levels of convenience. You can also shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor of the Coolpix S2600 delivers high quality images while suppressing noise or grains. You can compose and preview your favorite moments with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen that has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels.

Battery and Storage

Your images are recorded on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, and can be accessed through memory card readers on your computer or laptop. You can alternately also transfer images from the camera to your computer with the high speed USB port to free up additional space for more photographs. Your camera will run on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 220 shots on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S2600 sports an aperture of f/3.2 - 6.5, which is the measure of the diaphragm of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto focus feature, you can focus on a subject in the range of 50 cm to infinity Wide and 80 cm onwards Tele.

Every camera has a different level of sensitivity to light, and this is measured in ISO. The Nikon Coolpix S2600 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200, which enables bright images even in low light situations. You can further augment your images with the built-in flash, which has a range of 0.5 - 4.5 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.2 m Tele. The shutter speed has a functioning range of 1/2000 - 1 sec on Auto mode and can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode for stunning images of bursts of light in the dark.

Features

The Coolpix S2600 features 18 shooting modes that optimize settings for popular settings. These include Night Portrait, Close-up, Sunset, Beach mode and more. In Sunset mode, the camera captures pictures with brighter reds and oranges for dramatic pictures of the sun. The electronic Vibration Reduction stabilizes images and ensures every detail is recorded in sharp detail.

The Blink Proof feature warns you when a subject has blinked in a photograph, so you can replace it with another picture that records the moment perfectly. With the Smile Timer function, the S2600 take a photograph automatically when it identifies a smiling face in the frame. This way, you can be sure to capture those heart-warming moments every time. 

The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, which gives you ample time to get in front of the camera to join your friends in every picture. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take a series of up to 8 pictures at 0.9 frames per second. This lets you record full sequences of actions, letting you video tape your children’s performances or a golf swing in its entirety. So go ahead and let the Nikon Coolpix S2600 change the way you chronicle the moments of your life.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S2600 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Everyday photography can be a lot of fun when you have the ideal camera to keep you company while you’re chronicling the moments of your life. The Nikon Coolpix L26 is a handy camera that belongs to the Life series of point and shoot digital cameras from Nikon. The L26 is easy to use and is ideal for those who are new to the hobby of photography.

The Coolpix L26 features a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm. The camera sports an optical zoom of 5x and digital zoom of 4x. The CCD image sensor of the Nikon L26 lets you take pictures at a 16.1 megapixel resolution.

The compact Nikon L26 is designed for an increased level of comfort. The L26 weighs 164 g and can be slipped into your pocket and easily carried around, even in crowds or when you’re in a hurry. The buttons are all grouped closely on the back panel, making menu changes easy even when you’re in the middle of taking a photograph. You can record every moment of your precious memories in high definition video quality. The HD video mode captures footage at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor lets you take high quality photographs with minimum noise grains. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen enables you to preview and compose your images every time, ensuring that your photographs reflect your memories perfectly.

Battery and Storage

Photographs taken with this Nikon point and shoot camera are stored in SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. For further space, you can transfer images from the camera to a computer or PC using the high speed USB port of the Coolpix L26. This Nikon camera is powered by 2 AA size alkaline batteries that let you take up to 200 images on full charge. You can alternately use 2 Lithium Ion or rechargeable NiMh batteries and take up to 680 or 350 shots respectively, on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix L26 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor of the camera. The Auto Focus feature of the camera lets you focus in the range of 50 cm to infinity Wide and 80 cm onwards Tele. The camera sports a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600, which indicates that the camera is acutely sensitive to light and can take images in most light conditions.

The Coolpix L26 has a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode. This lets you take spectacular images of lights in the dark. The built-in flash of this Nikon digital camera has a functioning range of 0.5 - 3.6 m Wide and 0.8 - 1.7 m Tele, lighting up your subject dramatically for clear and sharp images, whether at dawn or dusk.

Features

Pictures taken in standard and popular settings will now be more breathtaking, with the 21 shooting modes available in this camera. These include Food, Museum, Panorama, Snow mode and more. In Food mode, the settings are optimized to make food look healthier and juicier, enhancing your photographs immeasurably. The electronic Vibration Reduction feature ensures that your pictures are stable and blur-free.

The Face Detection feature detects faces in the frame and ensures that the focus and exposure settings are optimum to catch them in sharp relief. The Smile Timer function captures a shot the instant it recognizes a smiling subject in the frame. In Blink Proof mode, the Coolpix L26 lets you know when a subject has blinked, letting you take another image to replace the earlier one.

The self-timer of this Nikon digital point and shoot camera lets you delay shutter release by 10 seconds, so that you never have to miss out on being in a picture with your friends and family ever again. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 4 images at 1.2 frames per second, and record long sequences in action for quirky and memorable photographs.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L26 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Dazzle your friends with photographs that will blow them away with its performance. The Nikon Coolpix S3300 is a handy little camera from the Nikon Style series of digital cameras. This digital point and shoot is ideal for everyone who is interested in recording special moments of their lives. The stylish S3300 has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.6 - 27.6 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 156 mm.

With the 6x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom, you can bring your subjects immeasurably closer for a detailed and sharp image, no matter how far away from you there are. The CCD image sensor allows you to take images at a 16 megapixel resolution, allowing you to enlarge images to bigger sizes without losing the integrity of the images.  

This digital camera weighs 128 g and is ergonomically designed for comfort and fit. This compact camera has a sleek design that fits in with all your plans seamlessly. The back panel features one-touch buttons for popular functions like movie recording, preview of images and menu selection. You can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps.

The S3300 features the EXPEED C2 image processor that promotes high speed processing to deliver pictures that are crystal clear. Compose and preview your favorite photographs with the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen. The screen features an anti-reflection coating that ensures your images are brightly visible even when you’re out in the sunlight, without any reflections.

Battery and Storage
The Coolpix S3300 can store photographs in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. The Nikon digital camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 210 shots on full charge. You can transfer photographs and videos from the camera to a computer or PC with the high speed USB port available on the Nikon S3300 digital camera.

Performance
The Coolpix S3300 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 6.5, which is the measure of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto Focus feature, you can focus in the range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele to take sharp photographs automatically.

The Coolpix S3300 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200, which indicates the light sensitivity of this camera. The Nikon camera has a shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show mode for spectacular images. And you can use the built-in flash to take bright images even at night, with a functioning range of 0.5 - 4.5 m Wide and 0.5 - 2.4 m Tele.

Features
The Nikon Coolpix S3300 has 18 shooting modes like Snow, Food, Fireworks Show, Pet Portrait and more. In the Snow mode, the camera captures images with the whitest whites, making your photographs glow immeasurably. The lens-shift Vibration Reduction of the camera delivers blur-free photographs by compensating for hand-shake. The Face Tracking feature ensures that every face in the frame is in focus.

The Blink Proof feature lets you know when subjects have blinked or closed their eyes, so you can replace the first picture with a more perfect one again. The Smile Timer functions can identify when a smiling face enters the frame and can take a photograph automatically to record those precious moments.

The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you enough time to join your friends in front of the camera to be a part of every memory. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 6 images at 1.3 frames per second, which lets you record whole sequences of events seamlessly.
productAttributes.sizeVariants: [CAMD72H4CGRX9ERF, CAMD72H4FKNBV8YR, CAMD72H4QCFAFYZF, CAMD72H4S2K8QHGU, CAMD72H4SQZUCPCX, CAMD72H4WVMYWGEG, CAMD72H4XTPFMQAG]
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S3300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you have ever felt the itch to start a new hobby that will keep you company for many years to come, now is the time to start. Nikon brings to you a digital camera that is easy-to-use and convenient, even for first timers. The Nikon Coolpix S6300 belongs to the Style series of digital point and shoot cameras by Nikon. Ideal for everyday use, this camera comes packed with features that will blow you away.

The Coolpix S6300 features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 45 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 250 mm. The lens sports a 10x optical zoom and up to 4x digital zoom that can be used to take close-up pictures of your subjects. The CMOS sensor of the Nikon point and shoot enables the 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

This compact camera is easy to carry around in your pocket or a handbag. The back panel features easy-to-reach one-touch buttons for video recording and menu controls. Weighing a light 160 g, this digital camera by Nikon will become a favorite take-along on vacations and social events. You can also shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The Coolpix S6300 is powered by the EXPEED C2 processor which captures clear shots even in low light situations. The 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels and features an anti-reflection coating that reduces glare on the screen, especially if you are standing under the bright sun.

Battery and Storage

Your images are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. To open-up more space, you can also transfer photographs from the camera to your computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. The S6300 also features an HDMI mini connector Type C port that can be used to watch your Full HD videos on a large screen television. The Nikon S6300 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that can take up to 230 shots on full charge.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S6300 features an aperture range of f/3.2 - 5.8, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. The Auto Focus feature of this camera has a functioning range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1 m to infinity Tele. This lets you focus on your subject automatically, allowing you to enjoy the special moments in your life.

The Nikon digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which governs the clarity of your images under different light conditions. The shutter speed of this Nikon camera has a range of 1/2000 - 1 sec, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacularly lit up night skies. You can also use the built-in flash in the range of 0.5 - 5.6 m Wide and 1 - 3.1 m Tele to brighten your memories immeasurably.

Features

The S6300 features 19 scene modes like Close-up, Food, Museum, Pet Portrait and more. In Food mode, the camera delivers images that are vibrant and bright, making your food look tempting and succulent. The lens shift Vibration Reduction feature compensates for any shakes in your hand or by your subject, relaying blur-free and sharp images every time.

The face detection feature ensures that your subject’s faces are in sharp focus for crystal clear images of your favorite people. The Blink Proof function lets you know if a subject has blinked, letting you take another picture of those heart-warming moments. Smile Timer can identify when a person in the frame smiles, taking a picture automatically. This ensures you never miss out on adorable events.

Always join your friends in every picture now with the self-timer of the Coolpix S6300, which lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. The Continuous Shooting H mode lets you take images rapidly at 6 frames per second, capturing dramatic images of performances or sporting events. So go ahead and explore the world of photography with the Nikon Coolpix S6300 point and shoot digital camera.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S6300 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The extremely capable and fully loaded HDR-CX260VE from Sony’s highly successful HDR series of high definition camcorders, gives you the opportunity to capture and relive all those precious memories in high definition. With a very user-friendly and sleek body design, this sophisticated camcorder sports an advanced Exmor R CMOS Image Sensor; this camcorder has an effective still image resolution of 8.9 megapixels.

The combining of the Exmor R CMOS sensor and a powerful BIONZ image processor, this camcorder has the ability to record stunning full high definition videos at 1080p resolution and also capture high quality images with a maximum resolution of 3984 x 2240 pixels. The high quality images are captured and saved in the JPEG file format while the videos are saved in the MPEG2-PS format for standard definition and in the MPEG4-AVC/H.264 AVCHD format while recording in high definition.

The video recording mode also records the corresponding audio through the camcorder’s built-in zoom microphone and is saved in 2 channel Dolby Digital Stereo file format. This camcorder further employs Sony’s trademark Optical SteadyShot image stabilization technology to ensure that your captured videos and images appear blur-free, even if the event of shake or movement during recording.

Body

With a reduced weight of 205 g which is excluding the battery and memory card, this stylish and ultra-portable camcorder is designed to effortlessly fit in small spaces like a jacket pocket or a handbag, so you can effortlessly carry it around everywhere you go. The sizeable 3 inch Clear Photo LCD Touch Screen has a brilliant display resolution of 230,000 dots. This LCD touchscreen has a turning angle of up to 270 degrees that offers you clear and convenient viewing of all your high quality images and videos.

All the recorded media on the HDR-CX260VE can be stored in the camcorders 16 GB of internal flash memory. It also has the option of expandable external memory in the form of a memory card slot, which is compatible with Memory Stick PRO Duo/ PRO-HG Duo, SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. All the operations on this Sony camcorder are achieved through a very efficient NP-FV50 rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

Performance

Operating through the highly regarded Sony G Lens, this camcorder has a focal length of 2.1 mm - 63 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 36.5 mm - 1095 mm, which gives you 30x optical zoom and an unprecedented 350x of digital zoom. The camcorder’s magnification capability is further enhanced by the availability of a 55x extended zoom, giving you clear and sharp images of distant objects.

The intelligent autofocus system on this Sony camcorder employs the contrast detection technology, giving you an extended depth of field with a macro focus range of 44 cm. With an aperture control range of f/1.8 - f/3.2, on this Sony camcorder gives you the ability to control the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. With a shutter speed ranging from a maximum of 1/10000 sec and a minimum of 1/8 sec, the HDR-CX260VE is more than capable of capturing clear or dramatic images of fast moving objects and even night or low light events.

Features & Connectivity

With a whole host of preset shooting and white balancing modes, the HDR-CX260VE is capable of perfectly functioning in very specific situations or unfavourable conditions that require specialized adjustments.

The presence of Face Detection on this camcorder recognizes faces within the frame and optimizes exposure and focus settings specifically for them. Another very sophisticated and extremely useful new feature is the GPS automatic geotagging which automatically matches date and time information from photos with location information with the help of an inbuilt GPS unit.

The addition of a self-timer function on this camcorder lets you delay shutter release by 10 seconds, giving you enough time to compose a frame and also be part of the photograph. It is also a great tool for capturing self-portraits and for those perfect group shots.

The transfer of all the recorded media files can be done to a computer or a laptop via the camcorder’s Type A USB, mini-AB USB or Hi-speed USB 2.0 port. The HDR-CX260VE’s composite AV out and an HDMI mini port along with BRAVIA sync gives you the option of viewing the images and videos on a standard or a high definition television.
productAttributes.title: Sony HDR-CX260 Camcorder Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
All your favourite and unforgettable memories can now be preserved in high quality with instant access with the Sony HDR-CX190E. Belonging to Sony’s highly successful HDR series of high definition camcorders, the HDR-190E sports a stylish and sleek body that makes it increasingly efficient and highly portable. Sporting a highly advanced Exmor R CMOS Image Sensor, this camcorder has an effective sensor resolution of 1.31 megapixels.

The combining of the CMOS sensor and a powerful BIONZ image processor, this camcorder has the ability to record stunning 1080p Full HD videos and also capture high quality images with a maximum resolution of 3072 x 1728 pixels. The high quality images are captured in the JPEG file format while the videos are saved in the MPEG2-PS format for standard definition and in the MPEG4 AVC format while recording in high definition.

The audio recording while in video mode is captured by the camcorders built-in zoom microphone and reproduced in Dolby Digital 2 channel stereo or Dolby Digital Stereo Creator format. The SteadyShot image stabilizer ensures that your videos and images appear blur-free, even if the camcorder experiences shake or movement during recording. 

Body

Weighing just 168 g excluding the battery and memory card, this compact and ultra-portable camcorder is designed to effortlessly fit in small spaces like a jacket pocket or a backpack, letting you carry it around everywhere you go. The 2.7 inch Clear Photo LCD with a brilliant display resolution of 230,000 dots giving you high quality viewing of your saved images and videos.

All the recorded media on the HDR-CX190E can be stored in a Memory Stick PRO Duo/ PRO-HG Duo, SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards. All the operations on this Sony camcorder are done using the power supplied by a very efficient NP-FV30 rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

Performance

The HDR-CX190E sports a Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with Primary RGB Colour Filter that has a focal length of 2.5 mm - 62.5 mm which is the 35 mm equivalent of 36 mm - 1080 mm. This gives the camcorder an optical zoom of 25x and a digital zoom of 300x. There is also the availability of a 30x extended zoom feature to ensure that all your distant subjects are captured with great clarity.

The TTL or through the lens contrast detection autofocus system with a macro focus range of 39 cm, ensures the sharpness of the subject in focus, giving you clear and undisturbed footage. The aperture control on this Sony camcorder has a range of f/1.8 - f/3.2, which gives you the ability to control the lens opening which in turn controls that amount of light that falls on the image sensor. With a shutter speed ranging from a maximum of 1/10000 sec and a minimum of 1/8 sec, the HDR-CX190E is more than capable of capturing fast moving objects or even create a dramatic reproduction of a particular moment, especially under low light.

Features & Connectivity

With a whole host of perset shooting and white balancing modes, the HDR-CX190E is capable of working to its efficient best even under very specific situations or unfavourable conditions. The presence of Face Detection on this camcorder recognizes faces within the frame and optimizes exposure and focus settings specifically for them. The addition of a self-timer function lets you delay shutter release by 10 seconds, giving you enough time to compose a frame and be part of the photograph.

The HDR-CX190E lets you transfer all your captured images and videos on to a PC or a laptop by using its Type A, mini-AB/USB 2.0 port. This camcorder further features a composite AV out along with a HDMI mini port so that you get the added luxury of viewing all your captured files on high definition or a standard definition television.
productAttributes.title: Sony HDR-CX190E Camcorder Camera

productAttributes.productDescription:
An exciting tool for photo enthusiasts and belonging to the Samsung WB series of highly capable digital cameras is the WB150F. Loaded with an extensive range of advanced features and functions that includes long-range zoom and Wi-Fi connectivity, the Samsung WB150F is perfectly suited for frequent travellers. The HD video recording feature further sweetens the deal.

This Samsung point and shoot digital camera features an ultra-wide 24 mm Schneider KREUZNACH optical lens. This wide angle lens comes with a focal length of 4 – 72 mm or a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 24 – 432 mm with 18x optical zoom. This considerable optical zoom is complemented by a digital zoom capacity of 5x on still mode and an impressive 14.4x on the play mode.

Operating a very capable CCD Image Sensor, the WB150F comes with a striking 14.2 megapixel resolution to help you capture high quality images and videos. This extremely capable camera comes enclosed in an attractive and compact body shell that manages to weigh 188.2 g discounting the battery and memory card, giving the WB150F a great deal of portability.

One of the most exciting features on this Samsung digital camera is the Wi-Fi connectivity. This built-in wireless data transfer capability lets you instantly share your files with other Wi-Fi devices, upload images and videos directly onto social networking sites or even directly email the files to your desired destination. All the saved files can be viewed on the camera’s 3 inch TFT LCD with a 460,000 dot resolution which also doubles up as the live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

Powered by a SLB-10A rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the WB150F uses either an SDSC, SDHC or SDXC memory card to store all the captured images and videos. These memory cards have an expandable memory of up to 2 GB SDSC, 32 GB SDHC and 64 GB SDXC giving the WB150F a very expansive memory capacity. These saved files can easily be transferred by using the Wi-Fi connectivity or the high-speed USB 2.0 port. Apart from an AV out that transmits both PAL and NTSC signals, this camera uses its Wi-Fi capability to connect directly to a Wi-Fi enabled HDTV.

Performance

With an aperture control with a range of f/3.2 W – f/5.8 T and light sensitivity or ISO speed that ranges from ISO 80 to ISO 3200, the WB150F has the ability to capture clear and crisp images without being affected by the available light. This Samsung digital camera operates a wide variety of shutter speeds with the fastest of 1/2000 sec and the slowest at 16 sec.

The TTL or through the lens autofocus function on the WB150F has a range of 80 cm Wide and 350 cm Tele to infinity. This when combined with a macro range of 5cm Wide and 180 cm Tele gives you incredible depth of field to operate with. To assist you with macro and medium range photography, the camera also features a built-in flash unit which on auto ISO has a range of 0.3 m - 3.38 m Wide and 0.5 m - 1.51 m Tele.

Features

This compact digital camera comes with a wide range of pre-set white balancing and shooting modes that let you control or choose the tone and temperature of the image. Using Optical Image Stabilization technology, the WB150F makes sure that the captured images and videos appear sharp and shake free.

The presence of Red Eye Reduction and Face Detection technology helps to automatically detect, focus and optimize the settings to achieve the maximum clarity of human faces within the frame. The camera has a video recording option that allows you to capture HD videos with 1280 x 720 resolution at 30 fps. The self-timer function gives the Samsung WB150F a 2 and 10 sec shutter release delay giving you the opportunity to catch those great group shots and self-portraits.
productAttributes.title: Samsung WB150F Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Daily-use cameras can be a drag to use, unless they combine power with fashion for an enhanced performance. The Canon PowerShot A2400 IS is an innovative camera that brings super-fast shooting to the palm of your hands in style. From the A series of cameras from the house of Canon, the PowerShot digital camera will be an ideal buy or gift for anyone who wants to take up photography as a hobby.

The A2400 IS sports a focal length of 5 - 25 mm, with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm. You can zoom and get closer to your subject with the 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom. The CCD image sensor of this camera enables the crystal clear 16 megapixel resolution of your images.

The compact camera weighs an incredible 126 g, slipping conveniently into your bag or pocket. The back panel features buttons and controls that make shooting images conveniently simple. Easy to carry to different events, the Canon A2400 IS will change the way you record your favorite memories. You can even record videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution with this camera.

The DIGIC 4 engine of the camera speeds up shooting for quick processing of your photographs. In 4:3 aspect ratio, your images can adapt to any media playing device for clear and large images. Use the 2.7 inch TFT LCD screen on the back panel to preview and compose your images, as the 230,000 dot pixel resolution will give you a good idea of what the final image will look like.

Battery and Storage

The PowerShot A2400 IS supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards to store your images. You can use the high speed USB port to transfer images from your camera to a laptop or computer and always have space on your camera to record your favorite memories. The Canon camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 190 shots on full charge. This ensures your camera lasts to the end of every event.

Performance

With an aperture of f/2.8 - 6.9, you can take photographs with interesting effects and experiment with depth in your images. The Auto focus feature lets you focus in the range of 3 cm onwards Wide and 1.2 m to infinity Tele. The camera features a light sensitivity of ISO 100 - 1600, letting you take bright and noise-free images even in low light scenes.

The Canon A2400 IS has a shutter speed of 1/2000 - 15 sec, which lets you capture stunning images even in the dark. You can also light up dark scenes with the built-in flash of the camera, which has a functioning range of 50 cm - 3 m Wide and 1 - 2 m Tele.

Features

Shooting modes like Toy Camera Effect, Fireworks, Discreet, Poster Effect and more make photography easy, with settings optimized for popular scenes. The Toy Camera Effect mode darkens the edges of the photos for a vignetting effect. The optical image stabilization system of the camera automatically corrects any shake felt in the camera for steady and sharp images.

The face detection feature ensures that any face identified in a frame is kept in sharp focus for every image. The Face Self-Timer effect takes a photograph when a face enters the frame, giving you ample time to set you camera down and get in front of it for a group photograph that captures all the joy of the moment perfectly.

In the Continuous Shooting mode, the camera allows you to take up to 2.8 shots per second in Low Light mode and up to 0.8 shots per second in Auto mode. This lets you perfectly chronicle every small aspect change in your subject for adorable and heart-warming photographs of your favorite people.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A2400 IS Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Canon’s new PowerShot camera comes with set of features that are performance-driven as much as they are powerful. The Canon PowerShot G1 X is an intelligent camera, with a range of functions that will revolutionize photography for many generations to come. From the new G series of innovative cameras from Canon, the G1 X is ideal for those migrating to serious photography and looking to hone their skills.

This mighty camera boasts of a focal length of 15.1 - 60.4 mm, which translates to a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 112 mm. The 4x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom enhance your photographs by bringing people and subjects closer for a more detailed look. The CMOS sensor of the Canon G1 X lets you take magnificent images at a 14.3 megapixel resolution.

The PowerShot G1 X sports a classic look that is a throwback to the analog cameras of yesteryears. A textured patch on the front and back panel give you a firm grip on your camera, while all the buttons and controls are at a comfortable distance from each other, allowing for convenient handling of the Canon digital camera.

Weighing an impressive 534 g, this camera will be a great take-along to day-long events that require resilient and continuous performance. You can shoot high-resolution Full HD videos with this point and shoot camera at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 24 fps. The DIGIC 5 processor delivers high speed shooting with equanimity, for low noise photographs that will impress your friends and colleagues.

The G1 X processes images in 4:3 aspect ratio, which is ideal to play on larger media devices. The optical viewfinder lets you compose your images to perfection. You can also use the 3 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 922,000 dot pixels to compose and preview your images before keeping them, ensuring you keep only the best and memorable photographs.

Battery and Storage

The Canon PowerShot camera records your images on SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. The Lithium Ion battery of the PowerShot camera lets you take up to 250 images on full charge, lasting through entire events without needing a charge. Images stored in your camera can be transferred to a computer or laptop using the USB high speed port. You can also enjoy your handiwork on a large-screen television with the HDMI port provided in the Canon digital camera.

Performance

The PowerShot G1 X features an aperture range of f/2.8 - 5.8, which is the size of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. The Canon camera features Auto focus that has a range of 20 cm onwards Wide and 85 cm to infinity Tele. The PowerShot digital device has a shutter speed range of 60 - 1/4000 sec, which lets you control the speed of the shutter, and hence the sharpness of every image.

The Canon point and shoot camera features a light sensitivity of ISO 100 - 12800, giving you a wide range of light scenarios in which you can shoot sharp and bright images. The built-in flash of this PowerShot camera has a functioning range of 50 cm - 7 m Wide and 1 - 3.1 m Tele, which lights up every corner of your memory for sharp and defined photos of your favorite moments.

Features

The PowerShot camera feature shooting modes like Landscape, Beach, Foliage, Snow, Fireworks mode and more, which optimize your camera settings for popular scenes. Your images will be blur-free and sharp, thanks to the lens-shift image stabilizer that compensates for incidental hand-shake.

The Canon PowerShot G1 X has a face detection feature that can identify and track faces in a frame to optimize exposure and focus settings for them. The Smile Timer function can take an image automatically when it identifies a smiling face in the frame. With the Wink self-timer, the camera will take a picture a few seconds after it identifies a winking subject, letting you trigger shutter release whichever way you want.

The camera also functions on the traditional self-timer, which lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds so you can join your subjects in a picture. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take pictures at 1.9 shots per second in P mode and 4.5 shots per second in High-speed Burst HQ mode to record every instance in amazing photographs. Let the Canon PowerShot G1 X complement your photography and take it to newer levels of excellence.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot G1 X Point & Shoot Camera

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gear up for a lifelong experience of fun and frolic in high resolution with Nikon’s new camera. From the Style series of photography, the Nikon Coolpix S9200 is a power-packed digital camera that will change the way you perceive the world forever. This digital point and shoot camera is ideal for the style-conscious photographer, both professionals and hobbyists.

The focal length of this Nikon digital camera is 4.5 - 81 mm, which is a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 450 mm. The Coolpix S9200 features a powerful 18x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that performs tirelessly to bring your subjects closer for detailed photographs. The S9200 features a CMOS image sensor that takes images at a very cool 16 megapixel resolution.

This feature-packed performance is encased in a compact, yet elegant body, with a groove on the right front panel that affords a comfortable grip on the camera when you’re shooting from a precarious angle. The Coolpix S9200 weighs 209 g and will fit in a bag or the pocket of your jacket conveniently. You can shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps for high definition home movies that look professional.

This Coolpix camera is powered by the EXPEED C2 image processor that delivers high speed shooting and many features effortlessly. You can compose and preview images in the 3 inch TFT LCD screen monitor that has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The preview screen also features an anti-reflection coating that will reduce glare and make viewing images in the sun a pleasure.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S9200 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 200 shots on full charge. The Nikon digital camera stores images on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, which can be replaced easily, owing to their easy availability. You can transfer images from your camera to a computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. You can also view your images and videos on a large screen television using the HDMI Type C mini connector port. 

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S9200 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.9, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. This lets you experiment with depth in your images. The Auto focus of this Coolpix camera has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele, focusing automatically on your subject for sharp photographs.

This digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which enables you to take bright images even in low light situations. The shutter speed has a functioning range of 1/2000 - 1 second, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacular images of fireworks and bright lights in an otherwise dark night. You can also use the built-in, pop-up flash, which has a range of 0.5 - 5.1 m Wide and 1.5 - 3 m Tele, to light up every image for sharp and blur-free images.

Features

The Coolpix S9200 has 19 shooting modes that make photography easier, like Food, Sports, Museum, Pet Portrait mode and many more. In the 3D photography mode, the camera captures 2 images of the same scene from 2 different positions to stitch them together for a realistic, 3 dimensional image that can be played on a compatible 3D television. The lens shift Vibration Reduction compensates for any camera-shake to deliver bright and sharp images every time. The Face Priority feature of this point and shoot digital camera automatically identifies and tracks faces in the frame to ensure the exposure and focus settings are optimized for them.

The self-timer of this camera delays shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, helping in taking blur-free images. This lets you leave the camera on a secure ledge or table to take the photo automatically, avoiding any unintentional shaking of the camera on your part. With the Continuous Shooting H mode, you can take images in a sequence at a speed of about 6.9 frames per second, which lets you capture multiple images with a single shutter release, preserving every one of your favorite moments perfectly.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9200 Point & Shoot Camera Brown

productAttributes.productDescription:
Preserve the most beautiful and heart-felt moments of your life in style with the new digital camera from the house of Nikon. The Nikon Coolpix S9300 is from the Style series of point and shoot cameras. This stylish little camera is ideal for fashion conscious photographers who like an ideal mix of performance and good looks in their gadgets.

The Nikon S9300 features a focal length of 4.5 - 81 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 450 mm. The powerful 18x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom will work tirelessly to bring the subject of your admiration exceptionally close. The Nikon Style series camera has a CMOS sensor that enables 16 megapixels of beautiful photographs.

This compact camera weighs 215 g and can be conveniently transported over distances, long and short. Pop it into your pocket or in a backpack and you will be prepared to chronicle every moment of your adventures conveniently. The camera is elegantly designed, with buttons that are comfortable to use and easy to reach when you’re on a photo shooting spree. The controls on the top panel feature on a rotary dial that can easily be toggled on-the-move. Record videos to savor your favorite moments in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixels and 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processor boosts shooting speed to unimaginable new levels, recording images and movies with maximum image quality. The 3 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels comes in handy when you want to compose a perfect picture or want to preview the image you just took. The LCD screen also features an anti-reflection coating that reduces any unwanted glare on the screen when you’re in the sun.

Battery and Storage

Your images are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, which are easily replaceable when full. The Coolpix S9300 is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you shoot about 200 images on full charge. Be always prepared with enough battery life to take you through long events.

You can transfer images from your Nikon digital camera to a computer with the high speed USB port, and always have more space to take photographs. The HDMI mini connector Type C port can be used to connect your Coolpix digital camera to a large screen LCD television, so you can watch you Full HD videos and 16 megapixel images in full size.

Performance

The Coolpix S9300 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.9, which lets you experiment with different objects in the foreground and background of your images. The Auto focus of this point and shoot has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele. The light sensitivity of the camera ranges between ISO 125 - 3200, letting you take clear images with low noise grains even in dark scenes.

The shutter speed range of 1/2000 - 1 sec can also be reduced to 4 seconds in the Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacular images. Also use the built-in flash with a range of 0.5 - 5.1 m Wide and 1.5 - 3 m Tele to light up every corner of your memory for sharp images.

Features

This Coolpix point and shoot digital camera sports 19 scene modes that optimize settings automatically for traditional and popular scenes like Beach, Snow, Pet Portrait, 3D photography modes and more. In 3D photo mode, you can shoot images that can be played on a compatible 3D television for photographs that closely emulate real-life dimensions. The lens shift Vibration Reduction reduces blurs in images by compensating for unintentional shaking of the camera.

The face priority feature automatically recognizes faces in the frame and ensures they are in focus in every image. The self-timer lets you delay shutter release by 2 or 10 secs, giving you ample time to join your friends and family in front of the lens for memorable images. In the Continuous Shooting mode, images are captured rapidly at 6.9 frames per second for electrifying effects of your subjects.

productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9300 Point & Shoot Camera Blue
Nikon Coolpix L810 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gear up for a lifelong experience of fun and frolic in high resolution with Nikon’s new camera. From the Style series of photography, the Nikon Coolpix S9200 is a power-packed digital camera that will change the way you perceive the world forever. This digital point and shoot camera is ideal for the style-conscious photographer, both professionals and hobbyists.

The focal length of this Nikon digital camera is 4.5 - 81 mm, which is a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 450 mm. The Coolpix S9200 features a powerful 18x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that performs tirelessly to bring your subjects closer for detailed photographs. The S9200 features a CMOS image sensor that takes images at a very cool 16 megapixel resolution.

This feature-packed performance is encased in a compact, yet elegant body, with a groove on the right front panel that affords a comfortable grip on the camera when you’re shooting from a precarious angle. The Coolpix S9200 weighs 209 g and will fit in a bag or the pocket of your jacket conveniently. You can shoot videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution and 30 fps for high definition home movies that look professional.

This Coolpix camera is powered by the EXPEED C2 image processor that delivers high speed shooting and many features effortlessly. You can compose and preview images in the 3 inch TFT LCD screen monitor that has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The preview screen also features an anti-reflection coating that will reduce glare and make viewing images in the sun a pleasure.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S9200 runs on a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery that lets you take up to 200 shots on full charge. The Nikon digital camera stores images on SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards, which can be replaced easily, owing to their easy availability. You can transfer images from your camera to a computer or laptop using the high speed USB port. You can also view your images and videos on a large screen television using the HDMI Type C mini connector port. 

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S9200 has an aperture range of f/3.5 - 5.9, which controls the amount of light falling on your image sensor. This lets you experiment with depth in your images. The Auto focus of this Coolpix camera has a range of 50 cm onwards Wide and 1.5 m to infinity Tele, focusing automatically on your subject for sharp photographs.

This digital camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 125 - 3200, which enables you to take bright images even in low light situations. The shutter speed has a functioning range of 1/2000 - 1 second, which can be reduced to 4 seconds in Fireworks Show scene mode for spectacular images of fireworks and bright lights in an otherwise dark night. You can also use the built-in, pop-up flash, which has a range of 0.5 - 5.1 m Wide and 1.5 - 3 m Tele, to light up every image for sharp and blur-free images.

Features

The Coolpix S9200 has 19 shooting modes that make photography easier, like Food, Sports, Museum, Pet Portrait mode and many more. In the 3D photography mode, the camera captures 2 images of the same scene from 2 different positions to stitch them together for a realistic, 3 dimensional image that can be played on a compatible 3D television. The lens shift Vibration Reduction compensates for any camera-shake to deliver bright and sharp images every time. The Face Priority feature of this point and shoot digital camera automatically identifies and tracks faces in the frame to ensure the exposure and focus settings are optimized for them.

The self-timer of this camera delays shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, helping in taking blur-free images. This lets you leave the camera on a secure ledge or table to take the photo automatically, avoiding any unintentional shaking of the camera on your part. With the Continuous Shooting H mode, you can take images in a sequence at a speed of about 6.9 frames per second, which lets you capture multiple images with a single shutter release, preserving every one of your favorite moments perfectly.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S9200 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Nikon Coolpix L810 Point & Shoot Camera Bronze
Nikon Coolpix P510 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

Nikon Coolpix L810 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Sensor Technology

The Nikon Coolpix L310 point and shoot camera is equipped with a powerful 14.1 MP CCD Sensor that is well suited for high quality photography. This CCD sensor is ideal even for low light photography as it can handle them with little or no grains and other optical artifacts.

Zoom Capabilities

This camera is equipped with a powerful 21 X Zoom Lens by Nikkor. This gives it an effective optical zoom that is far more superior to the normal digital zoom available on point and shoot cameras.

Display Technology

The Camera is equipped with a robust 3 inch, bright LCD Monitor that is detailed enough to provide you with accurate visual feedback on all your clicked images. The screen can also be used as a viewfinder to perfectly line up your shot before taking the picture.

The Nikkor Experience

Nikkor lenses are high end optical devices made out of the finest quality glass available. Apart from the quality of the lens itself, this camera is also equipped with the Nikkor Lens Vibration Reduction feature. This VR feature is highly useful for beginners as it allows them to take extremely steady shots even if they do not have highly steady hands while holding the camera.

Creative Field Within

This camera is loaded with a host of features, which includes the ability to change the color settings of captured images. Color correction is possible with the creatively designed color options that are available with the camera settings. The camera also has sensitivity settings extending up to ISO 6400 from 100.

Auto Mode for Easy Use and Other Modes

This camera is also equipped with an Easy Auto Mode feature. This is a highly useful feature that is great for beginners. The Auto Mode comes with a host of settings that can be automatically applied based on the kind of environment that the subject is present in. The lighting conditions and overall environment can play an important part in the Auto Mode’s quality. You also have a 3 speed Sport continuous mode for high speed or low speed shooting, a Smart portrait system, 3D Mode and HD Movie Mode
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L310 Point & Shoot Camera
Canon PowerShot A4000 IS Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Canon PowerShot A3400 IS Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Canon PowerShot A3400 IS Point & Shoot Camera Gold

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Canon’s highly successful series of PowerShot digital cameras is the vastly capable PowerShot A4000 IS. This advanced point and shoot digital camera is the ideal choice for hobbyists or amateur photographers looking to extend the utility of their compact digital camera. Featuring a number of pre-set shooting modes along with automatic picture adjustment functions, this Canon PowerShot is also ideal for capturing and immortalising those rare, unforgettable or candid moments.

With a focal length of 5 to 40 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 28 – 224 mm, the PowerShot A4000 IS offers levels of optical and digital zoom functions. With the availability of an 8x optical zoom for clear and considerable magnification along with a 4x digital for further enlargement of the picture, gives the A4000 IS a greater scope for usage in areas like outdoor or landscape photography. The CCD sensor in this Canon PowerShot allows you to capture images at an incredible 16 megapixel resolution.

The A4000 IS features a compact body with a strong yet light metal body that weighs in at just 130 g and a very modest 145 g with the inclusion of the battery and memory card. This metal body gives the camera a great deal of durability and portability when compared to most other point and shoot cameras which are usually composed of plastic exteriors.

The back panel of the A4000 IS houses a sizable 3 inch TFT colour screen with wide viewing angle and 5 levels of brightness adjustment levels for increased user personalisation. This LCD display has an astonishing resolution of approximately 230, 000 dots with a 4:3 aspect ratio. Just to the right of the display screen are the well-spaced and neatly arranged menu navigation buttons.

The 16 megapixel sensor when combined with a highly advanced Digic 4 processor makes it possible for the PowerShot A4000 IS to shoot images at a maximum resolution of 4608 x 3456 pixels. It can further record HD videos as well at a resolution of 1280 x 720 at 25 frames per second and is saved in the MOV or H.264 file format. Also featured is a mono microphone for capturing clear 2 channel audio when recording video.

Battery and Storage

The A4000 IS from Canon features a SD memory card slot that houses the cameras recording medium, which could be an SD card, SDHC card or SDXC memory card with a maximum memory of 32 GB. You can also transfer images or videos from the camera to a PC using the high-speed USB 2.0 port or through a memory card reader. This connection with a computer is made easier with the camera's compatibility with Windows and Mac operating systems including Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP and MAC OS X 10.

Performance

The aperture control of this PowerShot has a range of f/3.0 to f/9.0 wide and f/5.9 to f/18 tele which gives you considerable control over how much light passes through the lens. The A4000 IS uses a TTL or through-the-lens optical auto focus sensor which is quicker and more precise than when done manually. This auto focus ranges from 10 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm Tele to infinity, while in macro mode range is from 10 mm to 500 mm.

The camera’s light sensitivity can further be controlled through variable ISO settings which range from ISO 100 all the way to ISO 1600. The shutter speed of this Canon A4000 IS a ranges from 1-1/2000 sec on auto mode and 15-1/2000 sec while operating in the manual shooting mode.

The built-in flash has a range of 500 - 3000 mm Wide and 1000 - 2000 Tele, which lets you take quality images even under poor lighting conditions. The inclusion of various flash modes including auto, on, slow sync and off increases the usability of the flash while capturing images. Also available on the Canon PowerShot is the option of white balancing that has both auto and manual modes to increase the effectiveness of the image or video.

Features

This PowerShot camera lets you capture the world around you through a wide variety of 32 pre-set shooting modes like portrait, monochrome, discreet, snow and fireworks. The advent of a lens-shift type image stabilization prevents blurring of images. The discreet mode is a great feature that cancels the electronic shutter sound,making the camera usable in places where extra light and sound are not be welcomed like in museums or a theatre.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS Point & Shoot Camera Blue
Canon PowerShot A3400 IS Point & Shoot Camera Red
Canon PowerShot A4000 IS Point & Shoot Camera Red
Sony CyberShot DSC-WX50 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Sony CyberShot DSC-WX50 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Canon’s highly successful range of PowerShot A-series digital cameras, comes the A2300 point and shoot camera. This highly capable mid-level digital camera with an array of significant features and functions makes an ideal pick for hobbyists and beginners looking to explore the basic techniques in digital photography.

This A-series PowerShot camera from Canon features a 28 mm wide angle lens with a primary RGB colour filter and a focal length of 5 mm to 25 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 28 mm to 140 mm. This wide angle lens has a 5x optical zoom with the availability of 4x digital zoom, which combine to give the camera a whooping 20x of zooming ability. The CCD sensor on this Canon PowerShot allows the user to capture images at an incredibly high 16 megapixel resolution.

The PowerShot A2300 features a body design that weighs in at a very modest 125 g which includes the battery and memory card. The compact size, strong build and light weight components provide the A2300 with increased durability and portability.

The back panel of the A2300 houses a 2.7 inch wide angle TFT colour display with 5 levels of brightness adjustment levels for increased customization. This LCD screen has a display resolution of 230,000 dots with an aspect ratio of 4:3. The 16 megapixel camera when combined with Canon’s highly advanced Digic 4 processor makes it possible for the PowerShot A2300 to record HD video at a resolution of 1280 x 720 at 25 frames per second.

Battery and Storage

The advent of an NB-11L rechargeable lithium-ion battery powers the Canon A2300 for up to 210 shots on full charge. All the recorded video and captured images are stored in the camera’s recording media which is in the form of an SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. These saved files on the memory card can easily be transferred to a PC or a laptop via the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 port, which is compatible with latest versions of Windows and Mac operating systems.

This Canon PowerShot camera further includes an HDMI port, giving you the option of viewing your recorded images and videos on a high definition television. The camera features monaural audio output and an analog video output function that is capable of transmitting both PAL and NTSC signals.

Performance

The A2300 from Canon has a circular aperture control that helps the user to control the amount of light passing through the camera’s lens. The aperture range on this camera ranges from f/2.8 to f/7.9 Wide and from f/6.9 to f/20 Tele, giving you high quality images even under poor or insufficient lighting. The TTL or through the lens autofocus system on this PowerShot camera sports a range that starts from 3 cm Wide and 1.2 m Tele to infinity in the normal mode. It also has a macro focusing range of 3 cm to 60 cm.

The light sensitivity of this camera ranges from ISO 100 to 1600 giving you clear images irrespective of the available lighting conditions. The A2300 also features a wide range of adjustable shutter speeds from a maximum 1/2000 sec to a minimum of 15 sec. A built-in flash with auto and manual adjustment modes lets you control the intensity of the flash, within the available flash range of 50 cm to 3.0 m Wide and 1.0 to 2.0 m Tele.

Features

The Canon A2300 comes with an assortment of white balancing and shooting modes with Red Eye Reduction and Face Detection technology, which together help in achieving the best result in very specific situations or conditions. The camera also uses a digital image stabilizer to makes sure that the captured images and videos are sharp and shake free. The PowerShot camera further comes enabled with PictBridge technology that allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.

The Canon A2300’s self-timer function works on a 2 or 10 sec delay, giving the photographer enough time to be part of the image. The continuous mode is an advanced feature that allows the A2300 to take a series of shots in quick succession. In the Program mode, this Canon camera is capable of 0.8 shots per second and when on the low light mode, can take up to 2.8 shots per second, making the camera perfectly suited for all possible scenarios.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A2300 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Canon PowerShot A2300 Point & Shoot Camera Blue
