productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A2300 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Canon PowerShot A2300 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Fujifilm’s JZ series of long-zoom compact cameras, comes the FinePix JZ100 point and shoot camera. With superb imaging and video quality, this very capable compact camera with its ability to capture a wide range of subjects using a variety of shooting modes is perfect for everyday use.

This FinePix JZ100 features a Fujinon 25 mm wide-angle lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 36.0 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 25  - 200 mm. This very capable wide-angle lens gives the camera 8x of optical magnification along with a further 6.7x of digital zoom. The powerful CCD image sensor with primary colour filter gives the JZ100 an optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixels.

This FinePix camera from Fujifilm boasts a very compact and highly portable design, which with the inclusion of the battery and memory card manages to weigh only 129 g. All the captured images and videos on this camera can be viewed on its brilliant 230,000 dot resolution, 2.7 inch TFT colour LCD display which also doubles-up as a live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

The JZ100 is powered by an NP-45A rechargeable lithium-ion battery that powers the camera for up to 180 shots. All the saved image and video files are saved on the JZ100’s memory unit which is in the form of an SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card. These saved files can easily be transferred onto a PC or a laptop using the camera’s high-speed USB digital interface.

Performance

The aperture control function lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens, which on this camera has a range of f/2.9 - f/5.9. The camera’s TTL or through the lens works on the contrast detection method and has a range of 30 cm Wide and 90 cm Tele to infinity. It also has a macro focus range of 5 cm to 60 cm Wide and 80 cm to 1.2 m Tele.

The ISO speed or the light sensitivity range on the JZ100 is from ISO 100 to 3200, letting you take clear and high quality images irrespective of the available light. The camera also has an impressive shutter speed variation with the highest being 1/2000 and the lowest at 8 sec. To further improve the low light capability of this FinePix is the advent of a built-in flash unit which has an operational range of 30 cm to 3 mred Wide and 90 cm to 2 m Tele, allowing you to light up every corner of your frame.

Features

With several shooting modes which include SR auto or screen recognition auto, program and movie mode, the camera can automatically adjust the camera's settings for optimum results. These shooting modes along with a number of pre-set white balancing settings and the inclusion of Red Eye Reduction ,makes the FinePix JZ100 perfectly suited to capture high quality images in all possible conditions and scenarios.

The presence of an intelligent Lens Shift image stabilizer helps to make sure that the recorded video is steady and blur-free. The camera’s powerful 14 megapixel CCD optical image sensor gives you the capability of 720p HD video recording at 30fps with monaural sound capture and both PAL and NTSC output capability.

The face detection feature automatically detects focuses and prioritises the clarity of human faces that are present within the image frame. The camera’s self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, so that you can join your friends and other loved ones in every image. The JZ100 has the ability to capture up to 1.2 shots per second when on the continuous shooting mode.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix JZ100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Fujifilm’s popular A-series comes the FinePix AX500 point-and-shoot digital camera, which has all the necessary features and functions to transform the concept of digital photography into a very affordable, easy and convenient possibility. This makes the entry-level AX500 a perfect choice for those looking to start from the very basics in digital photography. This Fujifilm point and shoot digital camera features a Fujinon lens with a focal length of 5.9 - 29.5mm or 35 mm equivalent of 33 – 165 mm. Featuring a 5x optical zoom and an additional 6.7x of digital zoom, the AX500 is capable of considerable levels of overall magnification.

The advent of a very capable CCD image sensor with a primary colour filter gives this digital camera a brilliant resolution of 14 megapixels. With a total weight of 168 g which includes the batteries and the memory card, this Fujifilm camera becomes increasingly portable and easy to carry around, even in the comfort of your pocket.

The 14 megapixel resolution along with the CCD image sensor gives this camera the ability to record HD videos with 1280 x 720 resolution at 30 fps with monaural sound capture with both PAL and NTSC output options. These high resolution images and videos can be viewed on the FinePix AX500’s 2.7 inch colour display that boasts a display resolution of 230,000 dots. This LCD colour display also doubles as a live viewfinder as this Fujifilm camera does not come with an optical viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

This Fujifilm FinePix is powered either by 2 AA alkaline batteries or 2 AA Ni-MH Nickel-metal hydride batteries as an alternative. In the auto mode the AA alkaline batteries can power the AX500 for up to 180 shots while the Ni-MH batteries can last for up to an amazing 480 shots. All the captured images and the recorded videos are saved on the AX500’s memory medium which is in the form of an SD or an SDHC memory card. The transfer of saved files from the camera’s memory device to a PC or a laptop is done via its high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that is allowed to fall on the image sensor, which in this Fujifilm camera ranges from f/3.3 to f/5.9. It also features an autofocus function with a range that spans from 45 cm Wide and 80 cm Tele to infinity. It also has a macro focus range of 10 cm - 80 cm on wide and 60 cm - 1 m on tele.

The light sensitivity of this camera ranges from ISO 100 to 3200, giving you clear images irrespective of the available lighting conditions. The AX500 also features a wide range of adjustable shutter speeds that range from a maximum 1/1400 sec to a minimum of 8 sec.
A built-in flash with auto and manual adjustment modes lets you control the intensity of the flash, with a range of 60 cm to 3 m Wide and 60 cm to 2 m Tele. This when clubbed with Red Eye Reduction makes it possible to capture clear and sharp images even under low light.

Features

The intelligent auto scene mode identifies the scene you're shooting, be it portrait, landscape, night portrait, macro, or sport and automatically adjusts the camera's settings for optimum results. With 6 pre-set white balancing options to choose from, the AX500 lets you choose from a variety of image tone and temperature settings. This FinePix also sports a digital image stabilizer that makes sure that the captured images and videos are sharp and blur free.

The AX500 also comes with face detection that automatically detects human faces within the frame, so that maximum priority is given to the clarity of the faces rather than other elements. The PictBridge technology lets you connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy and direct photo printing.

The self-timer mode lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, making this a very convenient option for self-portraits and group shots. The continuous mode lets the FinePix AX500 shoot at a maximum speed of 1.2 frames per second.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm FinePix AX500 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon 1 V1 Mirrorless Camera Body with 10-30 mm Lens
Samsung WB150F Point & Shoot Camera White
Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Canon’s highly successful series of PowerShot digital cameras is the vastly capable PowerShot A4000 IS. This advanced point and shoot digital camera is the ideal choice for hobbyists or amateur photographers looking to extend the utility of their compact digital camera. Featuring a number of pre-set shooting modes along with automatic picture adjustment functions, this Canon PowerShot is also ideal for capturing and immortalising those rare, unforgettable or candid moments.

With a focal length of 5 to 40 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 28 – 224 mm, the PowerShot A4000 IS offers levels of optical and digital zoom functions. The availability of an 8x optical zoom for clear and considerable magnification along with a 4x digital for further enlargement of the picture, gives the A4000 IS a greater scope for usage in areas like outdoor or landscape photography. The CCD sensor in this Canon PowerShot allows you to capture images at an incredible 16 megapixel resolution.

The A4000 IS features a compact body with a strong yet light metal body that weighs in at just 130 g and a very modest 145 g with the inclusion of the battery and memory card. This metal body gives the camera a great deal of durability and portability.

The back panel of the A4000 IS houses a sizable 3 inch TFT colour screen with wide viewing angle and 5 levels of brightness adjustment levels for increased user personalisation. This LCD display has an astonishing resolution of approximately 230,000 dots with a 4:3 aspect ratio. Just to the right of the display screen are the well-spaced and neatly arranged menu navigation buttons.

The 16 megapixel sensor when combined with a highly advanced Digic 4 processor makes it possible for the PowerShot A4000 IS to shoot images at a maximum resolution of 4608 x 3456 pixels. It can further record HD videos at a resolution of 1280 x 720 at 25 frames per second and is saved in the MOV or H.264 file format. Also featured is a mono microphone for capturing clear 2 channel audio when recording video.

Battery and Storage

The A4000 IS from Canon features an SD memory card slot that houses the camera's recording medium, which could be an SD card, SDHC card or SDXC memory card with a maximum memory of 32 GB. You can also transfer images or videos from the camera to a PC using the high-speed USB 2.0 port or through a memory card reader. This connection with a computer is made easier with the camera's compatibility with Windows and Mac operating systems including Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP and MAC OS X 10.
 

Performance

The aperture control of this PowerShot has a range of f/3.0 to f/9.0 wide and f/5.9 to f/18 tele which gives you considerable control over how much light passes through the lens. The A4000 IS uses a TTL or through-the-lens optical auto focus sensor which is quicker and more precise than when done manually. This auto focus ranges from 10 mm Wide and 1000 mm Tele to infinity, while in macro mode is from 10 mm to 500 mm.

The camera’s light sensitivity can further be controlled through variable ISO settings which range from ISO 100 all the way to ISO 1600. The shutter speed of this Canon A4000 IS a ranges from 1 tio 1/2000 sec on auto mode and 15 to 1/2000 sec while operating in the manual shooting mode.

The built-in flash has a range of 500 - 3000 mm Wide and 1000 - 2000 Tele, which lets you take quality images even under poor lighting conditions. The inclusion of various flash modes including auto, on, slow sync and off increases the usability of the flash while capturing images. Also available on the Canon PowerShot is the option of white balancing that has both auto and manual modes to increase the effectiveness of the image or video.

Features

This PowerShot camera lets you capture the world around you through a wide variety of 32 pre-set shooting modes like portrait, monochrome, discreet, snow and fireworks. The advent of a lens-shift type image stabilization prevents blurring of images. Adding to the abundance of features on the A4000 IS is the self timer and the continuous shot mode. The discreet mode is a great feature that cancels the electronic shutter sound, making the camera usable in places where extra light and sound are not be welcomed like in museums or a theatre.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Canon’s revered EOS range of high performance DSLR cameras comes the Canon EOS 5D Mark III with the Canon EF 24-105 F4L IS USM lens attached to the camera’s EF lens mount. Offering a staggering array of improved features and creative options in both video and image capturing, the 5D Mark III is sure to provide a higher sense of purpose for the most demanding and dedicated photographers.

Sensor Technology

This amazing DSLR camera is equipped with a highly responsive 22.3 MP CMOS sensor that can be used for high quality photography. Working through a 36 x 24 mm full frame CMOS image sensor, this Canon EOS 5D is capable of capturing high quality images at an incredibly high resolution of 22.3 megapixels with a supported aspect ratio of 3:2.

Image Processing

The state-of-the-art DIGIC 5+ image processor from Canon lets you capture extremely clear high resolution images. This is also useful for taking clear images under varying lighting conditions as well.

61 point high-density reticular AF

In this camera it is also possible to change the AF points such that you get focus on different areas of the subject. The 61 point focus with the high density reticular AF mode is highly effective for drama shots and creative shots that may require depth of field effects or simple macro.

ISO Settings and Sensitivity

The ISO light sensitivity on this Canon EOS 5D, ranges from ISO 100 to ISO 102400. These settings will be extremely helpful in cases where you will need to shoot images under varying lighting conditions.

Continuous Shooting Mode

This camera is capable of shooting images at a high speed and frame rate of 6 frames per second. This will be ideal for sports based photography, action shots and also for shots that require you to capture images in sequence.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Kit EF 24-105 mm f/4L IS USM DSLR Camera

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Panasonic’s popular HX Series of upright HD camcorders is the very compact and feature filled HX-DC2. With a purpose-built shape and design, this Panasonic camcorder makes an ideal travel companion that provides extreme ease of use while capturing high quality images and videos under a variety of situations. The advent of a powerful MOS image sensor gives this Panasonic camcorder an amazing sensor resolution of 14.3 megapixels. This high image resolution gives the HX-DC2 the ability to capture high quality still images as well as record full HD videos with 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution.

One of the most innovative and unique features on this Panasonic camcorder is its twin shutter design, which has a single touch operation for still image and video capture at the same time. This means that you can capture still images at a reduced resolution without any interruption to on-going video recording. The captured high quality images are saved in the JPEG DCF/Exif2.2 format while the video files are saved in the MPEG-4 AVC/H.264 file format. The audio recording in the video mode is picked up by the camcorder’s built-in 2 channel stereo microphone and is saved in the ACC file format. 

The Panasonic HX-DC2 features an Active E.I.S or Electrical Image Stabilizer that makes sure that the captured images and videos appear clear with minimal blurring. This feature helps you to effectively use the camcorder in a variety of styles like shooting with full zoom or video recording while walking or running.

Body

This Panasonic camcorder sports a very compact and efficient design that has a body weight of only 162 g and an operational weight of 180 g which includes the battery and memory card. The HX-DC2 features a very user-friendly grip design which dedicated to providing you with steady single-hand shooting, which considerably increases its effectiveness in various shooting situations.

Featuring a 3 inch Wide LCD Screen with a 230,400 dot resolution, this camcorder has the added brilliance of a free-angle LCD. This provides a 285 degree field of screen rotation so that you can operate from almost any screen angle that you see fit. The memory device on this camcorder can be accessed through a memory card slot that is compatible SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. This Panasonic camcorder gets its power from a rechargeable lithium-ion battery with a minimum capacity of 700mAh.

Performance

The HX-DC2 operates a lens with a focal length of 6.8 mm – 34 mm which has a 5x optical zoom capacity. Apart from the additional digital zoom of 50x still imaging and 120x motion imaging, this Panasonic has a 15x Intelligent zoom function which gives you great magnification without any loss of quality. The iris type aperture on the camcorder has range of f/3.5 Tele – f3.7 Wide, which gives you effective usage under variable lighting conditions. The nine-point autofocus system with a macro range 1 cm lets you take sharp images from wide open spaces to extreme close-up shots.

This Panasonic has a shutter speed that ranges from a 1/2 sec to 1/1500 sec for image capture and from 1/15 sec to 1/10000 for video recording. This with the inclusion of a built-in flash lets you capture dramatic images of moving objects or moments in low light situations.

Features & Connectivity

The Panasonic’s white balancing modes can be used to capture stunning images and videos with pre-set adjustments that are perfectly suited for a particular situation or lighting condition. Another brilliant feature on this camcorder is the Panorama mode which lets you shoot consecutive shots that are stitched together to create a dramatic 180 or 360 degree canvas of the desired surroundings. This panoramic image can also be either shot in the horizontal or vertical plane.

The Face Detection technology detects the amount of ambient light and automatically adjusts the exposure settings so the faces in the frame appear clear and sharp. The continuous burst mode on this HX-DC2 lets you capture up to 40 continuous 3 megapixel images with in 4 sec giving you a wide series of shots of a particular subject or incident. The HX-DC2 lets you transfer all your images and videos on your PC or laptop using its high-speed USB 2.0 port. This camcorder also features a composite AV out along with a mini HDMI port so you can relive those special moments on a standard or a high definition TV.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic HX-DC2 Camcorder Camera Grey

productAttributes.productDescription:
The EOS 5D Mark III is part of the world famous EOS range of high performance DSLR cameras from Canon. Offering a staggering array of improved features, higher-speeds, greater resolution and extended creative options in both image and video departments, the EOS 5D Mark III is sure to provide unmatched artistic freedom for the most demanding and quality conscious photographer.

Housing a 36 x 24 mm full frame CMOS image sensor, this 5D is capable of capturing high quality images at an incredible 22.3 megapixel resolution. The advent of Canon's state-of-the-art DIGIC 5 image processing technology makes it possible to capture extremely clear high resolution images, while also being capable of recording full HD videos at 1920 x 1080 resolution. The Canon 5D Mark III also supports 3:2 aspect ratio.

Body

The lightweight components along with a robust body design of the EOS 5D Mark III is aimed at providing easy-handling, for more extensive and repeated use. The EOS 5D Mark III camera body weighs 860 g, and the rough and rugged texture of the camera not only adds to the aesthetic value of this DSLR camera, but also helps the user maintain a firm grip during operating.

Sporting a large eye-level pentaprism viewfinder for an expansive field of view, the 5D Mark III features a sizable 3.2 inch TFT colour LCD display with a 1,040,000 dot resolution. The Canon EOS DSLR supports Compact Flash Card Type I, UDMA Mode 7-compatible, SD,  SDHC or SDXC memory cards. Powered by an LP-E6 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the Canon 5D Mark III is capable of shooting up to 950 shots using the viewfinder and up to 200 shots in the case of live view shooting which continuously uses the camera’s LCD screen.

Performance

The Canon EF lens mount on the 5D Mark III makes it compatible with all Canon EF lenses with the exception of EF-S lenses. The auto focus system on the 5D Mark III works on the TTL secondary image registration and phase detection. The number of available auto focus points depends on the lens being used.

The ISO light sensitivity on this Canon EOS 5D, ranges from ISO 100 to 25600, further expandable to a staggering ISO 102400, giving it the ability to consistently capture sharp and clear images even under varying lighting conditions. This DSLR also has an operational shutter speed ranging from a maximum of 1/8000 sec to a minimum of 30 sec. As the Canon EOS 5D Mark III does not feature a built-in flash, it provides a provision for an external flash attachment.


Features & Connectivity

The PictBridge functionality on the EOS 5D allows the camera to connect directly to a printer without a PC and readily print the selected images. The DSLR also employs the Dust reduction feature, which helps to remove dust from the camera’s sensor and ultimately maintaining the spec free clarity of the captured image. The various shooting modes that are available on the Canon EOS 5D include Auto+, Program AE, Shutter Priority AE, Aperture Priority AE, Manual and 3 levels of customised settings for quick and instant operation of the DSLR.

The Face Detection function automatically detects faces within the frame and optimizes the focus and exposure to capture them with maximum clarity. The self-timer feature offers a delay of 2 or 10 seconds, giving the photographer enough time to get in front of the camera and be part of the image.

The Continuous Shooting mode on this Canon DSLR is capable of up to 6 shots per second and is saved in the JPEG, RAW or JPEG + RAW formats. The EOS 5D Mark III records full HD videos in the MOV, MP4 and H.264 file formats. The captured images and videos can be transferred to a PC or a laptop using the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 connection. The HDMI connectivity lets you connect directly to a HDTV so you can view all the recorded files with superior clarity.
productAttributes.title: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Body DSLR Camera

productAttributes.productDescription:
Get ready to impress the world with stunning images, mind-blowing video clarity and an enviable style statement with the IXUS 510 HS. This ultra-fashionable and power packed compact digital camera belongs to the highly reputed IXUS series from Canon and is available with an assortment of incredible features and functions.

Sensor Technology

This Canon IXUS Camera comes with a 10.1 MP CMOS sensor that can take high quality photos under almost all lighting conditions.

Screen Display Technology

The Camera features a 3.2 inch wide touchscreen LCD with a 16:9 aspect ratio and a 461,000 dot pixel resolution, so you can view images with ultra-sharp detail and full colour.

Optical Zoom and Overall Zoom Capabilities

With a focal length of 4.0 - 48 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 336 mm, this compact digital camera features a 12 X optical zoom and a 4 X digital zoom. The best solution for high quality zooming is to always remain within the realms of optical zooming. This will keep the quality of the image even when zoomed to the maximum level.

Connectivity

This camera is equipped with a WiFi adapter so that you can connect to the internet seamlessly and transfer and share all your important pictures.

Smart Auto Features

Featuring a wide range of 58 smart auto shooting modes, the IXUS 510 HS gives you pre-set settings that are made to work perfectly in very specific situations or conditions. These include portrait, handheld night scene, super slow motion movie, monochrome and many more.

Great Low Light Photography

This sensor, the CMOS chip in general is well suited for low light photography even if you do not use the flash as long as you have the minimum required light for quality photography.

Other Important Features

This camera is capable of full HD video recording at 1080 p resolution. It also comes with a highly responsive touch screen and touch sensitive shutter.

Image Processor

Powered by the DIGIC 5 image processor, the IXUS 510 HS is capable of recording 1080 p full HD video at 24 fps and delivering unbelievable image quality.
productAttributes.title: Canon IXUS 510 HS Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
If you're looking for a refreshingly new look to match your lifestyle, look no further. Canon brings to you a camera that will become your favorite companion for all events, social or otherwise. From the A series of cameras that has convenient features for easy image-shooting, the PowerShot A3400 IS will turn the face of photography around forever. This camera is ideal for first-time photographers, while also making an ideal addition to a professional photographer's unofficial gear.

The Canon PowerShot A3400 IS has a focal length of 5 - 25 mm with a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm. with a 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom, your Canon camera endeavors to bring your subjects immeasurably closer for a detailed look. The PowerShot A3400 IS sports a CCD image sensor which lets you take stunning images at a 16 megapixel resolution.

This compact camera features and ergonomic and slim design that fits well in your palm. Convenient shooting just got easier, with the easy-to-reach buttons on the back panel. This tiny camera can be slipped into your bag or pocket easily too. Weighing a mere 141 g, this will be an ideal take-along for picnics and full-day events. You can even shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixels and 25 fps for professional-like videos.

This Canon camera is powered by the DIGIC 4 image processor, which delivers high quality images with reduced noise or grains. Images taken with this PowerShot camera are supported in 4:3 aspect ratio, and are ideal to play on large screen televisions. The camera features a 3 inch TFT LCD touchscreen monitor with a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels that lets you compose and preview your images.

Battery and Storage

The PowerShot A3400 IS supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards, in which your images are stored. Powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, this Canon battery can take up to 180 photographs on full charge. You can transfer images from your camera to an external storage device with the USB 2.0 high speed port and always have enough space to record every beautiful moment of your life.

Performance

The Canon PowerShot digital camera has an aperture range of f/2.8 - 6.9, which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With the Auto focus feature, the camera has a range of 3 cm onwards Wide and 1.2 m to infinity Tele in which it can focus automatically to take sharp images.

Night time shots will now look magically bright, with a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 1600. The shutter has a speed range of 1/2000 - 15 seconds, which will assist in taking sharp images of moving objects too. You can additionally also use the built-in flash to brighten every scene, as it has a functioning range of 50 cm - 3 m Wide and 1 - 2 m Tele.

Features

The PowerShot A3400 IS has optimized scene modes like Toy Camera Effect, Monochrome, Discreet, Snow mode and more, with which you can take images without worrying about the settings as the camera comes pre-set with the appropriate settings. The lens-shift image stabilizer auto corrects for any unintentional hand-tremor to deliver bright and sharp images.

The Face Detection feature can identify faces in the frame to optimize exposure and focus settings especially for them. You can also now join all your friends and families in every picture, thanks to the self-timer feature of this point and shoot digital camera from Canon. With this feature, you can delay releasing the shutter by 2 or 10 seconds. This gives you ample time to compose the image and join your friends in front of the lens for memorable photographs.

With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take sequential images at 0.8 shots per seconds in P mode and 2.7 shots per seconds in Low Light mode with a single shutter release to record any sequence of action completely. With convenient features like these, this Canon PowerShot digital camera will be a great gift or first-time purchase.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot A3400 IS Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix S30 Point & Shoot Camera Blue
Nikon Coolpix S30 Point & Shoot Camera Pink
Canon PowerShot A810 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The FinePix SL260 belongs to Fujifilm’s specialised S series of digital bridge cameras. A bridge camera is the ideal choice for budding photographers or hobbyists looking to advance from a compact point and shoot camera to something with more performance and functionality while still sticking to a reasonable budget.

The SL260 features the highly specialized Fujinon lens that has a focal length of 4.3 mm - 111.8 mm which is the 35 mm Equivalent of 24 - 624 mm. The camera sports an incredible 26x optical zoom and a 6.7x digital zoom which can take you closer for a detailed look of your subject. The CCD image sensor gives this FinePix digital camera a phenomenal optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixel.

As with most bridge cameras, this FinePix SL260 also bares very close resemblance to a DSLR in the category of shape and size. This FinePix camera manages to weigh 510 g with the inclusion of its battery and memory card. The advent of the powerful CCD image sensor with the 14 megapixel resolution gives the SL260 the ability to record HD videos with 720p resolution. The high quality images and videos can be view on the camera’s 3 inch TFT Colour LCD Monitor with a display resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. This camera features an electronic viewfinder with a 200,000 dot resolution with the 3 inch LCD acting as an optional live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

This SL260 is powered by a NP-85 rechargeable lithium-ion battery that lasts up to 300 shots on a full charge. All the captures images and recorded videos are stored in SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards that can be accessed through the camera’s memory card slot. These stored media files can easily be transferred from your camera directly into your laptop or computer using the high-speed USB 2.0 port. The presence of a composite AV out and an HDMI mini connector allows you to view your photos and HD videos on a large screen standard definition or a high definition television.

Performance

The FinePix SL260 features an aperture range of f/3.1 - f/5.9, which gives you control over the amount of light falling on the camera’s image sensor. The Autofocus function on this camera functions using the TTL contrast detection technology and has a normal focusing range of 40 cm Wide onwards and 2.8 m Tele to infinity. It further gives this FinePix a macro range of 7 cm and a super macro range of 2 cm giving you the ability to capture stunning extreme close-up shots.

The Fujifilm SL260 also features an incredible light sensitivity range of ISO 64 – ISO 6400, which when clubbed with a shutter speed range of 1/2000 – 8 sec lets you take stunning shots of moving subject or magical night shots. You can also light up your photographs with the built-in, pop-up flash unit that has a range of 40 cm - 8.0 m Wide and 2.1 m - 4.1 m Tele. There is also a further provision for an external flash attachment for increased lighting for your photographs.

Features

The FinePix SL650 digital camera boasts a wide range of pre-programed shooting modes and white balancing settings let you capture images in a variety of image temperature that best suit the current conditions. The CCD shift image stabilization automatically compensates for any unintentional shake or vibration of the camera while shooting to deliver blur-free and sharp images. The CCD image sensor along with the 14 megapixel resolution of this FinePix gives it the capability to record high definition video with a 1280 x 720 pixel resolution with monaural sound at 30 fps.

The face detection feature automatically identifies faces in a frame and optimizes exposure and focus settings which along with the Red Eye Reduction function let you take crisp and striking images of your favourite people. With the self-timer function, you can delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, giving you enough time to compose the frame and be part of your most memorable photographs. The Continuous Shooting mode lets you take up to 8 shots per second, making sure that you don’t miss any of the action that unfolds before you. The PictBridge feature further enhances the camera’s user-friendly nature by allowing you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm SL260 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Fujifilm’s X series of premium digital cameras comes the X-S1, which represents a new breed of bridge cameras enhanced with the latest standards in design and performance. Giving you the opportunity to capture amazingly bright and clear is the X-S1’s high precision Fujinon 26x optical zoom lens that has a focal length of 6.1 mm - 158.6 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 24 mm - 624 mm. This very capable wide angle lens with the camera’s powerful EXR CMOS sensor gives it an optical sensor resolution of 12 megapixel with the addition of 2x digital zoom.

Sporting a design that is closely comparable to a standard DSLR, this Fujifilm bridge camera weighs 945 g including the battery and memory card. The combination of the super-efficient image sensor and the 12 megapixel resolution gives this Fujifilm camera the ability to record Full HD 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution video with stereo sound at 30 fps. The presence of a 0.47 inch electronic viewfinder with a TFT colour LCD display lets you perfect your picture framing and composition. The back panel of the X-S1 contains a 3 inch LCD tilt screen with a display resolution of 460,000 pixels for clear and sharp image viewing.

Battery and Storage

Powered by a NP-95 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, this Fujifilm bridge camera can take up to 500 shots on a single full charge using the electronic viewfinder. The captured images are saved in the JPEG EXIF 2.3, RAW or RAW + JPEG formats while the high definition videos are saved in the H.264 MOV file format with Stereo sound.

These captured media files are stored in the camera’s memory device which is in the form of an SD, SDHC or SDXC UHS-I memory card. These saved media files can easily be transferred to a PC or a laptop through the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. This camera also features a composite AV out which supports both NTSC and PAL compatibility along with HDMI Mini connectivity giving you the option to enjoy your images and videos on a standard or a high definition television.

Performance

With tan aperture control range of f/2.8 - f/5.6, this X-S1 features a TTL contrast detection autofocus system with a normal focusing range from 30 cm Wide and 2 m Tele to infinity. It further has a macro focus range of 7 cm and a 1 cm super macro function for getting those perfect frame-filling close-up shots.

With a light sensitivity or ISO speed ranging from ISO 100 to an amazing ISO 12800 along with a shutter speed of 30 sec to 1/4000 sec gives you the ability to be in complete control of your shooting range. Featuring a built-in pop-up flash unit with a range of 30 cm - 8 m Wide and 2 m – 4 m Tele the X-S1 has the ability to capture stunning images regardless of the lighting conditions. There is also the inclusion of a Hot Shoe or an additional provision for an external flash attachment to provide increased lighting for your photographs.

Features

The presence of pre-programed white balancing modes along with a number of shooting modes let you capture images in a variety of image temperature and colour tones. The optical lens shift image stabilizer works to keep your captured images clear, sharp and blur-free. The X-S1’s Face Detection functions make it easy to shoot perfect portraits and group shots without red eyes with the help of the on-board Red Eye Reduction technology.

The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing. The self-timer function on this bridge camera has a 2 sec and 10 sec delay while the continuous mode allows it to shoot at a maximum rate of 10 fps, giving you very convenient and flexible shooting options.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm X-S1 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The FujiFilm S4200 comes as part of the renowned and highly rated FinePix S series of digital bridge cameras. A bridge camera is most often very similar to a DSLR in terms of shape and size, while featuring some highly advanced functions along with a long range zoom. The S4200 makes a very sensible choice for anyone looking to get as close to a DSLR’s performance as possible without having to spend a great deal of money.

The highly renowned Fujinon lens gives the S4200 a focal length of 4.3 mm - 103.2 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 24 - 576 mm. The advent of 24x Optical Zoom and 6.7x Digital Zoom which combine to give this FinePix bridge camera an astounding overall magnification of about 160x, giving you the ability to frame every shot with increased precision and accuracy.

A powerful CCD image sensor with primary colour filter gives the S4200 an amazing optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixels. This CCD image sensor with the 14 megapixel resolution gives the S4200 the ability to record high quality videos with a resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps.

As with the design of most digital bridge cameras, this FinePix also closely resembles a standard DSLR in shape and size, managing to weigh 543 g which includes the batteries and memory card. The FinePix bridge camera sports a 3 inch TFT colour LCD display with a display resolution of 230,000 pixels. The combination of the highly capable Fujinon lens, an array of smart functions and a bright viewfinder gives you a very versatile photography experience.

Battery and Storage

This high performance FinePix bridge camera from Fujifilm is powered by 4 AA alkaline or rechargeable Ni-MH batteries which power the camera up to 300 and 500 shots respectively. All the captured images are saved in the JPEG Exif ver 2.3 format while all the recorded videos are saved in the AVI Motion JPEG file format. These files are stored in the cameras memory device which is in the form of an SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card.

The recorded media files from the camera’s memory can easily be transferred to a PC or an external digital storage device via the S4200’s high-speed USB 2.0 connectivity. The S4200 also comes with an HDMI Mini connector and a composite AV out which supports both NTSC and PAL which gives you the ability to view all your captured media files on a standard or a high definition TV.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that is allowed to fall on the image sensor, which on this FinePix ranges from f/3.1 - f/5.9. Featuring an TTL contrast detection autofocus system with a macro range that spans from 7 cm - 3.0 m Wide and 2.0 m - 3.0 m Tele. At a distance of just 2 cm, the incredibly useful Super Macro mode on this FinePix S4200 allows you to capture all the exquisite details of your subject from extremely close range.

The light sensitivity of this bridge camera is from ISO 64 to ISO 6400, which lets you take clear high quality images even under insufficient light. The camera also features a wide range of adjustable shutter speeds from a maximum 1/2000 sec to a minimum of 8 sec to help you achieve your desired result. A built-in pop-up flash with an operational range of 40 cm - 7.0 m Wide, 2.5 m – 3.6 m Tele further enhances the low light capability of the FinePix S4200 digital camera.

Features

To further tweak the feel and temperature of the image is the availability of pre-set white balancing settings and shooting modes that automatically detected and selected the appropriate camera settings to best suit the current situation. The FinePix’s CCD shift image stabilization works to eliminate blurred photos by freezing action and minimizing shake at maximum zoom range. The FinePix S4200 comes with fully loaded detection technology that includes Face Detection along with Red Eye Reduction for clear optimized people photos.

The self-timer function on the FinePix S4200 lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, making self-portraits or group shots extremely fun and convenient. This bridge camera from Fujifilm also sports a continuous mode which lets you take up to 8 fps, giving you the option of capturing the entire flow of events without missing out on the action. The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm S4200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The DSC-HX20V is an advanced CyberShot camera from Sony comes with a 25 mm wide angle Sony G lens with a focal length of 4.45 - 89 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 25 mm - 500 mm. This highly specialised lens comes with a phenomenal 20x optical zoom capacity along with the further availability of a 40x clear image digital zoom. The camera works through the highly capable Exmor R CMOS image sensor that comes with Extra High Sensitivity technology giving the DSC-HX20V a remarkable optical sensor resolution of 18.2 megapixels.

The DSC-HX20V sports a slim body which features Sony’s trademark CyberShot design and styling. With a combined weight of 254 g that includes battery and memory stick, this compact digital camera is highly portable and easy to carry along on all your travels. The advent of a powerful BIONZ imaging processor, this CyberShot camera has the ability to record full HD videos with 1920 x 1080 resolution at 60 fps. All the captured images and videos can be viewed on the camera’s 3 inch XtraFine TruBlack LCD display with a brilliant display resolution of 921,600 dots which also doubles as the camera’s live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

Powered by a NP-BG1 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, this camera has the capacity to capture up to 320 shots on a single charge. The memory device on the camera can be accessed through a memory card slot that supports a wide variety of cards that includes Memory Stick Duo/ Pro Duo/ PRO HG Duo, Memory Stick Micro, SD, SDHC, SDXC, Micro SD and Micro SDHC memory card.

This CyberShot camera works on a high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface which lets you effortlessly transfer all the stored files from the camera’s memory to a PC or a laptop. It also features a HDMI mini connector which allows you to directly connect to an HDTV so you can instantly enjoy all your images and videos at its highest quality.

Performance

The aperture control function lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens of the camera, which on this CyberShot has an available range of f/3.2 - f/5.8. The autofocus function on this camera works using the contrast detection technology that gives the camera a macro focus range of 1 cm that helps you with all your close-up shots.

The ISO speed or the light sensitivity of the DSC-HX20V has a wide range of ISO 100 all the way up to a colossal ISO 12800. The variety of shutter speeds available on this camera has a highest of 1/1600 sec and a lowest of a very prolonged 30 sec. This CyberShot further increases its low light image capturing capability with a built-in flash unit that has an operational range of 40 cm – 7.1 m Wide and 1.7 - 3.9 m Tele on auto ISO and 10 m Wide - 5.5 m Tele on ISO 3200.

Features

The Sony CyberShot camera comes with a variety of shooting modes and 6 white balance modes which give you a number of pre-programed functions that are tailor-made to work perfectly in very specific situations or conditions. The advent of Optical SteadyShot image stabilizer, the DSC-HX20V lets you capture sharp and blur-free images.

The built-in flash features Red Eye Reduction which helps capture clear and undisturbed images, irrespective of the available light. The face detection feature automatically finds, focuses and prioritises the clarity of up to 8 faces within the image frame with a special child and adult priority function. This along with a 2 or 10 second self-timer function gives the photographer a great deal of convenience for self-portraits and group shots. The DSC-HX20V is capable is shooting up to 10 fps on the continuous mode which greatly helps while shooting fast moving objects.
productAttributes.title: Sony DSC-HX20V Point & Shoot Camera Brown

productAttributes.productDescription:
The FinePix JX500 from Fujifilm is a stylish, compact and user-friendly point and shoot digital camera with an array of versatile shooting features. This, along with a horde of useful functions, makes this FinePix camera an ideal choice for a mid-level photographer looking for a higher degree of experimental freedom while still sticking to a relatively affordable price bracket.

Featuring a highly capable 26 mm wide-angle Fujinon lens, this Fujifilm camera has a focal length of 4.6 mm - 23 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 26 mm - 130 mm. This high quality Fujinon lens with its 5x optical zoom capability along with an additional 6.7x of digital zoom provides picture-perfect results across the entire zoom range, from wide-angle compositions to dramatic close-up shots.

The advent of a powerful CCD image sensor with primary colour filter gives the JX500 an optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixels. Sporting very sleek dimensions and a much reduced weight of 113 g which includes the battery and memory card, this FinePix camera is extremely easy to carry along with you everywhere you go. The JX500 features a 2.7 inch TFT Colour LCD screen with a 230,000 dot image display resolution, which also doubles as the camera’s live viewfinder while in shooting mode.

Battery and Storage

Powered by an NP-45A rechargeable lithium-ion battery, this camera is capable of capturing up to 170 shots on a single full charge. The images can be captured with a maximum resolution of 4288 x 3216 and saved in the JPEG Exif ver 2.3 file format. The JX500 also has the ability to record HD videos at 1280 x 720 resolution at 30 fps along with monaural sound which is saved in the AVI Motion JPEG format.

The memory device on this JX500 can be accessed through a highly versatile memory card slot which is compatible with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. These saved media files can be easily transferred to a PC or a laptop via the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. The availability of a composite AV out with user selectable NTSC or PAL signals allows you to view the captured images and videos on a standard definition television.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens of the camera, which on this Fujifilm has a range of f/3.5 - f/6.3. The JX500’s impressive TTL contrast autofocus system has a normal range from 50 cm Wide and 90 cm Tele to infinity along with a macro range of 10 cm - 80 cm Wide and 80 cm - 1.3 m Tele. This advanced autofocus function locks onto the subject while the shutter button is held down half way. This keeps fast moving subjects in the frame and in focus, even at high zoom levels helping you capture dynamic close-up shots.

The light sensitivity or the ISO speed on this camera ranges from ISO 100 to a high ISO 3200. This when clubbed with the available shutter speed of 1/1400 sec to 8 sec along with a built-in flash unit with an operational range of 50 cm - 4.5 m Wide and 90 cm - 2.5 m Tele gives you great image capture capability for low light conditions or even for fast moving objects.

Features

With an extensive selection of pre-programmed shooting modes, this FinePix digital camera ensures high quality images in a variety of conditions, eliminating the need to constantly change the camera settings in order to get optimum results. The available preset white balancing helps to optimize the settings according to the available lighting conditions under various shooting modes.

The presence of Face Detection and Red Eye Reduction technology detects human faces in the picture frame and automatically optimizes the settings to maximize their clarity. The camera’s Digital Image Stabilization technology ensures that all the captured images and videos appear sharp and blur-free.

The self-timer on this point and shoot camera sets off the shutter after a 2 to 10 seconds delay after the capture button is released. The JX500’s continuous mode lets you shoot at 1.1 fps so you can effortlessly capture fast moving or continuously changing or evolving situations without missing out on much of the action. The inclusion of the PictBridge function lets you connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling instant photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm JX500 Point & Shoot Camera Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Fujifilm’s popular and high performance FinePix S series is this S2980 bridge camera. A bridge camera is one that finds the middle ground between a point-and-shoot and a DSLR, which makes it an ideal choice for those looking to make a gradual and a well-informed switch from a simple compact digital camera to a higher performance level.

Featuring the renowned Fujinon 18x optical zoom lens, this camera has a focal length of 5 mm – 90 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 28 mm - 504 mm. This long range optical zoom capability is coupled with the advent of 6.7x digital zoom giving the FinePix considerable levels of magnification. Operating through a powerful CCD image sensor with primary colour filter, the camera has an optical sensor resolution of 14 megapixels.

As with most of the modern bridge cameras, the most noticeable factors are the long range zoom along with its shape and size-wise resemblance to a DSLR. This keeps the overall weight of the S2980 at 437 g including the batteries and the memory card. The CCD image sensor along with the 14 megapixel optical resolution, this FinePix camera is capable of HD Video recording with 1280 x 720 pixel resolution at 30 fps with monaural sound. The S2980’s large 3 inch bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos and view captured images thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution. The advent of a 0.2 inch Electronic Viewfinder offers the flexibility of framing your shots through this electronic viewfinder or by using the 3 inch LCD as a live viewfinder, giving you a variety of shooting experiences.

Battery and Storage

This high performance bridge camera is powered by 4 AA alkaline or 4 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries which supply the camera with power for up to 300 and 500 shots respectively. This FinePix camera can capture images with a maximum resolution of 4288 x 3216 pixels stored in the JPEG Exif ver 2.3 format while all the recorded videos are saved in the AVI Motion JPEG file format.

All the captures images and recorded videos are saved in an SD or SDHC memory card. These saved media files can easily be transferred to a PC or a laptop through the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. This camera also features a composite AV out which supports both NTSC and PAL compatibility along with a HDMI Mini connector. This gives you the option to enjoy your images and videos on a standard or a high definition television.

Performance

The aperture control on this bridge camera has a range of f/3.1 - f/5.6. Working through the TTL contrast detection autofocus system, the S2980 possesses a normal focusing range of 40 cm – 8 m Wide and 2.5 m - 4.4 m Tele. There is the macro focus function with a range of 30 cm along with a highly useful Super Macro mode with an amazing 2 cm range, which together gives you great focusing accuracy and flexibility so that even tiny subjects can be captured with all their detail.

This Fujifilm bridge camera has an available shutter speed range from 1/2000 sec to 8 sec along with a light sensitivity or ISO speed that ranges from ISO 64 to an astonishing ISO 6400 gives this FinePix bridge camera amazing capabilities to shoot anything from fast moving subjects to dramatic night shots. A built-in pop-up flash with an operational range of 40 cm - 8.0 m Wide, 2.5 m - 4.4 m Tele further enhances the low light capability of the FinePix S2980 digital camera.

Features

The presence of pre-programed white balancing modes along with a number of shooting modes let you capture images in a variety of image temperature and colour tones. The S2980’s CCD shift Image Stabilizer makes sure that all your recorded images and videos appear as clear and blur-free as possible. The S2980’s Face Detection functions make it easy to shoot perfect portraits and group shots without red eyes with the help of the on-board Red Eye Reduction technology. .

The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing. The Self Timer function on this bridge camera has a 2 sec and 10 sec delay while the continuous mode allows it to shoot at a maximum rate of 8 fps, giving you very flexible shooting options.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm S2980 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The FinePix HS25EXR is another powerful and a very capable digital bridge camera from the highly rated S series digital cameras from Fujifilm. A bridge camera is one which finds a compromise between the performance levels of a compact camera and a DSLR, making it an ideal choice for intermediate level photographers looking to make a steady and well informed progress in digital photography. Featuring a highly capable Fujinon 30x optical zoom lens with primary colour filter, this FinePix camera has a focal length of 4.2 mm – 126 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 24 - 720 mm. This jaw dropping optical zoom combines with a 2x digital zoom giving you the ability to frame every shot with great precision and accuracy.

Operating through a highly capable EXR CMOS image sensor, this FinePix digital camera has the capacity to capture images at an amazing 16 megapixel resolution. Clubbing the EXR CMOS image sensor along with the 16 megapixel optical sensor resolution gives the HS25EXR the ability to record Full HD videos with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels at 30 fps.

This sizable FinePix digital bridge camera with its enormously long range optical zoom manages to weigh 730 g with the inclusion of the battery and the memory card. Featuring a 0.2 inch electronic LCD viewfinder, this camera also has a 3 inch TFT colour LCD tilt screen which acts as an optional live viewfinder. This 3 inch LCD display also acts as a display device to view all your captured images and videos, thanks to its amazing 460,000 dot display resolution.

Battery and Storage

This high performance FinePix bridge camera is powered by 4 AA alkaline batteries that power the camera up to 350 shots. You also have the option of using rechargeable Ni-MH or lithium batteries as an alternative power source. All the captured images exist in the JPEG Exif ver 2.3 format while the recorded videos are in the H.264 MOV file format and are stored in an SD, SDHC or SDXC UHS-I memory card.

These recorded media can easily be transferred to a PC or an external digital storage device via the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 connectivity. This FinePix also comes with an HDMI Mini connector and a composite AV out which supports both NTSC and PAL which gives you the ability to view all your captured media files on a large screen, be it in standard or high definition.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that is allowed to fall on the image sensor, which on this bridge ranges from f/2.8 - f/5.6. Featuring a TTL contrast detection autofocus function with a range that spans from 45 cm Wide and 3 m Tele to infinity, the HS25EXR also has 7 cm macro and an outstanding 1 cm super macro focus capability.

The light sensitivity of the FinePix bridge camera is from ISO 100 to an incredible ISO 12800, which lets you take clear high quality images even under insufficient light. The camera also features an extremely wide range of adjustable shutter speeds from a prolonged 30 sec to a blistering 1/4000 sec. Further enhancing the low light capability of the FinePix HS25EXR digital camera is a built-in pop-up flash with an operational range of 30 cm - 7.1 m Wide and 2.0 m - 3.8 m Tele. The camera also features a Hot Shoe or an additional provision for an external flash attachment to provide increased lighting for your photographs.

Features

Giving you control over the tone and temperature of the image is the availability of pre-set white balancing settings and shooting modes that automatically detected and selected the appropriate camera settings to best suit the current conditions. This FinePix’s CMOS shift image stabilization efficiently works to eliminate image blurring and minimizing shake at maximum zoom range. The HS25EXR comes with fully loaded detection technologies including Face Detection along with Red Eye Reduction giving you clear optimized people photos.

The self-timer function on this Fujifilm bridge camera lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, making the challenge of capturing perfect self-portraits and group shots a thing of the past. This bridge camera from Fujifilm also sports a continuous mode which lets you shoot at a maximum rate of 11 fps, giving you the option of capturing the entire flow of events without missing out on the action. The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm HS25EXR Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
From the highly revered F series of FinePix digital cameras from Fujifilm, comes this F660EXR Bridge camera. A bridge camera is the type of camera that finds the middle ground between a point-and-shoot and a DSLR, making it an ideal choice for those looking for something more capable than a compact camera while still being considerably cheaper than a standard DSLR.

Working through the renowned Fujinon 15x optical zoom lens, this FinePix camera boasts a focal length of 4.4 mm – 66 mm which is the 35 mm equivalent of 24 mm – 360 mm. This significant optical zoom capability is coupled with a 6.7x digital zoom, giving the FinePix extensive levels of magnification. This superior zooming ability along with the camera’s powerful EXR CMOS with primary colour filter lets you capture images at an amazing 16 megapixel resolution, while also possessing the ability to record full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution videos at 30 fps.

As with most of the modern bridge cameras, the most noticeable factors are the long range zoom along with it increased size when compared to a compact camera. Taking this into consideration, the F660EXR manages to weight only 217 g including its battery and memory card which gives it effortless handling and a much increased portability factor.

This FinePix’s large 3 inch LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos and view captured images thanks to a bright, high-impact 460,000 dot resolution. This 3 inch LCD also serves as a live viewfinder while in shooting mode which compensates for the absence of an optical viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

This high performance bridge camera is powered by a high capacity NP-50A rechargeable lithium-ion battery which supplies the camera with power for up to 300 shots. All the captured images are stored in the JPEG Exif ver 2.3 format while the recorded high definition videos are saved in the H.264 MOV file format. These captures images and recorded videos are stored in an SD, SDHC or SDXC UHS-I memory card.

These saved media files can be very conveniently transferred to a PC or a laptop through the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. The F660EXR also features a composite AV out which supports both NTSC and PAL signals along with an HDMI Mini connector. This gives you the option to enjoy your high quality images and videos on either a standard or a high definition television.

Performance

The aperture control lets you adjust the amount of light that is allowed to fall on the image sensor, which on this FinePix ranges from f/3.5 - f/5.3. Featuring a TTL contrast detection autofocus function with a range of 45 cm Wide and 2.5 m Tele to infinity, the F660EXR also has a 5 cm macro focus capability. With an ISO speed that ranges from ISO 100 to a mind-blowing ISO 12800 along with an available shutter speed range from 1/2000 sec to 8 sec, this FinePix camera lets you capture stunning images of anything from fast moving subjects to low light events. To further enhance the low light capability of the F660EXR digital camera is a built-in pop-up flash with an operational range of 15 cm – 3.2 m Wide and 90 cm – 1.9 m Tele.

Features

The presence of pre-programed white balancing modes along with a number of shooting modes let you capture images in a variety of image temperature and colour tones. The F660EXR's CMOS shift Image Stabilizer makes sure that all your recorded images and videos appear sharp and blur-free. The presence of Face Detection along with Red Eye Reduction technology lets you shoot portraits and group shots with perfect clarity and maximize visibility.

The self-timer function on the FinePix F660EXR lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, while the continuous shooting mode allows you to shoot at a maximum rate of 11 fps. The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm F660EXR Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Fujifilm X-Pro1 is part of the FinePix’s X series of premium and highly capable interchangeable lens cameras. Offering a staggering array of improved features, higher-speeds, greater resolution and extended creative options in both image and video departments, X-Pro1 is sure to deliver high speed and extremely precise image processing.

Housing an extremely powerful X-Trans CMOS image sensor which is far more superior to the standard full frame sensor, giving you the capability to capture high quality images at an incredible 16.3 megapixel resolution. The advent of Fujifilm’s powerful and dedicated EXR Processor Pro makes it possible to capture extremely clear high resolution images, while also being capable of recording full HD videos at 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution at 24 fps.

Body

With majority of the body panel composed of die-cast magnesium alloy, the X-Pro1 is a precision optical instrument, built without compromise. The light weight body design that weighs 450 g including the battery and the memory card provides easy-handling, for more extensive and repeated use. The X-Pro1 features a Hybrid Multi Viewfinder which gives you the freedom to switch between an optical and electronic viewfinder so that every shot can be perfectly framed and composed.

Featuring a 3 inch high performance RGBW LCD screen with a display resolution of 1,230,000 dot pixels, this digital camera lets you view all your captured images at a very high quality. Powered by an NP-W126 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, the X-Pro1 is capable of shooting up to 300 frames on a single full charge. All the captures images are saved in the JPEG EXIF 2.3, RAW or RAW + JPEG formats while the high definition videos are saved in the H.264 MOV file format. These recorded media files are stored in an SD, SDHC or SDXC UHS-I memory card.

The saved media files from the memory card can easily be transferred to a PC or a laptop through the camera’s high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface. This camera also features HDMI Mini connectivity giving you the option to enjoy your images and videos on a high definition television.

Performance

The FujiFIlm X mount on the X-Pro1 makes it compatible with 3 Fujinon lens types which are the XF18mmF2 R, XF35mmF1.4 R and XF60mmF2.4 R Macro lens. The auto focus system on this Fujifilm camera works using the TTL contrast detection technology to give you crystal clear images. The ISO light sensitivity on this Fujifilm ranges from ISO 100 to 12800, giving it the ability to consistently capture sharp and clear images even under varying lighting conditions.

This high performance digital camera also has an operational shutter speed ranging from a maximum of 1/4000 sec to a minimum of 30 sec. As the Fujifilm X-Pro1 does not feature a built-in flash unit, it provides a provision for an external flash attachment.

Features

To further adjust the feel and temperature of the image is the availability of pre-set white balancing settings and shooting modes that automatically detected and selected the appropriate camera settings to best suit the current situation. Also featuring a Sensor Dust Reduction system, the X-Pro1 has the ability to remove the dust that settles on the image sensor which usually causes mild distortion and deteriorated image quality.

The other very useful functions include Face Detection and Red Eye Reduction which help you capture clear and optimized people photos, while the self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, making self-portraits or group shots extremely fun and convenient. This X-Pro1 also sports a continuous mode which lets you take up to 6 fps, giving you the option of capturing the entire flow of events without missing out on the action. The availability of PictBridge technology allows you to connect the camera directly to a printer without a PC, enabling easy direct photo printing.
productAttributes.title: Fujifilm X-Pro1 Mirrorless Camera Black, Body Only

productAttributes.productDescription:
This advanced Lumix DMC-FH7 point and shoot digital camera from Panasonic comes with a 28 mm wide angle LEICA DC VARIO – ELMAR lens with primary colour filter that sports a focal length of 5 mm - 20 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 28 - 112 mm. This highly specialized lens comes with a 4x optical zoom capacity along with a 4x digital zoom.

This Lumix camera works through the highly capable CCD image sensor which gives the DMC-FH7 a remarkable optical sensor resolution of 16.1 megapixels. This Lumix camera from Panasonic sports a slim and stylish body design that sports a combined weight of 126 g that includes battery and memory card, this compact digital camera is highly portable and easy to carry around on all your travels.

The CCD image processor when combined with the camera’s 16.1 megapixel resolution gives it the ability to record HD 1280 x 720 pixel resolution videos at 24 fps.  All the captured images and videos can be viewed on the camera’s 3.0 inch TFT Touch Screen LCD Display with a display resolution of 230,000 dots pixels. This brilliant LCD screen not only lets you view your high quality images and videos, but also doubles a live viewfinder as this Lumix doesn’t feature an optical viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

This Panasonic Lumix camera is powered by a 660 mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery that last for up to 240 images on a single full charge. All the saved images and videos are stored on an SD, SDHC or SDXC memory card and can be accessed via a memory card slot. The still images are saved in the JPEG Exif 2.3 format while the videos are saved in the M-JPEG Motion JPEG file format.

The camera features an AV interface that supports both PAL and NTSC signals while a high-speed USB 2.0 port acts as the camera’s digital interface. This allows for easy transfer of files from the camera’s memory to a laptop or a PC as it is compatible with the latest Windows and Mac operating systems.

Performance

With an aperture range of f/3.1 - f/6.5, this Lumix digital camera features an autofocus system that works using the TTL contrast detection technology, giving you a well-defined depth of field to work with.

The ISO speed or the light sensitivity on this Lumix camera standard ISO range of ISO 100 to ISO 1600 and a high sensitivity range of ISO 1600 to ISO 6400. The variety of shutter speeds available on this camera ranges from 1/1600 sec to 8 sec and a specialized Starry Sky Mode which allows for up to 60 sec of open shutter duration. This Panasonic Lumix further increases its low light image capturing capability with a built-in flash unit that has an operational range of 0.4 m - 3.3 m Wide and 1.0 m– 1.6 m Tele.

Features

The Panasonic Lumix camera comes with a variety of shooting modes and white balance modes which give you a number of pre-set functions that are tailor-made to work perfectly in very specific situations or conditions.

The built-in flash features Red Eye Reduction which helps capture clear and undisturbed images, irrespective of the available light. The face detection feature automatically finds, focuses and prioritises the clarity of human faces within the image frame.  This along with a 2 or 10 second self-timer function gives the photographer a great deal of convenience to capture great self-portraits and group shots. Featuring a very effective Optical Image Stabilizer, the DMC-FH7 lets you capture sharp images and videos with minimum blur or distortion.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Point and Shoot cameras are great for home based photography and also for capturing memorable moments on outings and other special occasions where high powered DSLRs are not required.

Sensor Technology

This Sony Cyber Shot camera is equipped with a high quality 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS sensor that can function well under almost all lighting conditions. Even in terms of low light conditions, if you can achieve a steady grip and a firm focus, you can manage to get decent pictures.

Zoom Levels and Lens Arrangement

This camera by Sony is equipped with a high quality lens arrangement that allows you to have an Optical Zoom level of 10 X. Having the option of optical zoom is more functional than going in for digital zoom.

High Speed Auto Focus

This is a great feature to have in a point and shoot camera as it allows for some high speed reactions when the opportune moment presents itself before you. With the High Speed Auto Focus mode, you can be sure that the camera will not waste too much time in focusing on the subject. You can thus easily take the shot and never miss another moment.

Steadily Does it

The Improved Optical SteadyShot feature is another great function of the camera. It allows you to optically stabilize the image before you click it and thus, create a beautiful shot every time.

Creative Modes

This camera by Sony is just the right fit for the creative one in you. It comes with 9 different Picture Effects that can add new life to your clicked images. This will allow you to explore your creative side and is also best suited for sharing on social networking web sites.

Size Does Matter

This camera is a slim offering by Sony, allowing you to carry it with you almost anywhere you may go.

productAttributes.productDescription:
From Panasonic’s popular HX Series of upright HD camcorders is the very compact and feature filled HX-DC2. With a purpose-built shape and design, this Panasonic camcorder makes an ideal travel companion that provides extreme ease of use while capturing high quality images and videos under a variety of situations. The advent of a powerful MOS image sensor gives this Panasonic camcorder an amazing sensor resolution of 14.3 megapixels. This high image resolution gives the HX-DC2 the ability to capture high quality still images as well as record full HD videos with 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution.

One of the most innovative and unique features on this Panasonic camcorder is its twin shutter design, which has a single touch operation for still image and video capture at the same time. This means that you can capture still images at a reduced resolution without any interruption to on-going video recording. The captured high quality images are saved in the JPEG DCF/Exif2.2 format while the video files are saved in the MPEG-4 AVC/H.264 file format. The audio recording in the video mode is picked up by the camcorder’s built-in 2 channel stereo microphone and is saved in the ACC file format. 

The Panasonic HX-DC2 features an Active E.I.S or Electrical Image Stabilizer that makes sure that the captured images and videos appear clear with minimal blurring. This feature helps you to effectively use the camcorder in a variety of styles like shooting with full zoom or video recording while walking or running.

Body

This Panasonic camcorder sports a very compact and efficient design that has a body weight of only 162 g and an operational weight of 180 g which includes the battery and memory card. The HX-DC2 features a very user-friendly grip design which dedicated to providing you with steady single-hand shooting, which considerably increases its effectiveness in various shooting situations.

Featuring a 3 inch Wide LCD Screen with a 230,400 dot resolution, this camcorder has the added brilliance of a free-angle LCD. This provides a 285 degree field of screen rotation so that you can operate from almost any screen angle that you see fit. The memory device on this camcorder can be accessed through a memory card slot that is compatible SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. This Panasonic camcorder gets its power from a rechargeable lithium-ion battery with a minimum capacity of 700mAh.

Performance

The HX-DC2 operates a lens with a focal length of 6.8 mm – 34 mm which has a 5x optical zoom capacity. Apart from the additional digital zoom of 50x still imaging and 120x motion imaging, this Panasonic has a 15x Intelligent zoom function which gives you great magnification without any loss of quality. The iris type aperture on the camcorder has range of f/3.5 Tele – f3.7 Wide, which gives you effective usage under variable lighting conditions. The nine-point autofocus system with a macro range 1 cm lets you take sharp images from wide open spaces to extreme close-up shots.

This Panasonic has a shutter speed that ranges from a 1/2 sec to 1/1500 sec for image capture and from 1/15 sec to 1/10000 for video recording. This with the inclusion of a built-in flash lets you capture dramatic images of moving objects or moments in low light situations.

Features & Connectivity

The Panasonic’s white balancing modes can be used to capture stunning images and videos with pre-set adjustments that are perfectly suited for a particular situation or lighting condition. Another brilliant feature on this camcorder is the Panorama mode which lets you shoot consecutive shots that are stitched together to create a dramatic 180 or 360 degree canvas of the desired surroundings. This panoramic image can also be either shot in the horizontal or vertical plane.

The Face Detection technology detects the amount of ambient light and automatically adjusts the exposure settings so the faces in the frame appear clear and sharp. The continuous burst mode on this HX-DC2 lets you capture up to 40 continuous 3 megapixel images with in 4 sec giving you a wide series of shots of a particular subject or incident. The HX-DC2 lets you transfer all your images and videos on your PC or laptop using its high-speed USB 2.0 port. This camcorder also features a composite AV out along with a mini HDMI port so you can relive those special moments on a standard or a high definition TV.
