productAttributes.productDescription:
The DSC-HX20V is an advanced CyberShot camera from Sony comes with a 25 mm wide angle Sony G lens with a focal length of 4.45 - 89 mm or a 35 mm equivalent of 25 mm - 500 mm. This highly specialised lens comes with a phenomenal 20x optical zoom capacity along with the further availability of a 40x clear image digital zoom. The camera works through the highly capable Exmor R CMOS image sensor that comes with Extra High Sensitivity technology giving the DSC-HX20V a remarkable optical sensor resolution of 18.2 megapixels.

The DSC-HX20V sports a slim body which features Sony’s trademark CyberShot design and styling. With a combined weight of 254 g that includes battery and memory stick, this compact digital camera is highly portable and easy to carry along on all your travels. The advent of a powerful BIONZ imaging processor, this CyberShot camera has the ability to record full HD videos with 1920 x 1080 resolution at 60 fps. All the captured images and videos can be viewed on the camera’s 3 inch XtraFine TruBlack LCD display with a brilliant display resolution of 921,600 dots which also doubles as the camera’s live viewfinder.

Battery and Storage

Powered by a NP-BG1 rechargeable lithium-ion battery, this camera has the capacity to capture up to 320 shots on a single charge. The memory device on the camera can be accessed through a memory card slot that supports a wide variety of cards that includes Memory Stick Duo/ Pro Duo/ PRO HG Duo, Memory Stick Micro, SD, SDHC, SDXC, Micro SD and Micro SDHC memory card.

This CyberShot camera works on a high-speed USB 2.0 digital interface which lets you effortlessly transfer all the stored files from the camera’s memory to a PC or a laptop. It also features a HDMI mini connector which allows you to directly connect to an HDTV so you can instantly enjoy all your images and videos at its highest quality.

Performance

The aperture control function lets you adjust the amount of light that passes through the lens of the camera, which on this CyberShot has an available range of f/3.2 - f/5.8. The autofocus function on this camera works using the contrast detection technology that gives the camera a macro focus range of 1 cm that helps you with all your close-up shots.

The ISO speed or the light sensitivity of the DSC-HX20V has a wide range of ISO 100 all the way up to a colossal ISO 12800. The variety of shutter speeds available on this camera has a highest of 1/1600 sec and a lowest of a very prolonged 30 sec. This CyberShot further increases its low light image capturing capability with a built-in flash unit that has an operational range of 40 cm – 7.1 m Wide and 1.7 - 3.9 m Tele on auto ISO and 10 m Wide - 5.5 m Tele on ISO 3200.

Features

The Sony CyberShot camera comes with a variety of shooting modes and 6 white balance modes which give you a number of pre-programed functions that are tailor-made to work perfectly in very specific situations or conditions. The advent of Optical SteadyShot image stabilizer, the DSC-HX20V lets you capture sharp and blur-free images.

The built-in flash features Red Eye Reduction which helps capture clear and undisturbed images, irrespective of the available light. The face detection feature automatically finds, focuses and prioritises the clarity of up to 8 faces within the image frame with a special child and adult priority function. This along with a 2 or 10 second self-timer function gives the photographer a great deal of convenience for self-portraits and group shots. The DSC-HX20V is capable is shooting up to 10 fps on the continuous mode which greatly helps while shooting fast moving objects.

productAttributes.productDescription:
With compact cameras, it becomes quite easy to carry it around, no matter where you go. The PowerShot camera by Canon is a great compact camera that can fit into your bag or loose pocket so that it always remains available when you need to click a quick snap.

Zoom it Out

With the incorporation of the 28 mm Wide-Angle Lens, you can get a 16 X Optical Zoom level on the camera, which can also go up to 32 X with Zoom Plus. The optical zoom results in high precision, quality images even from a distance as long as it does not progress into the digital zoom range. The in-built optical image stabilizer greatly reduces camera shakes so that you can easily achieve stunning photos and images.

Automatic

The Smart AUTO function is a very helpful mode in the compact camera as it allows even the most amateur photographer to achieve some of the best shots possible. This mode is incorporated so that you do not need to worry too much about exposure, focal length and other feature settings that DSLR users need to keep in mind. The Smart AUTO feature can intelligently select the ideal settings for the compact camera which is based on 32 predefined shooting scenarios that will ensure the best possible stills or videos.

Media Capture

With the optics already incorporated with the powerful image sensor, you can expect to take high quality 720 p videos with the 16.0 MP compact camera. The Canon DIGIC4 image processor delivers some stunning visuals thanks to the high image quality output. Apart from being able to record in 720 p, the camera is also able to record good quality stereo sound to go with the video files.

Other Features

With the high speed auto focus mode, you can take high quality images across a wide variety of situations. The auto focus mode works well with the optical image stabilizer and the result is a host of highly detailed shots that are derived from this camera. This also works well in terms of low light conditions since there is little need to boost the ISO sensitivity and risk noisy shots.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot SX160 IS Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Advanced Point and Shoot cameras are simple to use even though they come packed with a host of different features that can make photography fun for even the greenest lensman. The Canon PowerShot SX 500 is a great camera for beginners as well as for professionals to serve as an emergency backup camera.

Sensor Technology

The camera is equipped with a high performance 16 MP image sensor that can be used even for low light photography with adequate artificial lighting, often supplied by the in-built flash. The camera is quite compact for the kind of lens that it comes with. The sensor-lens arrangement is finely tuned to take high quality images over a wide range of situations.

Zoom In

This camera is capable of taking photos over quite a distance. The lens can zoom in to 30 times more than standard focus 30 X which lets you take pictures of subjects that are at quite a distance away from you. Get in on the action without even physically being there as long as you are within the 30 X range of the camera to capture that awesome shot you always wanted.

Auto Mode

Most camera that come with Auto Mode for Focusing, do so at the expense of speed. The Canon PowerShot on the hand is perfectly capable of taking pictures in the Auto Focus mode, with little or no lag in speed between focusing and clicking the perfect shot.

Ultra Slim

This camera is ultra-compact and loaded with a really powerful wide-angle lens with optical zoom along the range of 24 – 720 mm. The slim profile can easily trick you into thinking that the camera skimps on features to fit into the profile. On closer examination however, you can see that you have most if not all the manual controls that can be seen on a quintessential DSLR camera. This provides you with quality in all your well times images.

Intelligent IS

This camera is capable of setting the IS levels automatically for almost all situations which results in crystal clear pictures that can be captured by just about anyone with the photographer’s eye. Capture the precious moments in the form of photos or videos. The intelligent IS can eliminate shakes by simple analysis of the motion sensed through the camera body. Taking into account the subject and the camera, the Intelligent IS can identify the shot type and make adjustments accordingly. You also have Zoom with Framing Assist.
productAttributes.title: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS Point & Shoot Camera

productAttributes.productDescription:
Point and Shoot cameras make for great  devices that can be used to introduce someone to the art of advanced photography. The device, like the Panasonic Lumix DMC is designed to bring together the basics of photography with a hint of how a DSLR camera may function.

Sensor Technology

The Panasonic Lumix point and shoot camera is equipped with a powerful 16.1 MP sensor that can be used to take awesome photos. This sensor is well designed for low light photography as well provided you know how to set the values that will determine the ultimate quality of the clicked picture.

Zoom In

The camera is also equipped with a highly capable lens that can support a zoom level of 21 X in the optical range. The optical zoom is more useful while taking pictures as compared to the digital zoom as it does not cause picture distortions as is seen with digital zoom. The pixels are what get zoomed in the digital zoom function, thereby reducing the overall picture quality.

Stable Does It

This camera comes with an Optical Image Stabilizer that can be used to create steady shots even on unsteady terrain or even when someone with unsteady hands operates the camera.

Auto Mode

This camera is also incorporated with the Intelligent Auto mode that can detect the scenes for you. This is highly useful for beginners as it allows them to concentrate more on the focusing rather than handling too many tasks together. The Intelligent Auto Mode can detect the scene and set the values for the perfect shot automatically.

Manual Exposure

This camera is mainly a point and shoot with advanced functions and a better lens, even then, it comes with manual controls that can be used to learn the workings of phography with manual settings. This camera allows you to set a host of values on your own so that you can experiment with photography as you learn.

Video Recording

You can take HD Videos with the Panasonic Lumix camera and also engage in breathtaking Panorama shots that can unlock the potential of photography in most people.

Display Technology

This camera is also equipped with a 3.0-inch 460 K-dot LCD screen that is rich in detail level. This screen will be highly useful for previews and also serves as the primary viewfinder while taking pictures. This is also highly useful for video playback or even for recording.
productAttributes.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ20 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Samsung ES90 Point & Shoot Camera Silver
Nikon Coolpix S800c Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon Coolpix L610 Point & Shoot Camera Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Point and Shoot camera systems are ideally designed for people who are yet to master the art of photography. The Nikon Coolpix L610 point and shoot camera is well designed to be a backup camera as well as a beginner’s learning tool.

Sensor Technology

This Nikon camera is equipped with a powerful 16 MP CMOS sensor that can take amazingly clear pictures for a point and shoot camera. This sensor is also well suited for low light photography as well. The sensor is also designed in such a way that the camera performs at optimum levels across a wide spectrum of lighting conditions. This is highly useful for situations where lighting conditions vary across areas and environments that subjects are focused on.

Zooming Capability

This versatile point and shoot device is well suited for high quality photography even when the subject to be focused on is somewhat far off. With a zoom capability of 14 X in the optical range, it is quite possible to get in on the action without actually having to move close to the subject physically.

Display Prowess for High Detail Capture

This camera is also equipped with a powerful LCD display of 3 inches that supports a 460 K dot display for unmatched clarity and detail levels.

Full HD Video Recording

This camera is also capable of Full HD video recording capabilities. This means that you can record at a resolution of 1080 p which will result in high quality captures for all your precious memories.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L610 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Advanced Point and Shoot cameras are great for people who are still getting into the hang of photography though still unsure of how to use a DSLR effectively. The Sony DSC H100 is the perfect camera for beginners and intermediates alike. For intermediates, this will work well as a secondary camera or a backup camera.

Super Sensor

The camera comes equipped with a Super HAD CCD Sensor that has 16.1 effective MPs for high quality and detailed images. This is a great sensor for photography across varying situations that entail different lighting and scene conditions. The inbuilt HAD CCD sensor is highly capable even in low light conditions as long as the hand that clicks the image is steady. The camera also comes with the Intelligent Auto mode that makes shooting images that much more convenient and fun. This mode is also useful for when you need to quickly shoot an image or risk losing out on the moment.

Zoom it In

As is with most advanced point and shoot cameras, even in the Sony device, magnification is of prime importance right after picture quality. The Sony DSC camera however places Magnification and Picture Quality together by offering a whopping 21 X of Optical Zoom. Optical zoom offers more precision and clarity over digital zoom as it involves actual magnification rather than pixel manipulation as is the case with digital zoom cameras. The Wide Zoom also covers 25 mm to 525 mm.

HD Recording

You can use the highly capable camera for recording movies and videos at 720 pixels. This HD recording will come in handy for when you want to record your precious memories in video rather than simply taking pictures. The high quality HD recording capability of the camera can also be used to document important corporate events or formal parties as the camera is more than capable of handling the situation.

Clear Photo LCD

The Clear Photo LCD screen that comes with the Sony DSC H100 camera is a high quality feature that can support 460 thousand dots which translates into a very highly detailed image preview on the camera screen itself. This is handy for photographers as they will be able to quickly gauge the quality of the image before they decide if it needs to be re-shot or not. Apart from helping in preview, it will also come in handy for when you need to decide which image stays and which needs to be deleted.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Point and Shoot cameras are perfect for people who love to learn the details of photography. This is especially prominent in the Canon range of cameras as they are very user-friendly. This is best suited for people who are well versed in photography, yet are not confident enough to step up to a DSLR just yet.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a powerful and highly responsive 12.1 MP CMOS sensor that can be used for high speed photography with the right lighting conditions. In terms of ordinary situations, or even in the auto mode, you can rely on this camera to perform really well in low light conditions, or across the brightness spectrum.

Image Stabilization is Key

In any camera, a stable image is possible only if the device is kept really still, or at the very least, the device should have the necessary features that let you take crystal clear images even under unstable conditions. This Canon Powershot camera is equipped with an Intelligent Image Stabilizer system that ensures that you always take high quality images free of blurs and other stability related imperfections.

Display Features and Screen Technology

This camera employs an LCD screen with 2.8 inches of size that comes in the Vari-angle format. This is a great format that allows you to quickly and efficiently turn the screen to almost any angle with relation to the lens direction. This also means that you can take difficult angles with relative ease.

High Speed Photography with Auto Focus

This camera is also incorporated with the high speed Auto Focus feature that allows you to focus quickly on the subject under the auto mode. This is a special feature as not many point and shoot cameras, even advanced ones, have quick focus. This is a feature that comes in handy especially when you go in for quick photography, when a situation is so fleeting that manually focusing on it may result in that moment passing by.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Taking a picture or shooting a video is not just about saving a series of memories, you also put in a lot of your own creativity to bring the moment alive in an artificial medium which by itself is no easy task. The D5200 by Nikon is a great DSLR camera with exceptional handling and exciting new perspectives depending on the kind of lens you pair it with.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a fairly large, powerful 24.1 MP DX-format CMOS sensor that can take stunning pictures across a wide range of lighting conditions. The sensor is designed to reproduce images with stunning quality and it can also be used for high sensitivity images that require a range of ISO settings. The EXPEED 3 image processing engine works well with the intelligent scene recognition system that can automatically set the right values for a perfect shot.

Continuous Shooting

With the Nikon D5200 you can also engage in continuous shooting with a 5 FPS framerate. This allows you to take actions shots in sequence without having to miss a single moment. This is highly useful in sports as you get to shoot before, during and after a designated moment which then provides you with a host of photos that can choose from to pick out the winning shot.

ISO Sensitivity

You can choose between 100-6400 ISO settings, which is also expandable to 25600 ISO if the need arises. For most shots however, you can easily manage in the lower ISO settings as the higher settings will only be in play if you need to take pictures of dimly lit subjects.

Display Technology

This camera is equipped with a Vari-Angle LCD display that can be used to view the subjects along almost any angle before taking the picture. This is highly useful for trick photography when you need to get a certain angle captured which may not be possible with a fixed angle display. You also have an optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter. You can also take videos in Full HD, at 1080 p resolution.

Remote Control

With the optional Remote control system, you can set your camera for the perfect shot and safely fire the remote to engage the shutter release so that you do not contribute to vibrations that may ruin an image capture. This is especially useful in very low light photography or when capturing the night sky with a large exposure level.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5200 DSLR Camera Black, Body with AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55 mm F/3.5-5.6G VR II Lens
Canon EOS-M Mirrorless Camera Silver, Body with 18-55 mm Lens & Speedlite-90x Flash

Continuous Shooting

With the Nikon D5200 you can also engage in continuous shooting with a 5 FPS framerate. This allows you to take actions shots in sequence without having to miss a single moment. This is highly useful in sports as you get to shoot before, during and after a designated moment which then provides you with a host of photos that can choose from to pick out the winning shot.

ISO Sensitivity

You can choose between 100-6400 ISO settings, which is also expandable to 25600 ISO if the need arises. For most shots however, you can easily manage in the lower ISO settings as the higher settings will only be in play if you need to take pictures of dimly lit subjects.

Display Technology

This camera is equipped with a Vari-Angle LCD display that can be used to view the subjects along almost any angle before taking the picture. This is highly useful for trick photography when you need to get a certain angle captured which may not be possible with a fixed angle display. You also have an optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter. You can also take videos in Full HD, at 1080 p resolution.

Remote Control

With the optional Remote control system, you can set your camera for the perfect shot and safely fire the remote to engage the shutter release so that you do not contribute to vibrations that may ruin an image capture. This is especially useful in very low light photography or when capturing the night sky with a large exposure level.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5200 DSLR Camera Bronze, Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
Taking a picture or shooting a video is not just about saving a series of memories, you also put in a lot of your own creativity to bring the moment alive in an artificial medium which by itself is no easy task. The D5200 by Nikon is a great DSLR camera with exceptional handling and exciting new perspectives depending on the kind of lens you pair it with.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a fairly large, powerful 24.1 MP DX-format CMOS sensor that can take stunning pictures across a wide range of lighting conditions. The sensor is designed to reproduce images with stunning quality and it can also be used for high sensitivity images that require a range of ISO settings. The EXPEED 3 image processing engine works well with the intelligent scene recognition system that can automatically set the right values for a perfect shot.

Continuous Shooting

With the Nikon D5200 you can also engage in continuous shooting with a 5 FPS framerate. This allows you to take actions shots in sequence without having to miss a single moment. This is highly useful in sports as you get to shoot before, during and after a designated moment which then provides you with a host of photos that can choose from to pick out the winning shot.

ISO Sensitivity

You can choose between 100-6400 ISO settings, which is also expandable to 25600 ISO if the need arises. For most shots however, you can easily manage in the lower ISO settings as the higher settings will only be in play if you need to take pictures of dimly lit subjects.

Display Technology

This camera is equipped with a Vari-Angle LCD display that can be used to view the subjects along almost any angle before taking the picture. This is highly useful for trick photography when you need to get a certain angle captured which may not be possible with a fixed angle display. You also have an optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter. You can also take videos in Full HD, at 1080 p resolution.

Remote Control

With the optional Remote control system, you can set your camera for the perfect shot and safely fire the remote to engage the shutter release so that you do not contribute to vibrations that may ruin an image capture. This is especially useful in very low light photography or when capturing the night sky with a large exposure level.
productAttributes.title: Nikon D5200 DSLR Camera Red, Body with AF-S 18-55 mm VR Lens

productAttributes.productDescription:
You can now make friends envious with the Nikon Coolpix S100. From Nikon's S series of point and shoot digital cameras, the S100 is ideal for everyday photography. The Nikkor lens of this Nikon digital camera has a 5x optical zoom with a focal length of 5 - 25 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm. This Coolpix camera also has a 4x digital zoom which you can use to bring your subjects closer.

This Coolpix camera has a CMOS image sensor with which you can take pictures at 16 megapixel resolution. This Nikon Coolpix camera weighs 138 g and can fit comfortably in your pocket or handbag. The smooth corners and slim body of the S100 make this a stylish camera. The back panel of the camera is completely devoid of buttons, maintaining its streamlined look.

You can shoot videos in Full HD at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 dot pixel 30 fps. With the 3.5 inch OLED touchscreen display which has a resolution of 820,000 dot pixel, you can compose pictures and shoot videos with ease and edit them at the touch of a finger. The display screen also has an anti-reflection coating that makes viewing pictures in the sun convenient.

In the 3D mode, a simple two click process allows you to capture a still image from 2 perspectives. The Nikon S100 then processes the images together, creating a 3D photographic image.

Battery and Storage

You can take up to 150 images with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery on a single charge. This Nikon S100 has an inbuilt memory of 71 MB and can be expanded using SD, SDHC or SDXC memory cards.

You can now keep space in your S100 camera available for more pictures by transferring all images to a PC or a laptop using the high speed USB 2.0 port. You can also watch your Full HD videos on an HDTV by connecting the Coolpix S100 using the HDMI mini connector.

Performance

Aperture refers to the size of the opening in the lens with which the picture is taken and controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. This Nikon S100 camera has an aperture range of f/3.9 - 4.8. You can take precise pictures with the Coolpix camera's Auto focus range of 500 mm onwards on Auto mode and from 10 mm onwards on Macro mode.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor. In the Nikon Coolpix S100, the light sensitivity ranges from ISO 125 - 800 in Auto mode and from ISO 125 - 3200 in Manual mode. This Coolpix digital camera has a shutter speed of 1 - 1/1500 second on Auto mode and can go up to 4 seconds on Fireworks scene mode. You can take bright pictures even in the dark with in-built flash.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix has 20 preset scene modes like Pet Portrait, Food, Museum, Fireworks show and many more. The in-camera filter effects in this Coolpix point and shoot, like Selective color, Cross Screen, Fish Eye and Miniature Effect can be used to liven up your pictures further.

You can also use the The Night Portrait scene mode allows you to take stunning pictures even in dim light. A combination of electronic and lens-shift vibration reduction ensures that you take blur-free pictures at every occasion.

The Smile timer function of this Coolpix camera automatically detects when your subject smiles and releases the shutter to capture those perfect moments. The Face Priority auto focus feature can find and focus up to 12 faces in a single frame. The Nikon Coolpix S100's Blink Warning function can detect if the subject has blinked in a picture and will warn you, so the image can be retaken.

The self-timer in the Coolpix S100 has options of delaying the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. You can also capture up to 3 shots in the Continuous mode at 8.1 frames per second.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
You can now take photos and store memories in full-style with the Nikon Coolpix S6200 from the Style series of point and shoot digital cameras of Nikon. This digital camera is ideal for everyday use with convenient functions. The Coolpix S6200 has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 45 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 250 mm.

The CCD sensor of the Nikon S6200 digital camera lets you take images at 16 megapixel resolution. You can be sure that you will get a shot of the action even from far away with the 10x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom of the Nikon S6200. This Coolpix digital camera can shoot videos in HD at a resolution of 1280 x 720 dot pixels 30 fps.

Weighing 160 g, this lightweight digital point and shoot camera will fit into any bag or pocket. The sleek and sophisticated design of the Nikon S6200 will make you the envy of your friends. The back panel of the Nikon S6200 has one-touch buttons for scene modes, video shooting and preview.

The EXPEED C2 image processing engine of the Coolpix S6200 reduces noise grains in images and enhances video recording quality. The 2.7 inch TFT LCD display screen of this Coolpix S6200 camera has a resolution of 230,000 dot pixels. You can use this display screen to compose and preview images.

Battery and Storage

The Nikon Coolpix S6200 has an internal storage capacity of 74 MB and can be expanded using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can take up to 250 shots with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. With the USB high speed port, you can transfer your images to a computer and ensure that you always have space for more images on your Nikon Coolpix point and shoot camera. Your videos can be watched on an HDTV with the HDMI port on this Nikon S6200 camera.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix S6200 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 5.8 which controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. You can use the aperture settings to create dramatic effects in the depth of images. This camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 3200.

With the Auto Focus range of 500 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity Tele, you can be assured of images in sharp focus. In Macro mode, the focus range changes to 100 mm onwards Wide, letting you experiment with creative macro photography. You can also light up the darkest day and take bright images with the built-in flash of the Nikon Coolpix S6200.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix S6200 has 18 pre-set scene modes and filter effects like Fisheye, Selective Color and many more. With the latter, you can fill color in just one part of your image and create striking effects in your photographs. The lens shift Vibration Reduction compensates for camera shake and ensures that all your images are blur-free and clear.

The Face Detection feature of the Coolpix S6200 automatically identifies faces in the frame and ensures that they are in sharp focus. With the Smile Timer function, the Nikon S6200 automatically releases the shutter when it identifies a smiling face in the frame. The Blink Proof mode warns you when your subject has closed their eyes in a photograph, letting you take another one in its place.

The self-timer feature can delay shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, letting you join your friends in all your favorite memories. In Continuous mode, you can shoot up to 2 shots at 1.2 frames per second, and always capture every moment of a violin recital or gym exhibition perfectly.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S6200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Photography just became convenient. The Nikon Coolpix S6150 belongs to the S series of the Nikon point and shoot cameras. This Coolpix S6150 can help beginners hone their photography skills. This Nikon Coolpix camera has a focal length of 5 - 35 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length range of 28 - 196 mm. The Coolpix S6150 has a Nikkor Lens with 7x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom that you can use to bring your subjects closer.

This Coolpix point and shoot camera takes images at 16 megapixel resolution. This Nikon S6150 weighs 175 g and has a sleek body. The small size and one touch buttons for movie recording and picture preview on the back panel make this a user friendly camera. With this Nikon digital camera, you can shoot videos in HD at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 30 fps.

The EXPEED C2 image processing engine of this Nikon Coolpix S6150 supports high sensitivity and advanced noise reduction in your images. You can compose your pictures and preview them on the 3 inch TFT LCD touchscreen display which has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixel. The anti-reflection coating of the display screen reduces glare from the screen if you are photographing in the sunlight.

Battery and Storage

With this Coolpix camera, you can take about 180 frames with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery on a single charge. The Nikon point and shoot digital camera has an inbuilt memory of 20 MB and can be expanded using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards.

You can transfer your photographs to a PC or a laptop using the USB port, freeing up more space on the Nikon S6150. You can also watch your HD videos on an HDTV using the Coolpix camera's mini HDMI connector.

Performance

Aperture refers to the size of the opening in the lens with which the picture is taken and controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. The aperture of this Coolpix digital camera ranges from f/ 3.7 - 5.6. The Nikon camera has a focus range of 500 mm to infinity in the Normal mode and 30 mm to infinity in the Macro mode, letting you take sharp and clear pictures every time.

ISO film speed refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor. This Coolpix S6150 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600 on Auto mode. You can also manually change the light sensitivity setting in the range of ISO 80 - 3200. You can use the inbuilt flash to brighten images taken in the dark.

Features

This Nikon Coolpix camera has 19 preset scene modes like Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Backlighting, Pet Portrait and many more. With the Pet Portrait mode, when your dog or cat faces the camera, the Nikon Coolpix S6150 will automatically focus on their face and release the shutter. With the lens-shift Vibration Reduction VR, you can take crisp and blur-free pictures with ease.

This Nikon Coolpix S6150 has a Selective Color filter which converts your image to a monochrome and fills a color of your choice in one part, transforming your image dramatically. With the Smile Timer function, your Coolpix S6150 will release the shutter when your subject smiles. With the Blink Proof feature, you will be alerted when your subject blinks, letting you take another image.

With the self-timer, you can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds. The Best Shot Selector BSS automatically selects the sharpest image from up to 10 sequential shots. With the Nikon's Continuous mode, you can shoot up to 2 shots at 1.2 frames per second to record every moment. In the Multi-shot mode, you can take up to 16 frames with a single shutter release and the S6150 will arrange it in a 4 x 4 grid for you.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S6150 Point & Shoot Camera Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
Traveling photography will now have a new meaning. The rugged Nikon Coolpix AW100 belongs to the Coolpix AW series of point and shoot digital cameras. Waterproof to 10 m, free-proof to -10 degrees centigrade and drop-proof from 1.5 m, this camera is an ideal travel companion. This all-weather digital camera has a Nikkor Lens with a focal length of 5 - 25 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm.

This Coolpix digital camera has a CMOS image sensor that lets you take images at a resolution of 16 megapixels. You can take crisp images of distant subjects with 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom of the Coolpix AW100.

The body of this Coolpix all-weather camera is rugged and durable. The Nikon Coolpix AW100 weighs 178 g and has a slim design that will fit comfortably in your backpack. The one touch video recording button is convenient to use on a camping trip or a trek. With this Coolpix camera, you can record videos in Full HD at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 dot pixel 30 fps. The GPS tracking feature is very useful when you are exploring new places on your travels.

This Coolpix digital camera is powered by the EXPEED C2 image-processing engine. The 3 inch TFT LCD display screen has a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. The anti-reflection coating of this display screen makes viewing images or videos much easier even in the harshest sunlight.

Battery and Storage

You can take up to 250 images with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery on a single charge. This Coolpix AW100 has an internal memory of 83 MB and can be expanded using SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can use the USB 2.0 high speed port to transfer your images to a PC or laptop and always have free space for more. You can also view your images and videos on an HDTV using the HDMI mini connector.

Performance

Aperture of a camera refers to the lens diaphragm which controls the amount of light reaching the image sensor. This Nikon AW100 has an aperture range of f/3.9 - 4.8. This Nikon point and shoot has a focus range of 500 mm to infinity Wide and 1000 mm onwards Tele in the Auto mode. In Macro mode, this focus range begins from 10 mm onwards Wide.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of the image sensor in a camera. The light sensitivity of this Nikon Coolpix camera is in the range of ISO 125 - 800. The light sensitivity can be manually changed in the range of ISO 125 - 3200. The shutter speed in this Coolpix AW100 has a range of 1 - 1/1500 seconds on the Auto mode. In the Fireworks Show mode, the shutter speed reduces to 4 seconds, to capture the image of bursts of light in a fireworks display.

Night time traveling can be brightened with the inbuilt flash of the AW100, which has a range of 300 - 3500 mm Wide and 500 - 2200 mm Tele.

Features

This Nikon Coolpix digital camera has 19 scene modes like Beach, Night Landscape, Pet Portrait, Underwater and many more. In the Underwater scene mode, the AW100 adjusts settings to prevent unnatural green or blue cast in images, giving you dramatic pictures of your underwater experiences.

This travel camera has a combination of lens-shift and electronic Vibration Reduction, enabling you to take sharp and blur-free pictures. The Smile mode of this Coolpix digital camera automatically fires the shutter when a subject smiles and the Blink Warning feature displays a warning message when a subject has blinked.

With the self-timer of this Coolpix point and shoot camera, you can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and be in every image with your friends. You can take up to 3 shots at a speed of 7.1 frames per second in the Continuous Shooting mode and capture every instance of a sky-diving or scuba-diving adventure.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix AW100 Point & Shoot Camera Black
Nikon P7100 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The time to impress your friends with the latest gadget is here. The Nikon Coolpix S1200pj point and shoot digital camera has an inbuilt projector that you can use to project your images instantly. From the S series of point and shoot cameras of Nikon, the Coolpix S1200pj has a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 5 - 25 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 28 - 140 mm.

The CCD sensor of this Nikon Coolpix camera lets you take images at 14.1 megapixel resolution. With the 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom of this S1200pj digital camera, you can take close-up shots of distant objects with ease. Images can be composed and previewed using the 3 inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 460,000 dot pixels. This display screen has anti-reflection coating which lets you see images clearly even in bright sunlight.

The Nikon Coolpix S1200pj has a sophisticated design with a sliding projector cover that prevents dust from sticking to the projector. The body of the camera has an elongated design that is easy to hold while shooting pictures. The frequently used buttons on the back panel are backlit for easy use even in the dark, when the camera is being used as a projector. This Nikon camera is slim and considerably light, weighing only 186 g.

You can shoot videos in HD with the Nikon S1200pj, at 1280 x 720 dot pixel resolution 30 fps. With the projector feature, the camera can be connected to a computer to project anything from it. You can project up to 60 inches diagonally and to a distance of 260 - 3100 mm. The projector delivers images in bright colors and high contrast, giving you the effect of a dedicated projector. The EXPEED C2 image processing engine enhances movie recording and image quality.

Battery and Storage

The Nikon Coolpix has an internal memory of 94 MB and is compatible with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can take up to 220 images with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery of this Nikon S1200pj digital camera. The Nikon Coolpix S1200pj has a high speed USB port that you can use to transfer images and video clips from the camera to a computer or PC.

Performance

The Nikon Coolpix digital camera has an aperture range of f/3.9 - 5.8. Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening that controls the amount of light falling on the image sensor. With an Auto Focus range of 300 mm onwards Wide and 500 mm to infinity Tele in Auto mode and 30 mm onwards Wide and 500 mm to infinity in Macro mode, you can choose who you want to focus on in an image or video.

This Nikon camera has a light sensitivity range of ISO 80 - 1600. The Nikon Coolpix S1200pj has a shutter speed range of 1 - 1/1500 second in Auto mode which can be decreased to 4 seconds when the scene mode is set to Fireworks show. With the built-in flash, you can light up the scene in a range of 300 - 4500 mm Wide and 500 - 3500 mm Tele and ensure that every detail of the image is well lit.

Features

This Nikon S1200pj has 18 scene modes like Fireworks, Beach, Pet Portrait and many more. With the combination Lens shift and Electronic Vibration Reduction systems, you can be assured of blur-free and steady images at every shot. The Smile Timer features releases the shutter when it identifies a smiling face within the frame. Blink Proof alerts you when your subject has closed their eyes, so you can take another one.

The self-timer function lets you delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds, so that you can join your friends and other loved ones in every image. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 4 shots at 1.2 frames per second with a single burst, and record every second of an endearing performance or a race.
productAttributes.title: Nikon S1200PJ Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The classic look of this Nikon camera will stand out as a work of art. The Nikon Coolpix S8200 belongs to the Coolpix S series of point and shoot digital cameras by Nikon. Ideal for the regular party-goer, this feature packed Coolpix camera will aid in storing your memories in dramatic clarity. This S8200 digital camera features a NIKKOR lens with a focal length of 4.5 - 63.0 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 25 - 350 mm.

The Coolpix S8200 has up to 14x optical zoom and up to 2x digital zoom that you can experiment with to get clear images of distant subjects. The backside illuminated CMOS image sensor lets you take stunning images at 16.1 megapixel resolution. This lets you enlarge images and still retain the original brilliance of your favorite moments.

The compact Nikon camera weighs 213 g and is sleek enough to fit into a jacket pocket or handbag. The portable camera has an elegant back panel with dedicated buttons for video recording and previewing images, making the Nikon S8200 an easy-to-use camera. You can also take professional looking videos in Full HD at 1920 x 1080 dot pixel resolution 30 fps, recording your precious moments in high-resolution detail.

The Nikon Coolpix S8200 sports the EXPEED C2 image processing engine which delivers high resolution images coupled with fast performance. Videos and images can be viewed in 16:9 aspect ratio, letting you watch your favorite memories on a large screen TV. You can compose and preview these images on the 3 inch TFT LCD monitor, which has a resolution of 921,000 dot pixels. The anti-reflection coating of the LCD screen makes it easy to view images even in bright sunlight.

Battery and Storage

The Coolpix S8200 has an internal memory of 89 MB and can be expanded using compatible SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. The Nikon point and shoot camera is powered by a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery, with which you can take up to 250 shots on full charge. You can use the USB 2.0 high speed port to transfer your images to a computer or laptop and always have more space in your camera for those precious memories. The HDMI port allows you to connect the Nikon Coolpix S8200 to an HDTV to watch your photographs and videos in full screen clarity.

Performance

Aperture refers to the size of the lens opening which controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. The Coolpix S8200 has an aperture with a range of f/3.5 - 5.9. With the Nikon point and shoot camera, you can focus in the range of 500 mm onwards Wide and 1000 mm to infinity in Auto mode. In Macro mode, the focus ranges from 10 mm onwards Wide.

ISO refers to the light sensitivity of a camera. This Nikon S8200 has a light sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 3200. With the shutter speed range of 1 - 1/1600 second, you can take blur-free images of subjects even in low light situations. The shutter speed decreases to 4 seconds when the scene mode is set to Fireworks show mode, which enables clear image capture of astounding light bursts. The built-in pop-out flash has a functioning range of 500 - 5500 mm Wide and 1000 - 3000 mm Tele, which will light up every corner of your images.

Features

The Nikon Coolpix S8200 has 18 scene modes like Pet Portrait, Food, Museum, Sunset and many more modes. You can use these scene modes to experiment with different photo effects. The lens shift Vibration Reduction of the S8200 ensures that pictures of moving objects are blur-free and sharp in focus. In the Easy Panorama mode, you only need to move the camera in the desired direction following the guidelines that appear on the screen, and the S8200 digital camera combines multiple shots into a single panorama photograph.

The Face Priority feature finds and focuses on up to 12 faces to get clear and sharp images. The Blink Warning function warns you when your subject blinks, so that you can take another picture and always have perfect images of your favorite people. The Smile Timer mode of the Nikon S8200 automatically recognizes a smiling face and releases the shutter, ensuring you never miss out on adorable moments.

The self-timer of the Coolpix point and shoot camera lets you delay the shutter release by 2 and 10 seconds, letting you join your friends in every photograph. With the Continuous Shooting mode, you can take up to 5 shots at 10 frames per second. This lets you record still images of whole sequences of actions, saving all your special moments forever.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix S8200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The sophisticated looking Nikon Coolpix S4150 belongs to the Coolpix S series of point and shoot cameras. This portable digital camera is ideal for people of all ages. The Coolpix S4150 camera has a Nikkor lens with a focal length of 4.6 - 23 mm and a 35 mm equivalent focal length of 26 - 130 mm. This Nikon digital camera has 5x optical zoom and 4x digital zoom options, bringing distant subjects closer.

With this Coolpix camera, you can take sharp images at 14 megapixel resolution. Weighing only 131 g, this Nikon digital camera has a sleek finish and fits comfortably in your hand. One touch buttons for video recording, preview and scene modes make the Coolpix S4150 an easy to use camera. The EXPEED C2 image processor of this S4150 enhances the quality of your images.

With this Coolpix digital camera, you can shoot videos in HD at a resolution of 1280 x 720 dot pixel 30 fps. You can preview your photos at the touch of a finger with the Nikon S4150's 3 inch TFT LCD touchscreen display which has a screen resolution of 460,000 dot pixel. The anti-reflective coating of the display screen ensures you can look at your images in bright sunlight with ease.

Battery and Storage

In the Coolpix S4150 digital camera, you can take 160 shots with the rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. The Nikon S4150 has an inbuilt memory of 20 MB and is compatible with SD, SDHC and SDXC memory cards. You can transfer photographs to a laptop or PC using the high speed USB port, making space for more on your camera.

Performance

In this Nikon S4150, the focus range is from 500 mm to infinity in Auto mode and 100 mm to infinity in Macro mode. Aperture refers to the size of the opening in the lens which controls the amount of light that falls on the image sensor. The Nikon S4150 has an aperture range of f/3.2 - 6.5.

ISO speed numbers refer to the light sensitivity of the image sensor in a digital camera. The light sensitivity of this Coolpix digital camera is in the range of ISO 80 - 1600 in Auto mode. The light sensitivity can be manually changed in the range of ISO 80 - 3200. The inbuilt flash can be used to take bright pictures even at night.

Features

This Nikon Coolpix digital camera has 19 preset scene modes like Food, Museum, Sunset, Fireworks and many more. In the Pet Portrait mode, the S4150 automatically detects your pets' face and releases the shutter to get adorable pictures.

You can take defined and blur-free pictures with this Nikon S4150's Electronic Vibration Reduction. The Selective Color filter converts the image to a monochrome, and then lets you fill in a splash of a selected color on one part of the photograph, transforming your memory instantly.

The Smile Timer function in this Coolpix digital camera takes a picture when the subject of your photograph smiles. The Blink Proof feature warns you when a subject has blinked, allowing you to take another image. Best Shot Selector picks the sharpest of up to 10 sequential images, to ensure you always have flawless images.

With this Coolpix camera's self-timer, you can delay the shutter release by 2 or 10 seconds and always be in every picture with your friends. On the Continuous mode, you can take up to 3 shots at 0.7 frames per second. You can take up to 16 frames with a single shutter release in the Multi-shot mode of the Coolpix S4150, capturing entire sequences of action with a single click.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Compact cameras are more effective as ready cameras due to one simple fact; they are always there when you need them, as they can be switched on and made ready within a matter of seconds. The Sony Cyber Shot camera is the best choice for beginners who want to learn more about photography.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a high performance 16.1 MP Super HAD CCD sensor that can be used for high performance photography. The sensor is also well suited for low light photography.

Lens Arrangement

The compact camera is equipped with a high quality Carl Zeiss lens that comes with a zoom capability of 8 X in the optical range. Optical zooming is far superior to digital zoom as it allows you to zoom without compromising on the quality of the image.

High Definition Movie Shooting

This camera is capable of shooting movies in High Definition format with a resolution of 720 p. This is also supported by the Active Steady Shot which comes in handy for unsteady situations where you will need to keep an eye on your footing as well as on the subject.

Intelligent Auto Mode

This camera is also incorporated with an intelligent auto mode that can come in handy for those who wish to only enjoy taking in the scenes and not bother much about the settings of the camera.

Creative Effects

This camera also consists of a few creative effects that come with it, which makes it ideal for use with creative photography. These Beauty Effects can be applied to portraits and also for some other scenes. There are also a host of different picture effects that can help bring your creative clicks to life.

Display Technology

The camera is incorporated with a high quality 2.7 inch LCD screen that can serve as the viewfinder as well as the primary means to review all your clicked pictures. The flash is also quite advanced in the Sony Cyber Shot camera as it can be used as and when necessary according to the situation around the subject.
productAttributes.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W730 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Compact cameras are much sought after for their versatile design and easy usability since all you really need to do, is point and shoot.

Sensor Technology

The Sony Cyber Shot DSC W710 uses a powerful 16.1 MP sensor with Super HAD CCD technology. This is an ideal sensor for compact cameras as it is capable of low light photography with decent levels of detail and contrast. This is also a sensor that is more than capable of performing well along a wide range of situations where lighting may vary in density and intensity.

Zoom Levels

This camera is capable of optical zoom, which is more suited for quality photography as compared to digital zoom. The 5 X Optical Zoom relies on optical input rather than magnifying the digital readout. This means that there is little or no loss of detail when zooming with the lens as compared to the pixel magnification found in digital zoom.

Advanced Flash Technology

This camera uses a powerful and advanced flash for illuminating the subject when it is under low light conditions. The Advanced Flash Technology uses ambient light readings to gauge the flash necessity for illuminating the subjects. This is best seen in the Auto Mode of the camera where the scene recognition can set the values necessary for the flash to fire, or not.

Beauty Effect

This is a relatively new feature brought out in the Cyber Shot line of cameras. This feature allows you to create truly beautiful portraits with the in-built camera retouching controls. This setting allows you to make the necessary changes to attributes like the skin tone, colour shades, eyes, teeth and other important facial features. You can now say goodbye to unwanted blemishes and give new meaning to the term, picture perfect.

Picture Effects

You can now transform ordinary shots in your camera into beautiful scenes thanks to the Picture Effect Mode available on the Cyber Shot camera. Bring out the artist in you with the W710 where various effects can be applied to photos, movies and also to the panorama shots which can be clicked with the 3 Sweep Panorama Effects. 

Other Features

This camera sports an Intelligent Auto Mode which can recognize scenes on its own and apply necessary settings accordingly. You also get a 2.7 inch clear photo LCD screen for previews and view finding.
productAttributes.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W710 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Point and Shoot cameras are great for beginners and intermediates as it allows them to always have an automatically set camera ready on hand for when the perfect photo opportunity comes by.

Sensor Technology

The Nikon Coolpix camera with Point and Shoot ability comes loaded with a powerful and extremely efficient 16.1 MP sensor that can perform well even under low light conditions.

Zoom Specifications and Levels

This highly useful point and shoot camera is equipped with a high quality lens that comes with a zoom capability of 5 X in the optical range. Optical Zoom is far more sought after than digital as it does not damage the quality of the image during the zooming process.

Automatic Settings and Modes

This camera is equipped with an Easy Auto Mode that can take care of all the necessary settings required for a high quality image capture. The Auto Mode is required for point and shoot cameras as it comes with little or no manual controls. At times like this, it is imperative for them to have a mechanism that takes care of all the details on its own.

High Definition Movie Recording

This camera is also capable of taking high quality videos in a high definition 720 p format. This format is great for playback on large screens and HD Televisions.

Display Technology for Previews and More

This camera is also equipped with a high quality 2.7 inch LCD monitor that can be used for previewing your image captures. It also serves as the device’s viewfinder that will help you line up your shot before releasing the shutter.

Process that Image

This camera is equipped with the EXPEED C2 image-processing engine that can result in some high quality shots that appear as close to natural color and lighting as possible on a camera.

Steady Shot without Blur

The camera is also capable of taking photos that are relatively free of motions blurs thanks to the blur reduction feature that can result in fairly good photos even under rough conditions.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L27 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
Image Sensor

The Nikon Coolpix camera is a highly popular advanced point and shoot device that can be used as a bridge between a compact point and shoot camera and a full fledged DSLR camera. It comes equipped with a highly capable 16 MP low light capable CMOS Sensor that can function beautifully at a wide range of lighting conditions.

Zoom in Close

Being an advanced point and shoot device, it comes equipped with a highly capable Nikkor ED Lens. This lens is made with high precision and comes with an optical zoom level of 30 X. This is a great range of zoom as it allows you to use the optics and not the sensor and receptor to get a magnification. The optical zoom allows for light focusing whereas the digital zoom involves simple magnification of the pixels, which result in pixilated images.

Display Monitor Technology

This camera is equipped with a high quality 3 inch VGA LCD display that lets you preview your captured images. This helps you decide if more shots are required or if you can simply move onto the next subject. The LCD screen also lets you view and compose the image before you actually shoot it, much like the viewfinder of the camera.

Full HD Recording

This camera is equipped with the ability to take high quality crystal clear HD videos at a resolution of 1080 pixels. The exceptional video and picture quality can be seen when the camera is connected to an HD TV. The camera is also equipped with a microphone that can record stereo sound. This is important when having high quality videos.

Other Features

The camera is equipped with the Lens-shift Vibration Reduction feature for high image quality. This allows for precise and life-like images thanks to the EXPEED C2 image-processing engine. It is also easier to carry around thanks to the larger ergonomic design that lets you handle it easily.
productAttributes.title: Nikon Coolpix L820 Advanced Point & Shoot Camera Blue
Nikon Coolpix L28 Point & Shoot Camera Pink

productAttributes.productDescription:
Nikon Cameras are supposed to be the most widely used devices by photographers the world over. This is mainly due to the fact that they are mostly user friendly and are designed in such a manner that they are easy to operate. Point and Shoot cameras like the Nikon Coolpix L28 are best suited for new comers and intermediates in terms of photography skills.

Image Sensor and Lens

The camera is equipped with a highly efficient 20 MP CCD image sensor that is more than capable of taking high definition pictures in stunning clarity and detail. The sensor is of premium quality and this shows especially in outdoor pictures. The vivid colours, vibrant scenes and details that are captured by the camera simply looks amazing.

The 5 X Wide Angle Nikkor lens that is used with the camera allows you to get closer to the action without actually having to move physically close to the subject. The incorporation of the VR function, also known as the Vibration Reduction feature ensures that your pictures are always of high quality.

High Definition Videos

The camera is capable of taking high definition videos at 720 p. The lens and sensor work well together to deliver truly stunning visuals in terms of video recording and photography. The videos that are captured are in the widescreen format. The camera itself is quite simple, and is very convenient to operate.

Automatic Mode

The camera is so easy to use that with the in-built automatic mode, you can easily start taking some high quality images in no time. All you need to do, is select the auto mode and point and shoot at the subject of your choice. The Easy Auto Mode will optimize all the necessary settings for the selected shot and this frees the user from having to worry too much about the settings. The camera is also equipped with 20 different scene modes for effortless photography.

Image Sensor

The Nikon Coolpix L820 consists of a highly capable 16.0 MP low light CMOS image sensor. This image sensor is capable of supporting photography without the use of a flash. This also allows for seamless photography sessions as the flash interruptions will not occur. The use of a flash with this camera is only warranted when the lighting is extremely poor.

Zoom in Close

With the in-built Nikkor ED lens, you can easily zoom in thanks to the 30 X Wide angle to telephoto zoom capabilities of the camera. This also translates to better photography as you can get close to the action without actually having to move closer to the subject physically. The Optical Zoom also means that the magnification remains crystal clear and without pixilation as compared to digital zoom.

Monitor

The camera is also equipped with a 3 inch VGA LCD screen that allows you to preview your captures just as you take them. This helps in deciding if more shots are required before moving onto the next subject. The screen also lets you compose the image before you actually shoot it, letting you a clear idea of how the image will look like before the shutter gets released.

Full HD Recording

With the Nikon camera, you can shoot stunning, precise and crystal clear HD videos that are in Full HD 1080 p mode. This camera truly delivers in this respect thanks to the optics and sensor technology used in its construction. The exceptional video quality can be seen when the camera is connected to an HD television. The camera is also equipped with a high quality microphone that can record stereo sound. This is important when having high quality videos as you will need the sound to also match the quality of the visuals.

Other Features

The camera is equipped with the Lens-shift VR for high image quality. This allows for precise images thanks to the EXPEED C2 image-processing engine. It is also easier to handle thanks to the larger ergonomic design that lets you handle it easily.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Compact cameras are more effective as ready cameras due to one simple fact; they are always there when you need them, as they can be switched on and made ready within a matter of seconds. The Sony Cyber Shot camera is the best choice for beginners who want to learn more about photography.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a high performance 16.1 MP Super HAD CCD sensor that can be used for high performance photography. The sensor is also well suited for low light photography.

Lens Arrangement

The compact camera is equipped with a high quality Carl Zeiss lens that comes with a zoom capability of 8 X in the optical range. Optical zooming is far superior to digital zoom as it allows you to zoom without compromising on the quality of the image.

High Definition Movie Shooting

This camera is capable of shooting movies in High Definition format with a resolution of 720 p. This is also supported by the Active Steady Shot which comes in handy for unsteady situations where you will need to keep an eye on your footing as well as on the subject.

Intelligent Auto Mode

This camera is also incorporated with an intelligent auto mode that can come in handy for those who wish to only enjoy taking in the scenes and not bother much about the settings of the camera.

Creative Effects

This camera also consists of a few creative effects that come with it, which makes it ideal for use with creative photography. These Beauty Effects can be applied to portraits and also for some other scenes. There are also a host of different picture effects that can help bring your creative clicks to life.

Display Technology

The camera is incorporated with a high quality 2.7 inch LCD screen that can serve as the viewfinder as well as the primary means to review all your clicked pictures. The flash is also quite advanced in the Sony Cyber Shot camera as it can be used as and when necessary according to the situation around the subject.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Compact Cameras are great for beginners and intermediates as they come with a lot of automatic features that make it easy for learning processes.

The Sensor Technology

This Cyber Shot DSC by Sony is equipped with a powerful 18.2 MP EXMOR R CMOS Sensor that is well suited for high quality photography while still being able to take great shots even under low light conditions.

Optical Zoom Levels

The camera comes with a healthy 10 X Optical Zooming capability. This allows you to get closer to the action without having to compromise on the quality of the image. Optical Zoom relies on image magnification at the sensor itself due to the changing focal length of the lens arrangement. This is much more desirable in terms of magnification as compared to pixel magnification in digital zooming. This also causes bad quality images due to excess pixilation.

Steady Does It

This camera is also equipped with the Optical Steady Shot feature that allows you to take super clear images even when your hands are a little unsteady. This is a great feature as it comes in handy during high speed photo sessions where you need to capture a moving subject or you need to move to keep the subject in focus. The Optical Steady Shot is capable of making the necessary changes and corrections in the image within the sensor and lens arrangement itself during the shutter movement process.

High Speed Auto Focus

This camera is also incorporated with a high speed Auto Focus mode that lets you focus on the subject of your choice. Most point and shoot cameras are equipped with the Auto Focus mode though not all of them will be capable of high speed focusing. The AF on this camera however, is able to focus on a subject without losing out on too much time.

Connectivity

This ultra compact camera is also incorporated with WiFi connectivity that lets you connect to a compatible WiFi network and transmit your photos to your preferred location through compatible channels.

Movie Recording at Full HD

The Sony Cyber Shot is capable of recording movies at a Full HD resolution of 1080 p which results in highly clear and crisp video files.

Panorama

It also comes with an Intelligent 360 degree Sweep Panorama Mode.
productAttributes.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX200 Point & Shoot Camera Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sony Cyber Shot DSC camera is a great point and shoot device that is ideal for both beginners and intermediates.

Sensor Technology

The 20.1 MP Super HAD CCD sensor is highly efficient in taking high quality images with little or no artefacts. The sensor is also great for high quality low light images. The device is well designed for high quality photography so that you do not need to keep changing the ISO settings too much to click good pictures over a wide range of lighting conditions.

Zoom Function

This camera is equipped with a high quality lens that can zoom in to 26 X in the optical range. This optical zoom is more effective than digital zoom as it involves actually magnifying the image as seen by the lens. Other digital zoom methods only magnify the pixels and create a large, yet low quality image that is not desirable.

Advanced Flash

This camera by Sony is incorporated with an Advanced Flash that can fire according to the settings that get coded during scene recognition. This is especially seen during the Auto mode metering where the flash fires if the lighting is less than adequate.

HD Movie Recording

This Sony Cyber Shot camera is capable of taking high definition videos so that you can record your own HD movies with the help of this device. The 720 p resolution is highly effective even when connecting the device to an HD output like an HDTV.

Display Technology

This point and shoot camera is equipped with a 3 inch Clear Photo TFT LCD screen that is useful for previews and also for staging your subject for that perfect shot. This is also an effective way of gauging which photos are important enough to keep in the camera and which can be deleted, without having to wait for a computer.

Other Features

In terms of comfort, the camera is quite well designed, keeping in mind the contours and the average shape of the human hand. The DSLR styled body allows you to hold this camera in a very professional manner to shoot the very best images possible from a device of this calibre. You also have the Optical Steady Shot to shoot crisp pictures.

Steady Does It

This is a great feature as it comes in handy during high speed photo sessions where you need to capture a moving subject or you need to move to keep the subject in focus. The Optical Steady Shot is capable of making the necessary changes and corrections in the image within the sensor and lens arrangement itself during the shutter movement process.

High Speed Auto Focus

This camera is also incorporated with a high speed Auto Focus mode that lets you focus on the subject of your choice. Most point and shoot cameras are equipped with the Auto Focus mode though not all of them will be capable of high speed focusing. The AF on this camera however, is able to focus on a subject without losing out on too much time.

Connectivity

This ultra compact camera is also incorporated with WiFi connectivity that lets you connect to a compatible WiFi network and transmit your photos to your preferred location through compatible channels.

Movie Recording at Full HD

The Sony Cyber Shot is capable of recording movies at a Full HD resolution of 1080 p which results in highly clear and crisp video files.

Panorama

It also comes with an Intelligent 360 degree Sweep Panorama Mode.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Compact Cameras are great for beginners and intermediates as they come with a lot of automatic features that make it easy for learning processes.

The Sensor Technology

This Cyber Shot DSC by Sony is equipped with a powerful 18.2 MP EXMOR R CMOS Sensor that is well suited for high quality photography while still being able to take great shots even under low light conditions.

Optical Zoom Levels

The camera comes with a healthy 10 X Optical Zooming capability. This allows you to get closer to the action without having to compromise on the quality of the image. Optical Zoom relies on image magnification at the sensor itself due to the changing focal length of the lens arrangement. This is much more desirable in terms of magnification as compared to pixel magnification in digital zooming. This also causes bad quality images due to excess pixilation.

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sony Cyber Shot range of cameras comes with a host of features that can be useful for a wide range of users. Compact Cameras are great for beginners and intermediates as they come with a lot of features that make it easy for beginners to learn the basics of photography.

Sensor Technology

This camera is equipped with a 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Sensor that is well suited for various lighting conditions. This sensor is designed for superior performance along a wide range of conditions. The camera is well suited for daytime photography as well as low light photography.

The Power of Carl Zeiss

This particular Cyber Shot camera is equipped with some of the most advanced Carl Zeiss lens arrangements available for compact cameras, mainly, the Vario – Tessar Lens that allows an optical zoom range of 8 X.

Superior Auto Mode

This camera is also equipped with the Enhanced version of the Superior Auto mode that allows for seamless photography. The main reason for Auto Mode is so that even beginners to photography will find it relatively easy to take good photographs. The Enhanced Superior Auto Mode works by analyzing the environment or lighting conditions prevalent around the subject.

Full HD Movie Recording

This Cyber Shot camera by Sony is capable of recording movies at Full HD resolutions of 1080 p. This allows for greater clarity and overall quality. The camera and the sensor together comprise of a highly tuned optical arrangement that allows you to not only take high quality Full HD videos, but you can also take superior quality pictures across a wide range of lighting conditions.

Creative Picture Effects

This camera is also equipped with a wide variety of creative filters and effects that can make pictures appear much more creative than they were when first clicked. This is a great feature for people who want to explore the creative side of photography and bring out more visually appealing photos.

High Speed Shooting

The Cyber Shot camera by Sony is also capable of high speed shooting at a rate of 10 FPS. This allows for some sporty photography with the compact camera as it can be used to capture motion in high detail.
